story:
Team introduction

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-7PUA48SHU

AbsoluteLegends gaming house

  • We are a gaming organisation that would like to give a full time job to to our players to achieve the best results.
  • This is important to us to bring a better production to the fans and support gamers with what they really want. I think it is everyone their dream who plays games to be able to do this fulltime and achieve the best possible results.
  • With this you would help us achieve a milestone for AbsoluteLegends in esports, we have build this up from nowhere and have seen unexpected growth in only two years of esports we are doing this, we only want the best for our players and with this funding we can realize this.
  • Cost breakdown:
  1. Rent for the house
  2. Food
  3. Furniture
  4. Pc's , streaming equipment
  5. Insurance

We respect and understand how important the community is to us and with this we can give back what we always wanted to the community, daily streams from the house, youtube videos, house tours, fan invitations to the house and much more.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding for the costs of the house and food for the players. We also need funding for some furniture to set them up with what they need.
  • You get to follow your favourite players every day through live webcams of the house and every day streams. We will also give out Shirts and Absolute Energy drinks to donators. We will be doing invites for you guys to play and stay with our players in the house.
  • Even if we don't reach the expected funds we will still realize this but maybe on a smaller scale if needed, the players are fully commited to this together with the organisation and this is where we want to go, play fulltime to be one of the best.

The Impact

  • Gaming houses are common in esports for the top players and teams and we would like to reach a similar level, our players are very motivated and dedicated and this would have major impact on their lives and future in esports
  • We do not only want this gaming house to be for our players but for anyone that wants to achieve something through gaming in their life give the chance to grow in this house, of course we can't get everyone in here but we can give the chance to the more unkown people to grow here as a player too.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • We understand that not everyone can contribute with money to this project but we can even fund this project through other ways if you are willing to help us achieve this..
  • Other ways you can help ? You can do the following:
  • Idle in the gaming house support channel on our raidcall ID 7007
  • Sign up and try / play one of the games on following page www.bigpoint.com/lol
  • Follow our player / tournament streams on www.twitch.tv/team/absolutelegends

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks everyone for reading and contributing in any way you can !

AbsoluteLegends
story_txt:
Team introduction
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-7PUA48SHU
AbsoluteLegends gaming house

We are a gaming organisation that would like to give a full time job to to our players to achieve the best results.


This is important to us to bring a better production to the fans and support gamers with what they really want. I think it is everyone their dream who plays games to be able to do this fulltime and achieve the best possible results.


With this you would help us achieve a milestone for AbsoluteLegends in esports, we have build this up from nowhere and have seen unexpected growth in only two years of esports we are doing this, we only want the best for our players and with this funding we can realize this.
Cost breakdown:


Rent for the house
Food
Furniture
Pc's , streaming equipment
Insurance

We respect and understand how important the community is to us and with this we can give back what we always wanted to the community, daily streams from the house, youtube videos, house tours, fan invitations to the house and much more.


What We Need & What You Get

We need funding for the costs of the house and food for the players. We also need funding for some furniture to set them up with what they need.
You get to follow your favourite players every day through live webcams of the house and every day streams. We will also give out Shirts and Absolute Energy drinks to donators. We will be doing invites for you guys to play and stay with our players in the house.
Even if we don't reach the expected funds we will still realize this but maybe on a smaller scale if needed, the players are fully commited to this together with the organisation and this is where we want to go, play fulltime to be one of the best.



The Impact

Gaming houses are common in esports for the top players and teams and we would like to reach a similar level, our players are very motivated and dedicated and this would have major impact on their lives and future in esports
We do not only want this gaming house to be for our players but for anyone that wants to achieve something through gaming in their life give the chance to grow in this house, of course we can't get everyone in here but we can give the chance to the more unkown people to grow here as a player too.



Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

We understand that not everyone can contribute with money to this project but we can even fund this project through other ways if you are willing to help us achieve this..
Other ways you can help ? You can do the following:
Idle in the gaming house support channel on our raidcall ID 7007
Sign up and try / play one of the games on following page www.bigpoint.com/lol

Follow our player / tournament streams on www.twitch.tv/team/absolutelegends


Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks everyone for reading and contributing in any way you can !
AbsoluteLegends

story:
Unsere Mission


Werde ein Teil dieses Projektes und unterstütze die Zukunft

des Mildenauer Fußball´s!

Der Zahn der Zeit hat seine Spuren hinterlassen, unser Sportplatz ist identisch einem Acker,

                  deshalb benötigen wir Eure finanzielle Hilfe zur Sanierung                   unseres "Rasen"platzes.

Knochenbrüche, Zerrungen & Schwellungen gehören zur
Tretmühle unserer jetzigen Spiele!

Wir müssen unsere 4 Jugendmannschaften aktiv durch bessere

Bedingungen fördern und nicht die Euphorie, in der virtuellen Welt 

zu sponsern.

Deshalb leistet Euren Beitrag und schafft

die Basis für den Fußball von morgen!

Mit Begeisterung & Freude am Fußball zum Erfolg!



Dein Beitrag ist ein Schritt zum Erfolg


    Um unser Ziel zu verwirklichen, benötigen wir eine Sanierung des Rasenplatzes, eine Zisterne für die Bewässerungstechnik und einen neuen Rasentraktor, was einen Gesamtwert von 25.000€ ergibt. In diesem Betrag inbegriffen ist nicht nur die Verbesserung des Platzes, sondern auch dessen Pflege und Erhaltung für mehrere Jahre. 

    Bilder sagen mehr als Worte...


        Deshalb, helft uns dies zu ändern!



      Unser Dankeschön


        Jede finanzielle Unterstützung wird natürlich honoriert. Falls du keine namentliche Erwähnung erwünschst, bitte kurze Info an
         mildenau-fussball@gmx.de.
        •      10€ -->  (Sanierung von 1m² des Sportareals) --> Erwähnung auf                              Webseite und Sponsorenboard 
        •      25€ -->  plus 1 x freier Eintritt
        •      50€ -->  kleines Logo auf Webseite und Banner
        •    100€ -->  plus Mannschaftsfoto im Postkartenformat mit Grußformel,                      und Logo auf Webseite
        •   500€ -->  Fanpaket: Schal, Wimpel, Mannschaftsfoto  mit Grußformel
        • 1000€ -->  Fanpaket und symbolischer Anstoß
        • 3000€ --> Eröffnungsspiel auf dem neuen Sportplatz mit                                               Scheckübergabe und Presseauftritt
        • 5000€ --> Trikotsponsor plus Scheckübergabe mit Presseauftritt

        Geplanter Verwendungszweck der 25.000€

        ca.     400€ Unkrautbekämpfung
        ca.     800€ Vertikutieren
        ca. 2.700€ Besandung und Nachbearbeitung 
        ca.  1.700€ Aerifizieren
        ca. 2.600€ Nachsäen und Saatgut
        ca. 1.800€ Düngung und Nachbearbeitung    
        ca. 10.000€ für Rasentraktor und Zubehör
        ca. 5.000€ für eine Bewässerungsanlage

        Alle Kosten und Gebühren sind bereits einkalkuliert. Falls unser Ziel nicht erreicht wird, setzen wir die nötigsten Teile der Sanierung um. 

          Jeder kann helfen!


          Falls du nicht die Möglichkeit hast, uns finanziell zu unterstützen, kannst du trotzdem ein wichtiger Teil unseres Projektes sein. Erzähle es einfach deinen Freuden und Bekannten und trage es in die Welt hinaus.

           

          Natürlich kannst du uns auch anderweitig unter die Arme greifen.

          Wenn du nicht mit PayPal vertraut bist, nutze unser Spendenkonto:




          ODER:


          In einigen Geschäften Mildenau´s (Bäckerei Brückner, Getränkehandel Hunger. Frisörsalon Haarglanz, Tankstelle, Blumiges am Pennymarkt) warten kleine, grüne Fußballspendendosen auf euren Beitrag.

story:
Click Here for English

Quienes somos y cuál es nuestro Proyecto?

Somos Mariana Foglia (32 años - foto izquierda) y Pablo Defazio (33 años - foto derecha). Nuestro objetivo es lograr la clasificación a los Juegos Olímpicos Río 2016 en el deporte de Vela y en la clase Nacra 17. El Nacra 17 es un velero catamarán, categoría mixta elegido como clase olímpica en el año 2012.  Este deporte que disfrutamos desde pequeños, hoy lo hemos integrado 100% a nuestra forma de vida. La Campaña Olímpica que nos proponemos realizar consta de 4 años (2013 a 2016).  ¿Incertidumbres, inseguridades, planificamos bien o mal?… eran preguntas que solíamos hacernos a diario. Con el paso del tiempo nos dimos cuenta que lo que nos empuja en este sueño es que creemos en nosotros mismos, y creemos el uno en el otro. Estamos convencidos de que lo vamos a lograr. 

Lo que necesitamos

La Campaña anual que tendrá lugar en el 2015, tiene un costo de 95000 USD aproximadamente. En lo que va de la campaña, hemos invertido más de 100.000 USD en la compra de dos embarcaciones (una para entrenar en Uruguay y la otra para entrenar en Europa), 5 viajes a Europa y 3 a Brasil, más la compra de materiales estructurales del barco (si deseas conocer más, sobre nuestro presupuesto, visita nuestra web)  www.nacra17uru.com  Con el avance del proyecto, los recursos económicos se nos han ido agotando y por ello estamos buscando recaudar los fondos que nos permitan continuar participando en los entrenamientos y ciclo de competencias internacionales 2015 del primer semestre. Para ello necesitamos comprar equipamiento para el barco, contratar un entrenador y costear los viajes para las competencias, lo que hace un total de 21000 USD  (Dólares Americanos).

Detalles del monto objetivo: 21000 USD

Equipamiento: 

Juego de Velas:  consiste en 1 Spinnaker (1500 USD), un Foque (1000 USD) y una Mayor (2500 USD) tal como se muestra en el dibujo de abajo.

Entrenador: pasajes aéreos y alojamiento  (6000 USD)

Competencias y Entrenamientos: inscripciones a torneos, alojamiento, traslados y pasajes aéreos  (10000 USD).


                    


Lo que obtienes, tus recompensas!

Hemos elaborado varias formatos y tipos de recompensas! Todas son especiales y esperamos que te identifiques con alguna! Estamos abiertos a escuchar tus sugerencias!

Sí has leído hasta aquí, quizás esto también te interese!

Comenzamos a navegar a los 8 años en Optimist (barco para una persona), en donde comienzan a navegar los niños, hasta los 15 años. Poco a poco le fuimos tomando gusto a las competencias y optamos por comenzar a navegar en Snipe (barco de a dos), primero separados y luego juntos. De allí  provienen nuestros mayores logros: Pablo ha ganado dos Medallas Panamericanas: plata en 2007 y bronce en 2011 y fue 3ero. en el mundial de Japón del 2005. Mariana junto a su hermana, fue bi-campeoana mundial femenina en 2004 y 2006 y 4 veces campeona sudamericana femenina. Juntos, hemos obtenido los títulos de campeones sudamericanos categoría mixto en Paraguay 2002,  campeones nacionales dos veces, 3er. puesto  en el campeonato sudamericano 2013 y fuimos medalla de Oro en los juegos playa de Venezuela 2014. Ambos hemos ganado el premio al mejor deportista uruguayo, 2005 Mariana y en 2008 Pablo, entregado por el Comité Olímpico Uruguayo. 

Pablo ha navegado en más de 25 barcos diferentes y ha conseguido títulos nacionales, sudamericanos y mundiales en más de 15 embarcaciones. Además a impulsado el desarrollo del Yachting en Uruguay a través del rol de entrenador apoyando proyectos nacionales e internacionales de diferentes clases náuticas como Optimist y Snipe.

Además de competir, Mariana dedicó parte de su tiempo a ser instructora de Vela, dando clases a adolescentes y adultos en el Yacht Club Punta del Este y tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar para el Royal Hamilton Amateur Dinghy Yacht Club, en Bermuda.

También hemos alcanzado algunos logros en Nacra 17, en el sudamericano Brasil 2013 y Juegos Playa de Venezuela 2014, conseguimos dos terceros puestos. Hoy con la agenda hasta el 2016 planificada buscamos lograr la clasificación a los Juegos Olímpicos de Río 2016 en Aarhus 2015 (Dinamarca).

Riesgos y desafíos

La Campaña Olímpica es un desafió muy grande, siendo 20 el cupo de países que pueden participar en los Juegos Olímpicos en nuestra categoría. Brasil por ser país organizador ya tiene su lugar dentro de los 20, por lo que restan 19 lugares a disputar. Para lograr representar a nuestro país en RÍO 2016 tenemos que conseguir uno de los 19 cupos para URUGUAY. El formato de clasificación se reparte en 3 Campeonatos diferentes,  la primer fase de clasificación fue en Santander en Setiembre de 2014 en Mundial de todas la clases Olímpicas de Vela, en el cual se repartieron los primeros 10 cupos, la próxima etapa de clasificación es en julio 2015 en el mundial de Aarhus (Dinamarca), en el cual se reparten 3 plazas mas.

Luego restarán 6 cupos más, los cuales se reparten por región y a Sudamérica le corresponde un de ellos, el cual se disputara en enero del 2016 en MIAMI, USA.

Pensando en el peor escenario, nuestro mayor riesgo es el de no obtener el cupo para los Juegos Olímpicos. Pero siendo objetivos y consecuentes con nuestros planes de entrenamiento, tal como lo venimos haciendo hasta ahora, creemos en que la clasificación y ese cupo para Uruguay está cada vez más cerca!

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Sabemos que no esta al alcance de todos colaborar en forma económica, pero existen otras formas en las que nos puedes ayudar... te agradecemos por compartir nuestro proyecto y hacerlo eco!

GRACIAS POR TU APOYO!

Sopla con nosotros, juntos llegamos!


Who are we and what is our campaign about?  

We are Mariana Foglia (32, left picture) and Pablo Defazio (33, right picture).  Our goal is to qualify for the Rio 2016 Olympic Games competing in sailing in the class Nacra 17.  The Nacra 17 class is a catamaranwith 3 sailsand has a mixed category (male and female), chosen as an Olympic class in 2012. We have enjoyed sailing since we were children, and today this sport is 100% Integrated into our life style. This Olympic campaign that we are undertaking consists of 4 years (2013-2016).  Uncertainties, insecurities, are we planning well or badly? 
These were questions we used to ask ourselves daily. Over time we realized that 
what pushes us into this dream is that we believe in ourselves and we believe in each other. We are confident that we will make it!


What do we need?

The annual campaign being held in 2015, will cost approximately $ 95,000 (US Dollars).  To date we have invested more than US$ 100,000 in the purchase of two boats (one for training in Uruguay and the other to train in Europe); 5 trips to Europe and 3 to Brazil; plus the purchase of boat structure materials (if you want to learn more about our budget, visit our web site at http://www.nacra17uru.com).  Due to the above expenditures, our financial resources have decreased, and we are looking to raise funds in order to continue participating in training and in the 2015 international competitions.  To achieve our goal, we need to buy Nacra 17 equipment, hire a coach and pay for travel for the competitions. We are planning to raise  US$ 21,000.

Details of the target amount: US$ 21,000

Equipment:

Set of sails: Spinnaker ($ 1,500), Jib ($ 1,000) and a mainsail ($ 2,500) as shown in the drawing below.

Coach: Airline tickets and lodging ($ 6,000)

Regattas and Training: Regatta Fees, lodging, airline tickets and other traveling expenses ($10,000)

                        

The rewards!

We have developed many types of rewards! All are special and we hope 
that you identify with someof ! We are open to your suggestions!

If you have read this far, you may also like the following:

Pablo has sailed in over 25 different boats and has won national, South American and world titles in more than 15 boats.  He has also motivated the development of Yachting in Uruguay through coaching and his support of national and international campaigns of different saling classes like Optimist and Snipe.

In addition to competing, Mariana been a sailing instructor teaching adolescents and adults at the Yacht Club Punta del Este and at the Royal Hamilton Amateur Dinghy Yacht Club in Bermuda.

In terms of the Nacra 17, we have reached many of our goals to date: third places, in each of the 2013 South American Games in Brasil, and the 2014 Venezuelan Beach Games. Today, with the 2015-2016 competition agenda planned we are aiming to classify for the 2016 Olympic games in Rio at the Nacra 17 World Championships in Aarhus, Denmark in July.


Risk and Challenges

Our Olympic Campaign is a big challenge! Only 20 countries are eligible to participate in the Olympics Rio 2016 in our category. The organizing country (Brazil) is already qualified so only 19 countries are left. In order to qualify our country for Rio 2016, we need to obtain one of the 19 places for URUGUAY. The qualifying format is divided into 3 different championships. The first was in Santander in September 2014 atthe Worlds of all Olympic sailing classes, where the first 10 places were awarded.  The next 3 placeswill beawarded at the Nacra 17 World Championship in Aarhus. The remaining 6 places will be divided by region and South America is one of them; this competition will be held in January 2016 in Miami, USA.
Thinking of the worst scenario, our greatest risk is not being awarded the place for the Olympics. However, by being consistent with our objectives and training plans, as we have done so far, we believe that the classification and Uruguay's place at the Games is getting closer and increasingly possible!


Other ways to help us

We know that is not always possible to collaborate economically, but there are other ways you can help us! Thank you for sharing via Facebook, Twitter, G+1 or write apositive comment on our campaign. Thanks for helping us spread the word!

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Blow with us!

entrenador apoyando proyectos nacionales e internacionales de diferentes clases
náuticas como Optimist y Snipe.
Además
de competir, Mariana dedicó parte de su tiempo a ser instructora de Vela, dando clases a adolescentes y adultos en el Yacht Club Punta del Este y tuvo la
oportunidad de trabajar para el Royal Hamilton Amateur Dinghy Yacht Club, en
Bermuda.
También hemos alcanzado algunos logros en Nacra 17, en el sudamericano Brasil 2013 y Juegos Playa de Venezuela 2014, conseguimos dos
terceros puestos. Hoy con la agenda hasta el 2016 planificada buscamos lograr
la clasificación a los Juegos Olímpicos de Río 2016 en Aarhus 2015 (Dinamarca).

Riesgos
y desafíos
La
Campaña Olímpica es un desafió muy grande, siendo 20 el cupo de países que pueden participar en los Juegos Olímpicos en nuestra categoría. Brasil por ser país
organizador ya tiene su lugar dentro de los 20, por lo que restan 19 lugares a disputar. Para lograr representar a nuestro país en RÍO 2016
tenemos que conseguir uno de los 19 cupos para URUGUAY. El formato de clasificación se reparte en 3
Campeonatos diferentes,  la primer fase de clasificación fue en Santander en Setiembre
de 2014 en Mundial de todas la clases Olímpicas de Vela, en el cual se
repartieron los primeros 10 cupos, la próxima etapa de clasificación es en julio 2015 en el mundial de Aarhus (Dinamarca), en el cual se reparten 3 plazas mas.
Luego
restarán 6 cupos más, los cuales se reparten por región y a Sudamérica le
corresponde un de ellos, el cual se disputara en enero del 2016 en MIAMI, USA. 
Pensando en el peor escenario, nuestro
mayor riesgo es el de no obtener
el cupo para los Juegos Olímpicos. Pero siendo objetivos y consecuentes con nuestros
planes de entrenamiento, tal como lo venimos haciendo hasta ahora, creemos en
que la clasificación y ese cupo para Uruguay está cada vez más cerca!


Otras
formas en las que puedes ayudar
Sabemos
que no esta al alcance de todos colaborar en forma económica, pero existen otras formas en las que nos puedes ayudar... te agradecemos por compartir nuestro proyecto y hacerlo eco!
GRACIAS
POR TU APOYO!
Sopla con nosotros, juntos llegamos!





Who are we and what is our campaign about?  

We are Mariana Foglia (32, left picture) and Pablo Defazio (33, right picture).  Our goal is to qualify for the Rio 2016 Olympic Games competing in sailing in the class Nacra 17.  The Nacra 17 class is a catamaranwith 3 sailsand has a mixed category (male and female), chosen as an Olympic class in 2012. We have enjoyed sailing since we were children, and today this sport is 100% Integrated into our life style. This Olympic campaign that we are undertaking consists of 4 years (2013-2016).  Uncertainties, insecurities, are we planning well or badly? These were questions we used to ask ourselves daily. Over time we realized that what pushes us into this dream is that we believe in ourselves and we believe in each other. We are confident that we will make it!


What do we need?
The annual campaign being held in 2015, will cost approximately $ 95,000 (US Dollars).  To date we have invested more than US$ 100,000 in the purchase of two boats (one for training in Uruguay and the other to train in Europe); 5 trips to Europe and 3 to Brazil; plus the purchase of boat structure materials (if you want to learn more about our budget, visit our web site at http://www.nacra17uru.com).  Due to the above expenditures, our financial resources have decreased, and we are looking to raise funds in order to continue participating in training and in the 2015 international competitions.  To achieve our goal, we need to buy Nacra 17 equipment, hire a coach and pay for travel for the competitions. We are planning to raise  US$ 21,000.
Details of the target amount: US$ 21,000
Equipment:
Set of sails: Spinnaker ($ 1,500), Jib ($ 1,000) and a mainsail ($ 2,500) as shown in the drawing below.
Coach: Airline tickets and lodging ($ 6,000)Regattas and Training: Regatta Fees, lodging, airline tickets and other traveling expenses ($10,000)
                        

The rewards!We have developed many types of rewards! All are special and we hope that you identify with someof ! We are open to your suggestions!


If you have read this far, you may also like the following:

Pablo has sailed in over 25 different boats and has won national, South American and world titles in more than 15 boats.  He has also motivated the development of Yachting in Uruguay through coaching and his support of national and international campaigns of different saling classes like Optimist and Snipe.In addition to competing, Mariana been a sailing instructor teaching adolescents and adults at the Yacht Club Punta del Este and at the Royal Hamilton Amateur Dinghy Yacht Club in Bermuda.In terms of the Nacra 17, we have reached many of our goals to date: third places, in each of the 2013 South American Games in Brasil, and the 2014 Venezuelan Beach Games. Today, with the 2015-2016 competition agenda planned we are aiming to classify for the 2016 Olympic games in Rio at the Nacra 17 World Championships in Aarhus, Denmark in July.


Risk and Challenges
Our Olympic Campaign is a big challenge! Only 20 countries are eligible to participate in the Olympics Rio 2016 in our category. The organizing country (Brazil) is already qualified so only 19 countries are left. In order to qualify our country for Rio 2016, we need to obtain one of the 19 places for URUGUAY. The qualifying format is divided into 3 different championships. The first was in Santander in September 2014 atthe Worlds of all Olympic sailing classes, where the first 10 places were awarded.  The next 3 placeswill beawarded at the Nacra 17 World Championship in Aarhus. The remaining 6 places will be divided by region and South America is one of them; this competition will be held in January 2016 in Miami, USA.Thinking of the worst scenario, our greatest risk is not being awarded the place for the Olympics. However, by being consistent with our objectives and training plans, as we have done so far, we believe that the classification and Uruguay's place at the Games is getting closer and increasingly possible!




Other ways to help us
We know that is not always possible to collaborate economically, but there are other ways you can help us! Thank you for sharing via Facebook, Twitter, G+1 or write apositive comment on our campaign. Thanks for helping us spread the word! 

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
Blow with us! 
 a>

story:
Update No#1: Read our free Prisonhood Comic now - Read Me!

 

Welcome to our PRISONHOOD campaign page! Thanks for taking the time to learn more about us and this project. My name is Robert Hayes. I am founder and CEO of Fei Hu Interactive. We have been developing PRISONHOOD for many months now with the aim to entertain and delight as many folks as we possibly can.

In this process, there have been good days and bad days. And now, we are incredibly close to delivering a truly unique and fantastic (game) experience to folks all over the world. I am so proud of what we have been able to achieve. But to make our vision a viable long-term proposition, I ask for your support. With your help, we will be able to complete our development efforts; maintain and support the game once it has launched; and market the game to folks worldwide. The information below is intended to tell more about our plans. I hope you find it informative and helpful as you consider extending your support to us.

PRISONHOOD is a social free-to-play game that blends role playing game (RPG) elements with task management and mini-games all inspired by the daily challenges of life in prison. PRISONHOOD introduces players to the ruthless world of prison life, complete with edgy challenges, and ruthless characters set in a wickedly fun cartoon style environment. PRISONHOOD features a unique ‘prison-theme’ game setting and challenges you to build your reputation from rookie to lifer. Select from four cool and stylish avatars as you recruit, extort, brawl, buy, sell, and steal your way through over thirty locations as you strive to reach the top.

PRISONHOOD features over ninety edgy and fun in-game tasks along with three topical yet casual mini-games. The game includes many social features that let you brawl against friend or foe in the “Dog Pound”, and bet against friend or foe in “The Ring”, and if you cannot beat them, then join them by sharing in-game items.

PRISONHOOD will be available on iPhone, iPad and Android devices as well as Facebook. The game will also be available in multiple languages, including English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, and simplified Chinese. PRISONHOOD is scheduled to debut in April 2013.

You are a bad guy. You’re a guilty guy. And now you’re locked-up for 15-plus years with little chance of parole. Sure, you can try to attribute your social deviance to an unfortunate upbringing. You know the story: a single-working mother; an absent father; and stuck in a low-income housing project on the wrong-side of town. But this was not your story. You come from an ordinary yet loving and supportive middle-class family. By all accounts, you had the foundations to distinguish right-from-wrong and good-from-bad. Sometime between surviving high school and a series of bad decisions, you found yourself on the wrong-side of the law. It did not need to go this way for you; but it did. Eventually, the law caught-up to you. And it was a swift process from hands behind-your-head to we find the defendant guilty on all counts. This is the story of PRISONHOOD. You enter prison as a rookie. And somehow-someway, you need to emerge as a boss. But you’re smart. You understand the rules of the game. You know full-well that you need to comply with the rules and routines established by the correctional system. However, you also know what you need to do in order to survive and maximize your power within the prison hierarchy.   

In PRISONHOOD, you climb through the ranks with an ultimate objective of maximizing your reputation. And in prison, reputation defines who you are and where you stand within the hierarchy.  But reputation is an earned commodity. And you earn reputation by demonstrating to your peers your level of power, which takes many forms, including physical, psychological, economic, and more. But against this backdrop, you’re still a prisoner who needs to live by the rules and routines that govern the prison – but even this aspect of prison life helps your reputation, albeit modestly. This is the high-level challenge structure of PRISONHOOD. You will face the challenges by completing a combination tasks, mini-games and intense social interactions. And when you complete the specified line-up activities, you advance to the next level and earn rewards, including rank, reputation, cash, chips, and more. PRISONHOOD features 25 levels; over 90 prison-themed tasks; 3 topical yet casual mini-games; 30 different prison facilities; 4 different avatars to choose from; and over 30 different inmate and prison guard NPCs. In PRISONHOOD, reputation has a heavy price!

Prisonhood includes many appealing features that we know you will love, below is just a sample of what you will be able to enjoy in the full game:

- Unique prison-theme and setting
- Clever and in-depth causal game featuring RPG elements
- Select from 4 cool and stylish avatars
- Complete more than 90 topical and edgy in-game tasks
- Play 3 fun mini-games featuring intuitive and casual game mechanics
- Fight against friend or foe in an outright brawl in the Dog Pound
- Enter The Ring and bet against friends where it’s bicep-to-bicep in high-stakes arm wrestling
- Recruit and manage your restless yet useful prison gang

 
 

The development team at Fei Hu are gamers, and are working tirelessly to deliver one of the most unique and engaging social free to play games that has ever been developed. PRISONHOOD has found its inspiration in the shady side of prison life and cleverly incorporates the social experience with in-game challenges, task management, distinctive mini-games and exciting PVP elements. Players in PRISONHOOD will experience life behind bars through a large range of diverse locations, while completing over 90 tasks as they progress through the ranks from rookie to lifer.

PRISONHOOD blends role-playing; social and casual gaming elements in a cartoon style to create a unique game that we believe will appeal to core and casual players.

We love PRISONHOOD and we hope you will to.

 

Fei Hu Interactive is an independent developer and publisher of mobile and social games with offices in Hong Kong and Beijing. Founded in 2012, Fei Hu Interactive was set-up by industry veterans Robert Hayes and Simon Slee. Robert is the CEO of Fei Hu Interactive. Prior to founding Fei Hu Interactive, Robert joined Glu Mobile (NASDAQ: GLUU) in 2004 where he served as Managing Director, Asia-Pacific and Vice President, Corporate Development. Simon is the Vice President of Publishing at Fei Hu Interactive. Prior to joining Fei Hu Interactive, Simon was CEO of Schmoo Entertainment. At Schmoo, Simon published mobile games in the Asia-Pacific region for leading global publishers, including Glu Mobile (NASDAQ: GLUU) and Gamehouse (NASDAQ: RNWK).

For more information on Fei Hu Interactive, you can visit us at www.feihuinteractive.com


Our goal is to raise US$50,000 – with a stretch goal of US$100,000. We plan to use the proceeds from your support in the following ways:

- Development of PRISONHOOD on Android: We are nearly finished with the iOS version of PRISONHOOD; however we plan to bring PRISONHOOD to Android devices as well. To do this, we need to incur additional engineering and testing costs. It’s not rocket science, but it takes time and resources to get it done.        
 
- Development of PRISONHOOD on Facebook: Our cross-platform strategy is intended to maximize awareness, discovery, reach, and relevance. For this reason, we aim to go beyond just mobile and deploy PRISONHOOD on Facebook. To do this, we need to invest in supplemental engineering and art resources.  
 
- First scheduled update of PRISONHOOD after the launch of the game: The clock really starts once we launch PRISONHOOD. Fans will demand new features as well as discover issues that need to be fixed. We need to be prepared. In our first update, we plan to design and implement new levels and features; introduce new and colorful characters; and repair any identified and/or reported issues and bugs. We plan to make our first update to PRISONHOOD within the first four weeks of launch.
 
- Establishment of a product services infrastructure: Beyond the first scheduled update of PRISONHOOD, we plan to set-up and maintain a dedicated product services team who will manage PRISONHOOD from a post-production point-of-view. This team’s primary objective is to add more value to PRISONHOOD (through new features, levels, characters, etc.) as well as to provide ongoing maintenance services.

We are totally excited about PRISONHOOD. Inspired by the rise of prison related references in popular culture, we believe PRISONHOOD provides an excellent backdrop to develop fun gameplay, colorful characters, topical narrative, and endless dramatizations and exaggerations of prison life. Moreover, we believe PRISONHOOD has obvious global appeal in the sense that prison is a universal concept in which consumer expectations and perceptions are largely aligned.

Funding PRISONHOOD is a unique opportunity for anyone with an interest in bringing a game (and brand) to life. We want you to be part of this and to witness PRISONHOOD turn from imagination into reality. Going forward, we aim to turn PRISONHOOD into a viable global intellectual property – which means there will be more from PRISONHOOD in the future. Accordingly, your support means you are part of something truly grand.



Thank you so much for visiting our project. We truly appreciate your consideration. We hope you share our enthusiasm for PRISONHOOD. And we hope you find PRISONHOOD deserving of your support. No matter what level, your support counts, and we are grateful for your support. If you have any questions or comments about us or PRISONHOOD, please feel free to contact us anytime.
