story:
24.06.2014. update:
Dear Backers, Supporters and Everyone!

I regret to announce that today we close down the crowdfunding campaign of Novus Mundus. The campaign have not been collected enough funds yet so there is no sense continuing it. In the next days we will start the negotiations with our backers about refunding. Due to technical issues the campaign will be still live for 11 more days, but we do not accept funds anymore.

Once again I would like to say thank you for all of our backers and supporters, we really appreciate your support!

Best Regards

Attila

26.05.2014. update:

Hello Everyone!

A few of you asked if we could show you a graphic about the final version of the game. Well we worked hard all last week to show you the final graphics and interface of the game! We hope you’ll like it! :-)


Novus Mundus - Conquest of the New World is a Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG) set in the era from the colonization till the Wild West.
The game is basically a real time Role Playing Game (RPG) game but has many strategic elements and its world is dynamic, it is continuously developing with the passage of time. Furthermore you can decide who you want to be and live as an Indigenous or a settler, you can develop and protect your own village, or if you are more ambitious you can attack and conquer other villages and towns.
In Novus Mundus certain possible scenarios are outlined (e.g. technical and historical developments) but at the end of the day it depends on the players where the world of Novus Mundus is going static. 



Some key features in the game:

  • Fully realistic environment: vulnerable objects (e.g. buildings can be destroyed and built either), drainable resources (mines, forests, animals), dynamic terrain that affects visibility, speed, moral and health.
  • Complex society: if you are a leader your decisions affects other players and vice versa the players activities affects the leaders position.
  • The game is continuously changing: periods with full of action and peaceful times are varying during the game according to players’ behaviour. 
Novus Mundus is an open world and has its own declared history which is partly overlapped by our world’s history. In the beginning only one ethnic group is known, that is the Native Americans.
A few remarkable events are highlighted in Novus Mundus’s history. These events can be discovered one by one by the players (e.g. treasure of the Knights Templar, red haired native american tribe, El Dorado, Inca Gold, The Fountain of Youth, Nazca Lines, mystery of Machu Picchu, etc.).

In the beginning of the game a few villages and cities of the Aztec, of the Inca and the Maya Empires exist, but these tribes are far away from the starting points.
One of the key features of Novus Mundus is that it is a fully open world (with sandbox elements) without restrictions. You can go wherever and do whatever you want.


Each character has a detailed description of their abilities and attributes, which are the following: health, ethics, energy, level of character, experience, battle experience, profession and level of profession, speed, hunger, skills (e.g. sneaking), tribe or settlement rank, etc..

Every character has a base camp where they live and where they are reborn in case of death. In the beginning the players can choose their names, which tribe they would like to belong to and generate a look (head, face painting, hair, etc.) but there will be an option for players to upload their own photos and ones that are made by a graphic designer of Novus Mundus.

The players can also choose from the following professions: fisherman, hunter, chef, shaman, gunsmith, craftsman, forester, ostler, thief, hit man, spy, sharpshooter, etc.

Finally, the players can set whether they would like to be a beginner or an advanced player. This setting affects their birthplace.

If they choose beginner level, the players will be born in a camp where they will be guided through the basics of the game. If they choose to be born as an advanced player, they will be born in a higher level camp where they immediately become a fully contributing resident of the camp. From there begins the game!

A newborn player has a loin-cloth, a minimum set of tools (depending on the chosen profession) and a minimum amount of shells. Shells function as money between Native Americans in the first phase of the game, later when the pioneers arrive, this will change.
All characters must eat and have rest (these can be modified and extruded by infusion of herbs, totems or shaman magic).

Practically, a player can do anything with his character that is why Novus Mundus called a totally free and realistic world. But first it is suggested that characters work something to earn shells, or prepare something that can be sold. Work can be anything based on the chosen profession, e.g. hunting, fishing, etc.
By the time the players earn enough shells to buy weapons and any other stuff, they can start the adventures and develop their characters!

Basically, the Indians life is either about battles and honour or about peaceful living in harmony. In Novus Mundus you have the opportunity for both,
it’s up to you!

In the game you can build your own camp, fulfill executive positions (e.g. chieftain, second in command, shaman, soul rider, first hunter, leader of women, shaman mate, scout, grey haired wise chieftain, best warrior title, etc.), start wars, discover new areas or maintain peaceful diplomatic relationships (e.g. commercial agreements).

The game is fully realistic, so every object in Novus Mundus depreciates with time, even animals gets older slowly. The characters move, fight, act in real time, which gives the opportunity to use tactical elements, e.g. an observer can be sent to the hill to view further whilst the others are hiding at the bottom of the hill ready to attack. Speed of moving and visibility is realistic, too. Character speed can be developed and increased with magic during the game. Visibility is reduced when you are moving in a forest (you cannot see other parts of the map) and also dynamic elements of the game can have other effects (Fog Of War).


One of the unique features of Novus Mundus is non-player character (NPC) soldiers. Besides active players, NPC soldiers are part of the game, you can hire them and they protect your camp or attack hostile camps according to your commands.

Adventures are like mini games in Novus Mundus, which makes it more interesting and colorful. According to the type of your character and your level, you can participate in and solve different adventures like historical explorations where you can discover secret places, historical events and treasures (e.g. El Dorado, Inca Gold, The Fountain of Youth, Nazca Lines, mystery of Machu Picchu, villages and cities of Aztec, Inca and Maya empires).


Registration and usage of Novus Mundus will be free but there will be a wide range of extra functions in the game that will be available for credits:

  • Magic effects
  • NPC guards and NPC soldiers
  • Executive positions
  • Adventures
  • Uploading your own photo as avatar
  • Uploading your own photo made by graphic designer of Novus Mundus
  • Buying unique weapons and objects
  • Internal market
  • Etc.

As I wrote above, time is passing in Novus Mundus and there is a continuous technical and historical development that makes the game more exciting. Here you can see the outline of the scenarios of Novus Mundus:

1. Life or death scenario – Era of the Native Americans:
In the first period of Novus Mundus, Indigenous rule the world, you can act like them, work, fund a new camp, become a chieftain, make war, take part in adventures, etc.

2. City management and adventures scenario – Arrival of the Settlers (pioneers):
In the second period of the game, suddenly the settlers arrive from the Old World. A few characters of the game will change their roles and find themselves on the boats of the settlers. Then they arrive in the New World and start to discover and colonize it. This event will be a surprise for Native Americans, the date of the arrival will not be revealed to them. In the beginning the settlers will have only very little amount of everything so they have to act as friends of the natives, but after a while conflicts will appear and wars can begin or not. It depends on the habits and actions of the players! (e.g. during the test games the inhabitants of a Portugal village were chased back to the sea and their main city was destroyed by natives).


3. Captain scenario – Appearance of the Pirates:
Owning a ship will widen the opportunities of the players enormously. From this point, of the game ships will be high-lighted elements of Novus Mundus. As a consequence, a new life style and group will appear, they are the pirates. Playing as a pirate will be optional for every player.

4. Strategic scenario – Formation of Regular forces and War of Independence:
As a result of development, the first capital will be formed from where the regular forces can be controlled and the first fortresses appear. The characters can join the army (or navy), and become an officer. The taxes levied by the old country are getting stifling so the War of Independence is about to happen and new ethnical groups appear from Asia and Africa.

5. Forts and duels scenario – Wild West:
Culmination of the game will be the era of the Wild West. At this time serious and bloody battles can happen between fortresses and regular forces. Due to new technologies (e.g. Colt) a possible scenario is the decline of Native Americans.

One of the key features of the game is that you can shape the history of the world of Novus Mundus. Your decisions’ impacts are not limited to the life of your character, if you are in an executive position (e.g. chieftain, shaman, viceroy, governor, mayor, general, pirate, admiral,  seriff, etc.) you can change the course of history.

A basic version of Novus Mundus has been successfully tested in a closed small group. The concept, the main functions and the dynamics of the game have been tried out and it worked successfully. 


Based on this tests and my passion for RPG and strategy games I am planning to develop the final and professional version of Novus Mundus with all the mentioned functions.

For this, nearly every elements of the game have to be re-developed on a professional level (the game engine, the graphics, the characters, etc.) and that is why I need your help. I would like to finalize Novus Mundus. In exchange for contributions I can offer partly exclusive rewards available just on Indiegogo, and partly credits that can be cashed for extra functions (magic effects, NPCs, etc.) in the final version of Novus Mundus.


My aim is to create the best online RPG game ever. I know it is very ambitious but I think that keeping the standards and aiming high can create pretty good results. So if you have any ideas, tips that can be built in the game and increase the experience do not hesitate to send it to me! If it is good and fits in the world of Novus Mundus I will definitely use it during the development phase of the game. Of course, on the new website of the game all contributors will be acknowledged.

My name is Attila Koncsik and I am the founder and leader of Epic Online Softwares Ltd., a Hungary based independent game developer company.
My passion for computer games started a long time ago. My favorite games are: Oblivion, Skyrim, Civilization 4, and some new game with open world and sandbox mode. I created my first RPG mod about 25 years ago and have developed different game since then. The last was Republik (a forum RPG with some exclusive website automatism), which is like the popular Global Politics forum game, where the players lead a modern nation. This game was fully created by me and a friend. Besides Republik, I created several RPG modifications (AD&D, Magus) and I have always been an RPG enthusiast.

I love games that form a fully open world and give players freedom, to do whatever they want. This is why I created Novus Mundus to work like this, to give the best experience for the players. I hope my dreams come true and I can fully develop Novus Mundus and give the opportunity for game enthusiast like me to play in a fully open world, in the era of native tribes, the Wild West, and to form history as they want to.

I think my 25 years of experience in gaming and 10 years of experience in creating online games makes it possible to create an unforgettable game experience for you!

The goal of the campaign is enough to develop the first phase of Novus Mundus, the age of Indigenous people. As I wrote above this would be the first step but the development wouldn’t stop then and all the mentioned phases would be developed if you could help and support the project. You can see below the planned milestones and their financial implication. By reaching the below mentioned stretch goals I could increase the game to next level.


* A limited selection of magic effects would be part of the first phase of Novus Mundus, but the whole selection of magic effects could only be developed at this stretch goal.
** NPC soldiers with limited functions would be part of the first phase of Novus Mundus, but the complete functions of NPC soldiers could only be developed at this stretch goal.

When the campaign will reach to develop the first phase of Novus Mundus, then we’ll finish the goals in this times:

  • Native Americans: 8 months from the campaign end
  • Magics: 9 months from the campaign end
  • NPC soldiers: 10 months from the campaign end
  • Settlers (pioneers): 11 months from the campaign end
  • Other platforms: 13 months from the campaign end
  • Adventures: 15 months from the campaign end
  • Pirates, shipping: 18 months from the campaign end
  • Regular forces: 19 months from the campaign end
  • War of Independence: 20 months from the campaign end
  • New ethnic groups: 21 months from the campaign end
  • Wild west: 23 months from the campaign end
When we reach the Adventures goal in the campaign, then the Wild West will arrive maximum 16 months, and if reach Wild West goal, then the Wild West will arrive about only 12-14 months.

We've seen so many times how over-funded projects got delayed far beyond their estimated schedule. I don't want to be one of them. These goals are tailored both to evolve the game further into its perfected form and to allow you to deepen into the world of Native Americans, settlers, pirates and the Wild West!

Refer and WIN!


I have a special reward for the Number 1. referring user!


  1. Grab your customized link following the instructions below.
  2. Share your link on a social media site (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc.), in an e-mail, blog or anywhere you want and encourage everyone to participate in the Indiegogo campaign of Novus Mundus.
  3. At the end of the campaign I will summarize the amount of contributions that I receive via referrals and the one who generated the most will get the following special reward:
  • Indiegogo Thank you page,
  • Novus Mundus wallpaper with a chosen character (e.g. chieftain, shaman, soulrider, etc.),
  • developer diaries (report about the development at every milestone, behind the scene info)
  • uploading unique or a graphic made photo as an avatar
  • exclusive access to beta test of the game
  • opportunity to join the settlers before public start
  • exclusive self-designed equipment in Novus Mundus (clothes or weapon)
  • 50 credit that can be cashed for magic effects in the game
  • If you have already backed my project, first I would say thank you :) and secondly your reward will be upgraded to The chosen One’s dream.
How to track your Novus Mundus referrals with Indiegogo:

  • Login to your Indiegogo account.
  • Use the custom link “Share this campaign” underneath the campaign video.
  • Share this link on Facebook, Twitter, e-mail, etc. with anyone who might be interested in Novus Mundus.
  • Track referrals and receive the special reward if you were the one who referred the most contributions!

Created by

Epic Online Softwares Ltd.
story_txt:
24.06.2014. update:Dear Backers, Supporters and Everyone!
I regret to announce that today we close down the
crowdfunding campaign of Novus Mundus. The campaign have not been collected
enough funds yet so there is no sense continuing it. In the next days we will
start the negotiations with our backers about refunding. Due to technical
issues the campaign will be still live for 11 more days, but we do not accept
funds anymore.
Once again I would like to say thank you for all of
our backers and supporters, we really appreciate your support!
Best Regards
Attila26.05.2014. update:Hello Everyone!A few of you asked if we could show you a graphic about the final version of the game. Well we worked hard all last week to show you the final graphics and interface of the game! We hope you’ll like it! :-)Novus Mundus - Conquest of the New World is a Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG) set in the era from the colonization till the Wild West. 
The game is basically a real time Role Playing Game (RPG) game but has many strategic elements and its world is dynamic, it is continuously developing with the passage of time. Furthermore you can decide who you want to be and live as an Indigenous or a settler, you can develop and protect your own village, or if you are more ambitious you can attack and conquer other villages and towns. 
In Novus Mundus certain possible scenarios are outlined (e.g. technical and historical developments) but at the end of the day it depends on the players where the world of Novus Mundus is going static. Some key features in the game:
Fully realistic environment: vulnerable objects (e.g. buildings can be destroyed and built either), drainable resources (mines, forests, animals), dynamic terrain that affects visibility, speed, moral and health.

Complex society: if you are a leader your decisions affects other players and vice versa the players activities affects the leaders position.

The game is continuously changing: periods with full of action and peaceful times are varying during the game according to players’ behaviour. 

Novus Mundus is an open world and has its own declared history which is partly overlapped by our world’s history. In the beginning only one ethnic group is known, that is the Native Americans. 
A few remarkable events are highlighted in Novus Mundus’s history. These events can be discovered one by one by the players (e.g. treasure of the Knights Templar, red haired native american tribe, El Dorado, Inca Gold, The Fountain of Youth, Nazca Lines, mystery of Machu Picchu, etc.). 
In the beginning of the game a few villages and cities of the Aztec, of the Inca and the Maya Empires exist, but these tribes are far away from the starting points.One of the key features of Novus Mundus is that it is a fully open world (with sandbox elements) without restrictions. You can go wherever and do whatever you want.Each character has a detailed description of their abilities and attributes, which are the following: health, ethics, energy, level of character, experience, battle experience, profession and level of profession, speed, hunger, skills (e.g. sneaking), tribe or settlement rank, etc.. 
Every character has a base camp where they live and where they are reborn in case of death. In the beginning the players can choose their names, which tribe they would like to belong to and generate a look (head, face painting, hair, etc.) but there will be an option for players to upload their own photos and ones that are made by a graphic designer of Novus Mundus. 
The players can also choose from the following professions: fisherman, hunter, chef, shaman, gunsmith, craftsman, forester, ostler, thief, hit man, spy, sharpshooter, etc.
Finally, the players can set whether they would like to be a beginner or an advanced player. This setting affects their birthplace.
If they choose beginner level, the players will be born in a camp where they will be guided through the basics of the game. If they choose to be born as an advanced player, they will be born in a higher level camp where they immediately become a fully contributing resident of the camp. From there begins the game!A newborn player has a loin-cloth, a minimum set of tools (depending on the chosen profession) and a minimum amount of shells. Shells function as money between Native Americans in the first phase of the game, later when the pioneers arrive, this will change. 
All characters must eat and have rest (these can be modified and extruded by infusion of herbs, totems or shaman magic).
Practically, a player can do anything with his character that is why Novus Mundus called a totally free and realistic world. But first it is suggested that characters work something to earn shells, or prepare something that can be sold. Work can be anything based on the chosen profession, e.g. hunting, fishing, etc. 
By the time the players earn enough shells to buy weapons and any other stuff, they can start the adventures and develop their characters!Basically, the Indians life is either about battles and honour or about peaceful living in harmony. In Novus Mundus you have the opportunity for both,it’s up to you! 


In the game you can build your own camp, fulfill executive positions (e.g. chieftain, second in command, shaman, soul rider, first hunter, leader of women, shaman mate, scout, grey haired wise chieftain, best warrior title, etc.), start wars, discover new areas or maintain peaceful diplomatic relationships (e.g. commercial agreements).
The game is fully realistic, so every object in Novus Mundus depreciates with time, even animals gets older slowly. The characters move, fight, act in real time, which gives the opportunity to use tactical elements, e.g. an observer can be sent to the hill to view further whilst the others are hiding at the bottom of the hill ready to attack. Speed of moving and visibility is realistic, too. Character speed can be developed and increased with magic during the game. Visibility is reduced when you are moving in a forest (you cannot see other parts of the map) and also dynamic elements of the game can have other effects (Fog Of War).One of the unique features of Novus Mundus is non-player character (NPC) soldiers. Besides active players, NPC soldiers are part of the game, you can hire them and they protect your camp or attack hostile camps according to your commands.
Adventures are like mini games in Novus Mundus, which makes it more interesting and colorful. According to the type of your character and your level, you can participate in and solve different adventures like historical explorations where you can discover secret places, historical events and treasures (e.g. El Dorado, Inca Gold, The Fountain of Youth, Nazca Lines, mystery of Machu Picchu, villages and cities of Aztec, Inca and Maya empires).Registration and usage of Novus Mundus will be free but there will be a wide range of extra functions in the game that will be available for credits:

Magic effects


NPC guards and NPC soldiers


Executive positions


Adventures


Uploading your own photo as avatar


Uploading your own photo made by graphic designer of Novus Mundus


Buying unique weapons and objects


Internal market


Etc.

As I wrote above, time is passing in Novus Mundus and there is a continuous technical and historical development that makes the game more exciting. Here you can see the outline of the scenarios of Novus Mundus:
1. Life or death scenario – Era of the Native Americans: 
In the first period of Novus Mundus, Indigenous rule the world, you can act like them, work, fund a new camp, become a chieftain, make war, take part in adventures, etc.
2. City management and adventures scenario – Arrival of the Settlers (pioneers): 
In the second period of the game, suddenly the settlers arrive from the Old World. A few characters of the game will change their roles and find themselves on the boats of the settlers. Then they arrive in the New World and start to discover and colonize it. This event will be a surprise for Native Americans, the date of the arrival will not be revealed to them. In the beginning the settlers will have only very little amount of everything so they have to act as friends of the natives, but after a while conflicts will appear and wars can begin or not. It depends on the habits and actions of the players! (e.g. during the test games the inhabitants of a Portugal village were chased back to the sea and their main city was destroyed by natives).
3. Captain scenario – Appearance of the Pirates:
Owning a ship will widen the opportunities of the players enormously. From this point, of the game ships will be high-lighted elements of Novus Mundus. As a consequence, a new life style and group will appear, they are the pirates. Playing as a pirate will be optional for every player.
4. Strategic scenario – Formation of Regular forces and War of Independence: 
As a result of development, the first capital will be formed from where the regular forces can be controlled and the first fortresses appear. The characters can join the army (or navy), and become an officer. The taxes levied by the old country are getting stifling so the War of Independence is about to happen and new ethnical groups appear from Asia and Africa.
5. Forts and duels scenario – Wild West:
Culmination of the game will be the era of the Wild West. At this time serious and bloody battles can happen between fortresses and regular forces. Due to new technologies (e.g. Colt) a possible scenario is the decline of Native Americans.One of the key features of the game is that you can shape the history of the world of Novus Mundus. Your decisions’ impacts are not limited to the life of your character, if you are in an executive position (e.g. chieftain, shaman, viceroy, governor, mayor, general, pirate, admiral,  seriff, etc.) you can change the course of history.A basic version of Novus Mundus has been successfully tested in a closed small group. The concept, the main functions and the dynamics of the game have been tried out and it worked successfully. Based on this tests and my passion for RPG and strategy games I am planning to develop the final and professional version of Novus Mundus with all the mentioned functions. 
For this, nearly every elements of the game have to be re-developed on a professional level (the game engine, the graphics, the characters, etc.) and that is why I need your help. I would like to finalize Novus Mundus. In exchange for contributions I can offer partly exclusive rewards available just on Indiegogo, and partly credits that can be cashed for extra functions (magic effects, NPCs, etc.) in the final version of Novus Mundus.My aim is to create the best online RPG game ever. I know it is very ambitious but I think that keeping the standards and aiming high can create pretty good results. So if you have any ideas, tips that can be built in the game and increase the experience do not hesitate to send it to me! If it is good and fits in the world of Novus Mundus I will definitely use it during the development phase of the game. Of course, on the new website of the game all contributors will be acknowledged.My name is Attila Koncsik and I am the founder and leader of Epic Online Softwares Ltd., a Hungary based independent game developer company. 
My passion for computer games started a long time ago. My favorite games are: Oblivion, Skyrim, Civilization 4, and some new game with open world and sandbox mode. I created my first RPG mod about 25 years ago and have developed different game since then. The last was Republik (a forum RPG with some exclusive website automatism), which is like the popular Global Politics forum game, where the players lead a modern nation. This game was fully created by me and a friend. Besides Republik, I created several RPG modifications (AD&D, Magus) and I have always been an RPG enthusiast. 
I love games that form a fully open world and give players freedom, to do whatever they want. This is why I created Novus Mundus to work like this, to give the best experience for the players. I hope my dreams come true and I can fully develop Novus Mundus and give the opportunity for game enthusiast like me to play in a fully open world, in the era of native tribes, the Wild West, and to form history as they want to. 
I think my 25 years of experience in gaming and 10 years of experience in creating online games makes it possible to create an unforgettable game experience for you!The goal of the campaign is enough to develop the first phase of Novus Mundus, the age of Indigenous people. As I wrote above this would be the first step but the development wouldn’t stop then and all the mentioned phases would be developed if you could help and support the project. You can see below the planned milestones and their financial implication. By reaching the below mentioned stretch goals I could increase the game to next level.

When the campaign will reach to develop the first phase of Novus Mundus, then we’ll finish the goals in this times:

story:
Short Summary

Hey everybody! My name is Steven Plappert and my long time friend Andrew Busa and I are raising money this week for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society using a fun little Fantasy Football competition! We have always loved fantasy football and thought it would be a neat way to help raise money for a cause that is very near and dear to us. 

How it Works

The Buy-In for this game is $20, please donate this amount to the campaign.

  • All Proceeds will go to the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society
  • FantasyHub, our start-up fantasy football company, will be providing $100 to the winner! 
  • Winner may elect to have winnings be donated to LLS.

Once you have submitted your donation please look below at the game rules and choose your Perfect Players.

Email us your Perfect Players at stevenplappert@gmail.com to submit your lineup.

All lineups must be submitted by Sat. Jan 11 @ 4:35PM EST.

Last but not least, sit back and watch the playoff games on Sat. Jan 11 & Sun. Jan 12.

When the last game is finished on Sunday, Andrew and I will tally up all the points and announce the game winner on Facebook and via email.

We will then send the winner a check for $100, or deliver them cash, whatever they prefer.  

All the proceeds we take in will go directly to the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society for a rockin' donation!

Game Rules

The name of the game is Perfect Players, here are the rules.

Your lineup consists of 5 positions: QB, RB, WR, TE, DEF

Your job is to select the player and defense from the columns below that you think will perform the best.

These choices become your Perfect Players, and is what you will email to stevenplappert@gmail.com for your lineup submission.

Please make only (1) ONE choice from each of the columns below! The players and defenses you have to choose from are as follows:

        QB                         RB                            WR                        TE                    DEF

A. Luck IND            K. Moreno DEN      D. Thomas DEN    C. Fleener IND        Broncos

T. Brady NE           D. Brown IND         K. Allen SD             J. Thomas DEN      Panthers

D. Brees NO          F. Gore SF             M. Colston NO        G. Olsen CAR        Colts

R. Wilson SEA       M. Lynch SEA        T. Hilton IND            V. Davis SF           Saints

P. Manning DEN    L. Blount NE           S. Smith CAR          Z. Miller SEA         Seahawks

C. Newton CAR     D. Williams CAR    G. Tate SEA            M. Mulligan NE      Patriots

C. Kaepernick SF  R. Mathews SD       J. Edelman NE       L. Green SD          Chargers

P. Rivers SD          M. Ingram NO        M. Crabtree SF        J. Graham  NO     49ers

Scoring

The scoring system we are using for this game is the standard ESPN Fantasy Football Points System. If you would like a breakdown of how points are tallied so you can follow along it goes like this:

QB - 1pt for every 25 pass yds, 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 4pts for every pass TD, 6pts for every rush TD, -2pts for every Interception, -2pts for every fumble

RB - 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 1pt for every 10 rec yds, 6pts for every rush TD, 6pts for every rec TD, -2pts for every fumble

WR - 1pt for every 10 rec yds, 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 6pts for every rec TD, 6pts for every rush TD, -2pts for every fumble

TE - 1pt for every 10 rec yds, 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 6pts for every rec TD, 6pts for every rush TD, -2pts for every fumble

DEF - Defenses start off with 10pts and lose those points as they get scored on. How many they lose depends on how much they get scored on. It goes like this:

    0-6 points allowed - 10pts

  7-13 points allowed - 6pts

14-20 points allowed - 4pts

21-27 points allowed - 0pts

28-34 points allowed - (-4)pts

   35+ points allowed - (-8)pts

Then they get: 1pt for every sack, 2pts for every interception, 2pts for every fumble, 6pts for every defensive TD.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not participate you can still help out!

Here are a couple ways you can do that:

  • Make some noise about our campaign! Post or share our posts on Facebook!
  • Email some friends and family asking them to check it out! Every dollar counts!

And that’s all there is to it.

We really appreciate your consideration and help raising money for this great cause!

Best Regards,

Steven & Andrew

Newton CAR     D. Williams CAR    G. Tate SEA            M. Mulligan NE      PatriotsC. Kaepernick SF  R. Mathews SD       J. Edelman NE       L. Green SD          Chargers

P. Rivers SD          M. Ingram NO        M. Crabtree SF        J. Graham  NO     49ersScoringThe scoring system we are using for this game is the standard ESPN Fantasy Football Points System. If you would like a breakdown of how points are tallied so you can follow along it goes like this:QB - 1pt for every 25 pass yds, 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 4pts for every pass TD, 6pts for every rush TD, -2pts for every Interception, -2pts for every fumbleRB - 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 1pt for every 10 rec yds, 6pts for every rush TD, 6pts for every rec TD, -2pts for every fumbleWR - 1pt for every 10 rec yds, 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 6pts for every rec TD, 6pts for every rush TD, -2pts for every fumbleTE - 1pt for every 10 rec yds, 1pt for every 10 rush yds, 6pts for every rec TD, 6pts for every rush TD, -2pts for every fumbleDEF - Defenses start off with 10pts and lose those points as they get scored on. How many they lose depends on how much they get scored on. It goes like this:    0-6 points allowed - 10pts  7-13 points allowed - 6pts14-20 points allowed - 4pts21-27 points allowed - 0pts28-34 points allowed - (-4)pts   35+ points allowed - (-8)ptsThen they get: 1pt for every sack, 2pts for every interception, 2pts for every fumble, 6pts for every defensive TD.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can not participate you can still help out!Here are a couple ways you can do that:
Make some noise about our campaign! Post or share our posts on Facebook!
Email some friends and family asking them to check it out! Every dollar counts!
And that’s all there is to it.We really appreciate your consideration and help raising money for this great cause!Best Regards,Steven & Andrew

story:
For a limited time, you will have the chance to have a character named after you! Mind you, this is not just some insignificant NPC... You'll have to play the game to find out...
- Includes DRM-Free copy of ROSWELL and exclusive T-Shirt

Limited to 1 male and 1 female! Be the first and only to have this chance!

https://www.indiegogo.com:443/projects/1891476/x/14995909?secret_perk_token=c2ba3256

 

ROSWELL

 

The U.S. military is shaken.

The first 'flying saucer' has officially crashed in Roswell, N.M.

The public doesn't know what to make of this.

In the wake of the second world war, Henry Fern, a skeptical government hired janitor, stumbles upon a secret that has been kept to this day. Through experiments and odd occurrences, he discovers the repressed memories of his deleted past and a secret government plot that has been following him since the beginning of his career.

ROSWELL is tailored to the choices you make. Every action you take has an impact on the story and ending.

Features

  • Retro Pixel-Art Graphics

  • Eerie Historical Sci-Fi Narrative

  • Adventure-Game Style Puzzles With Multiple Solutions

  • Puzzle-Based Optional Combat

  • Choose Whether to Take a Violent Approach or a More Tame Solution

  • Choices Stay With You Throughout The Game and Have an Impact on the Ending

  • Intuitive Inventory System

  • Exploration-Based 

 

Gameplay:

Puzzles have multiple solutions, so choose wisely, as the way you do things will make an impact on the story...

Perks:

$1 - ROSWELL Concept Art Desktop Wallpaper

$5 - An Early Copy of ROSWELL

-- You receive an early bird Steam key for ROSWELL and, of course, our sincere thanks.

$9 - 2 Copies of ROSWELL

-- For you and a friend. Compare endings and choices throghout the game!

$30 - DRM-Free copy of ROSWELL

-- One early-bird DRM-Free version of ROSWELL and, of course, our sincere thanks.

$50 - ROSWELL and Handwritten Note

         -- 3 copies of ROSWELL, for you and 2 other friends, an official acknowledgment in the   credits, and a personalized handwritten letter from a Zeta Reticulan expressing his sincere thanks!

$75 - ROSWELL Exclusive T-Shirt

-- A DRM-Free copy of the game, an exclusive ROSWELL t-shirt, a personalized handwritten letter from a Zeta Reticulan expressing his sincere thanks, and your name in the official acknowledgments.

$100 - ROSWELL Special Edition

-- A physical copy of the game, a ROSWELL T-shirt, a limited edition signed full colour manual, a digital copy of the game, and your name in the credits.

$120 - ROSWELL Collector's Boxed Set

-- Everything from the aforementioned levels, plus a signed concept art poster!

Funds:

- Advertising/Marketing

- Steam Fees

- Web Hosting

- ...cookies...?*

* Just kidding... $750 wouldn't even begin to cover cookie costs...

story:
The Alpha version is available on Google Play: Click here

This is the game where Match-3 fans meet an amazing new world of role-playing adventures. Create your unique avatar and compete with your friends to save the world from Ancient Evil.

We are fans of the Puzzle Quest series and the entire genre of RPG. Our wives don't allow us to play the 'big' games on PCs. That's why, with your help, we're creating an exciting experience for mobile devices you can play anywhere - any time.

Why this game is better than Puzzle Quest.

  • You can choose up to 3 or more characters to include on your team (not only monsters but also your friends in the future).
  • PvP will be introduced to our game in the near future.
  • Advanced skill / talent system.
  • You don't need to wait for an opponent's move, you are always in control and proactive.
  • CCG system with Evolution features (each Common card can be upgraded up to the Epic card).
  • Extended social interaction between players (cooperation with friends, guilds, etc).
  • Dungeons and raid bosses.

Why do we need funding?

  • Our games are great because they are player-driven.
  • We look for great ideas and feedback that only you can provide and we like to offer as many cool features as possible to enhance the player experience: PvP, (social interaction) party with friends, guilds, auctions, dungeons, raid bosses, awesome music themes, etc.
  • All of these features are available on your phone - where ever you go.
  • The game will launch in the App Store and get localization in many languages.

Our schedule:  60 days for the Beta. We plan to release it at the same time we finish our funding campaign then roll out weekly updates so you can experience the progress.

About us: We are a team of professionals that have roots in old casual industry. Worked together on famous titles Mah Jong Quest, Jewel Quest and others. You can find much more information by clicking the link below:

More details about our team (Click here)

Have any questions? Discuss Match 3 Quest at Crowdfundingforum.com

Goal $20,000

  • 128 more monsters;
  • 8 more locations;
  • 3 more classes to choose from;
  • Female avatars for each class;
  • Facebook login system to save your data on servers;
  • Big rewards for each friend invited;
  • Ability to synchronize on different devices under the same account;
  • PvP encounters on locations;
  • Global player ratings;
  • Launch on App Store;
  • Localization on English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese and Russian.

Goal $50,000

  • 96 more monsters;
  • 6 more locations;
  • Invite friendly heroes into your party;
  • Dungeons (quests only for parties);
  • Raid bosses at the end of each dungeon;
  • Launch on Samsung Apps;
  • Localization on Chinese and Japanese.

Goal $100,000

  • 48 more monsters;
  • 3 more locations;
  • 2 more classes you can find and unlock (Witcher and Necromancer);
  • Global guilds (big sides) and Divinity guilds (made by our bigest backers);
  • Launch on Amazon.

Goal $200,000

  • 48 more monsters;
  • 3 more locations;
  • 2 more classes you can find and unlock (Monk and Psionic);
  • Global auction house (trading between players);
  • Additional talent tree for each hero where you can buy skills for Honor Points (PvP);
  • Big Olympics event - competitions between guilds;

Goal $500,000

  • Each character will be reworked and polished to meet the AAA class;
  • We'll provide the game with the solid story, beautiful cutscenes and dialogues;
  • 96 more monsters;
  • 6 more locations;
  • Equipment and artifacts for heroes;
  • Unique mini-game in which you collect different resources;
  • Unique mini-game for the crafting system.

Goal $1,000,000

  • 96 more monsters;
  • 6 more locations;
  • Change the world map system to allow players move on locations (i.e. map in Heroes of Might and Magic)
  • Launch on PC and Mac (online on Facebook).

Hello!

My name is Mason Morrow, I am a, soon to be, freshman in highschool. I have played and been around the sport of soccer since I was five. You could conclude how influential and important the game is to me. I have recently been inspired to, in some small way, make a change in the world. All supporters of youth athletics, teamwork and soccer, have a chance to exhibit their charitable charisma by helping my cause.

I will be collecting any funds you generously donate to my campaign and using them to purchase soccer equipment for an elementary school soccer program in need.  I'll be making this contribution through the United States Soccer Federation's Passback Program and I've already identified an elementary school in Illinois that has made a request for 15 new soccer balls and 2 new keeper jerseys.  I think I can raise enough funds to meet this school's stated need and maybe more!

I can only imagine the smiles on the faces of the elementary school students who get to use the brand new equipment I will donate.  Maybe my donation will spark the love of the game in those students like it thrives in me!

My campaign will only be open for 20 days so please consider making your contribution today. 

Thanks so much for considering my cause and helping me Share the Game!

-Mason

story:
What It Is

2nd Story is making and viewing narrative maps using mobile devices.  It reveals hidden stories all around us.

  • As a maker of theatre, I've spent 34 years telling stories.  As Artistic Producer of The Only Animal, in the last three years I've been listening to personal stories and looking for ways to place them in the world in new ways.  2nd Story gathers stories, crafts them, and shares them with others via a mobile augmented reality app. 
  • This campaign will support the development of 2nd Story.  We want to put the tools for story-mapping into the hands of as many people as possible, making it easy to start telling, documenting, and sharing stories in the places that matter to you. 
  • Together we can develop 2nd Story into an intuitive, accessible, free tool for mapping the story landscape.  We can make it possible for anyone with a mobile device to shape a richer sense of where they are. Our online archive will keep the stories available to anyone who can access the Internet.
  • I've been moved so many times by the stories I'm hearing from people I've never met before.  It has shifted my perceptions and rocked my stereotypes.  Connected me to neighbors, including marginalized communities, on another level.  Opened up my heart.  People are surprisingly ready to tell and to listen.  And when we tell our story, we are re-shaping our lives and the minds of those around us.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the deets:

  • We are asking for $ 5,000 to complete development of the 2nd Story app and fund a new set of intergenerational workshops in the Strathcona neighborhood of Vancouver.  This will advance both the tools and the process of using them, as we put the creative power even more fully in the hands of participants.
  • $5 or $10 can help if that is what works for you right now!  For donations of $ 25 (Contour) we can offer a limited-edition DVD of 2nd Story: Blood Alley, our first story-map collection.  $ 50 (Compass Rose) will get you the DVD and a preview invitation to the live launch of the project in Vancouver.  $ 100  (Legend) gets you all of that plus a gift from awesome social enterprises like East Van Roasters, The Urban Farm, or The Window art shop.  For $250 (Globe) you get the whole shebang, and an invite to a special Producers' reception with artists and participants.
  • We promise to dedicate 100% of funds raised to this project.  Though fees will be higher if we don't reach our goal, we will put every dollar raised towards the project and keep fundraising!  We have already come this far, gathering 60+ stories, filming 8 short videos, developing a working prototype of the app: we will see it through.  That's what we do.

The Impact

  • Research increasingly shows that the connection to others is a huge priority for people.  8 out of 10 Canadians see arts & culture as an important social value.  We've seen how people respond to the place-based, immersive, and interactive experiences that we at The Only Animal create with 2nd Story and our other work.  
  • Since 2005 when we premiered Other Freds with 135 performers, to our theatre of snow and ice NiX, and our first storytelling project Out On A Limb projecting large-scale stories on the trees of Strathcona Park we've been taking theatre places it has never been.  We leave traces in memory, shift perspectives, release imagination, redraw the maps of meaning that shape our social architecture.  Yes, we've won awards, but the real reward is the expectant, excited faces of people going somewhere new with us.
  • It can be hard to explain in words, but really 2nd Story is as simple as creating a place for people to gather and share their stories.  In this case the place is the streets, alleys, stores, restaurants, elevators, corners, and stairways where we live work and visit.  Stories are all around us.  2nd Story helps reveal them to you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute your dollars right now, you can help us:

  • Spread the word, share, tweet, tell a friend or three about the campaign.
  • Get in touch and join a workshop, volunteer at an event, help us continue making story-maps.

It can be hard to explain in words, but really 2nd Story is as simple as creating a place for people to gather and share their stories.  In this case the place is the streets, alleys, stores, restaurants, elevators, corners, and stairways where we live work and visit.  Stories are all around us.  2nd Story helps reveal them to you.

Get in touch and join a workshop, volunteer at an event, help us continue making story-maps.

story:
GOOD NEWS !

Many rewards for those who decide to support our project ! More info into right column and on the bottom of this page. Thank you


ABOUT US ? IN A FEW WORDS . . .

GaDoDev is a team of italian people that develop video games (and more..) since before man walked upright and humanity knew Nutella, Coca Cola and Ikea. Professional musicians and cartoonists, daily engaged in the creation of works of art such as the much-loved cartoon characters, constantly working group to provide HD graphics and exciting music. The team's motto is simple and concise: << Have fun and entertain ! >>

Today, we are pleased to announce the upcoming release of our latest creative endeavor: Running Twister - Save your Love, an advanced running game playable on smartphones and tablets Android, iOS and Windows Mobile but also on the Desktop PC.


- INTRODUCTION -

Love is definitely the hub around which all things rotate. Who of you have never loved? we are not only talking about people but also animals or even simple things, smells on which we are connected, because they remind us some past facts happened. But the real question we should be asking is : << how would I react if one day anyone or anything takes away what I love? >>

- RUNNING TWISTER SAVE YOUR LOVE -

                


is a game which is actually based on love between a boy called Francy and his sweet girl Mary, a love which was born from the shifty eyes during a run in the park and turned into something so big and beautiful, to push our friend to run every day for miles only because he wants to meet her loved one and give her freshly picked beautiful flowers. But, as usual in cases like this one…danger is always lurking !


 -THE STORY -


                     


<< One day, one of those to clearly forget, the city was struck and destroyed by a terrible tornado, and among other things, a chemical factory in which items and experiments were dangerous!Hideous creatures were released and nothing was ever the same, especially after Francy found that Mery was quick from one of those horrible creatures.  >>

                                                     


At this point, let’s get back to the original question: “how would I react if one day anyone or anything takes away what I love ?" 
                                   

We do not know your reaction, but we truly know that our fearless hero, even though he will get through an awkward situation (since the tornado will bring out all the clothes) will face all kinds of difficulties in order retrieve his clothes and free her loved one ! 

- MORE INFO -
  • 4 Worlds*
  • 80 Levels*
  • 8 different environments*
  • 4 final enemies in order to access the next Worlds
  • HD graphics 
  • Physics and Lights applied to objects
  • Enemies with A.I. “run and stalking” type
  • Achievements and scores shareable on social networks


- THE GAME -

As all the running games, the protagonist has the ability to Jump and Roll. He’s race never stops until it reaches the finish line at the end of each level that, for to be considered exceeded, makes it compulsory for the player to collect the amount of coins and bags which are indicated from time to time. The character, in his relentless running, will   have to go through an insurmountable quantity of obstacles and hideous creatures such as: carnivorous plants, rabid dogs, vultures, angry bees, etc. etc., but also items that will help him to overcome the various obstacles more easily.


- RELEASE AVAILABILITY -

                     


- December 2014: * Beta release version for Android devices

- January 2015: * Beta release version for iOS devices and final version for Android

- February 2015: release the final version for iOS devices and Beta * for WM and PC

- April 2015: release final versions for Windows Mobile and PC

*Running Twister will be  the 1st World with the environments “Park at morning” and “Park nightly” for a total of 20 levels. We have currently begun to develop a part of the environments “Graveyard” of the 2nd World but it will be available with the remaining Worlds and Environments only if you, with your donations, will support the project !


-  WHAT ARE THE FUNDS COLLECTED FOR -

For sure, to cover everything that remains to develop about  “Worlds and Environments” (3 Worlds  – 60 Levels) side programming, graphics and sounds. A part of them will be invested in advertising and, if Running Twister will be able to scrape together a considerable number of players and we will be able to achieve the goal of this campaign, we will plan to implement Multiplayer mode and release, in the upcoming of special events (Halloween, Christmas, etc), some “Bonus Worlds” to entertain all fans even more !

- THE REWARDS -

We considered right provide some rewards for those who decide to support our project by sending a contribution. Therefore, based on the amount of the donation, we have established the following advantages some of which allow the user to be mentioned or even have a primary role in the game !


Nr. 1 digital copy of Running Twister – Save your Love for PC final version and ADS free

- Access to the Running Twister Beta version for  Android / iOS or WM

- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM will be removed free the limitation that forces the user to wait 30 minutes every time lose the 15 lives at disposal

- All rewards into the package "Basic Support"


- Your name will be inserted into game’s Credits

- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM will be removed free the ADS displayed

- All rewards into the previous packages


- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM all levels will be unlocked free (then the user does not will have to achieve the goals of each level in order to play the next)

- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM all Worlds will be unlocked free (then the user does not will have to complete all previous World’s levels in order to play the next World)

- Nr. 4 stickers of Running Twister – Save your Love game

- All rewards into the previous packages


- The user thinks about an obstacle and we will create and insert it into the game and we will write into the Credits that was designed by him 

- Your name will be inserted into one of game's splash screens and also into the game’s site with all info about the user.

- All rewards into the previous packages

LIMIT : 8 USERS


- Your name and your photo will be put inside the game on a tombstone into "Graveyard” levels of the 2nd World

- Your name and your photo will be inserted into game’s “Team” section with the info about the user

- Nr. 1 t-shirt of Running Twister (no shipment cost included)

- All rewards into the previous packages (also that with limited number not  sold out)

LIMIT : 10 USERS

- One of the 3 final enemies (but not the last one) that must be defeat in order to access to the next Worlds will look like user !

- Your name will be inserted forever into the game’s “Team” section and into the site will be also inserted his photo and the enemy that look like him

- All rewards into the previous packages (also that with limited number not  sold out)

LIMIT : 3 USERS

- The final enemy that must be defeat in order to complete the game, will look like user !

- Your name will be inserted forever into the game’s “Team” section and into the site will be also inserted your photo and the enemy that look like him

- A DINNER WITH GADODEV TEAM in Rome (travel expenses not included) + ROME NIGHT TOUR ! 

- All rewards into the previous packages (also that with limited number)

LIMIT : 1 USER



- SOCIAL REWARDS -

THANK YOU FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTE !

<< One day, one of those to clearly forget, the city was struck and destroyed by a terrible tornado, and among other things, a chemical factory in which items and experiments were dangerous!Hideous creatures were released and nothing was ever the same, especially after Francy found that Mery was quick from one of those horrible creatures.  >>
                                                     

At this point, let’s get back to the original question: “how would I react if one day anyone or anything takes away what I love ?" 
                                   
We do not know your reaction, but we truly know that our fearless hero, even though he will get through an awkward situation (since the tornado will bring out all the clothes) will face all kinds of difficulties in order retrieve his clothes and free her loved one ! 

- MORE INFO -

4 Worlds*
80 Levels*
8 different environments*
4 final enemies in order to access the next Worlds
HD graphics 
Physics and Lights applied to objects
Enemies with A.I. “run
and stalking” type
Achievements and scores shareable on social networks

- THE GAME -As all the running games, the protagonist has the ability to Jump and Roll. He’s race never stops until it reaches the finish line at the end of each level that, for to be considered exceeded, makes it compulsory for the player to collect the amount of coins and bags which are indicated from time to time. The character, in his relentless running, will   have to go through an insurmountable quantity of obstacles and hideous creatures such as: carnivorous plants, rabid dogs, vultures, angry bees, etc. etc., but also items that will help him to overcome the various obstacles more easily.

- RELEASE AVAILABILITY -


                     



- December 2014: * Beta release version for Android devices
- January 2015: * Beta release version for iOS devices and final version for Android
- February 2015: release the final version for iOS devices and Beta * for WM and PC
- April 2015: release final versions for Windows Mobile and PC


*Running Twister will be  the 1st World with the environments “Park at morning” and “Park nightly” for a total of 20 levels. We have currently begun to develop a part of the environments “Graveyard” of the 2nd World but it will be available with the remaining Worlds and Environments only if you, with your donations, will support the project !

-  WHAT ARE THE FUNDS COLLECTED FOR -

For sure, to cover everything that remains to develop about  “Worlds and Environments” (3 Worlds  – 60 Levels) side programming, graphics and sounds. A part of them will be invested in advertising and, if Running Twister will be able to scrape together a considerable number of players and we will be able to achieve the goal of this campaign, we will plan to implement Multiplayer mode and release, in the upcoming of special events (Halloween, Christmas, etc), some “Bonus Worlds” to entertain all fans even more !



- THE REWARDS -
We considered right provide some rewards for those who decide to support our project by sending a contribution. Therefore, based on the amount of the donation, we have established the following advantages some of which allow the user to be mentioned or even have a primary role in the game !




Nr. 1 digital copy of Running Twister – Save your Love for PC final version and ADS free

- Access to the Running Twister Beta version for  Android / iOS or WM
- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM will be removed free the limitation that forces the user to wait 30 minutes every time lose the 15 lives at disposal
- All rewards into the package "Basic Support"


- Your name will be inserted into game’s Credits
- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM will be removed free the ADS displayed
- All rewards into the previous packages



- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM all levels will be unlocked free (then the user does not will have to achieve the goals of each level in order to play the next)
- Into final version for Android / iOS or WM all Worlds will be unlocked free (then the user does not will have to complete all previous World’s levels in order to play the next World)
- Nr. 4 stickers of Running Twister – Save your Love game
- All rewards into the previous packages


- The user thinks about an obstacle and we will create and insert it into the game and we will write into the Credits that was designed by him 
- Your name will be inserted into one of game's splash screens and also into the game’s site with all info about the user.
- All rewards into the previous packages
LIMIT : 8 USERS


- Your name and your photo will be put inside the game on a tombstone into "Graveyard” levels of the 2nd World
- Your name and your photo will be inserted into game’s “Team” section with the info about the user
- Nr. 1 t-shirt of Running Twister (no shipment cost included)
- All rewards into the previous packages (also that with limited number not  sold out)
LIMIT : 10 USERS

- One of the 3 final enemies (but not the last one) that must be defeat in order to access to the next Worlds will look like user !
- Your name will be inserted forever into the game’s “Team” section and into the site will be also inserted his photo and the enemy that look like him
- All rewards into the previous packages (also that with limited number not  sold out)
LIMIT : 3 USERS


- The final enemy that must be defeat in order to complete the game, will look like user !
- Your name will be inserted forever into the game’s “Team” section and into the site will be also inserted your photo and the enemy that look like him
- A DINNER WITH GADODEV TEAM in Rome (travel expenses not included) + ROME NIGHT TOUR ! 

- All rewards into the previous packages (also that with limited number)
LIMIT : 1 USER






- SOCIAL REWARDS -


THANK YOU FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTE !

story:
Imagine you were alone and afraid.

Imagine you were lost with no one to help.

Imagine you were a child facing its worst nightmare.

In utter darkness even the dimmest trickle of light means hope.

Follow the wisp. Collect the lights. Don’t look back.



Here is the deal: The game we are developing is in fact finished and soon to be published anyway. Why have we started this campaign then?

What we are doing  is giving You the opportunity to support us in order to enjoy our game even more.  With your help we can produce more levels, new puzzles etc. We will even throw in a few boss fights if you want.

Game developing, as it turns out, costs time and money, so we decided to turn to the gaming community and allow You to decide whether You want to see Selma following the wisp further down the rabbit hole.



“Selma and the wisp” is a platform game with a particularly unsettling atmosphere, that makes it even more extraordinary. Not only is it densely packed with  logical puzzles that will test your wits but has an arcade game elements that require skills as well.

Inspired by such cult titles like “Limbo” or “Badlands”, it stands proudly in a row with its predecessors, still offering new and unique features.

First and foremost, the two characters co-dependant control systems which forces the player to take care of two characters at the same time.

Masterly crafted low-poly models combined with a spectacular animations are a whole different story. With our visionary art-director responsible for the graphics and aesthetics, every model and every location is a carefully designed masterpiece.

FEATURES

  • 10 exciting and diverse levels

  • unique character-co-dependent control system 

  • surprising character and plot development

  • content suitable for players of age 16+ ( violence, blood, disturbing content, sugestive themes, gore scenes)
  • mesmerazing low-poly models






SELMA

Little girl in a heap of trouble.  Desperate for help, she turns to an unlike ally and follows him since. Not much is known about her past or her family but one thing is certain – she is far from ordinary.

WISP

( will-o'-the-wisp ;ignis fatuus) atmospheric ghost light seen by travellers at night, especially over bogs, swamps or marshes. It resembles a flickering lamp and is said to recede if approached. The phenomenon is known by a variety of names in much of European folklore.




What little there is to know about the plot initially, only emphasizes the restlessness that soaks the game. What the player knows for sure, is that the protagonist – Selma is following the wisp into the weird land inside her wardrobe after something disturbing  happens in her home.

As You play along, you will collect bits and pieces of information that might ( or might not) help you fill the blank spaces in the story and answer the questions. Keep at it, as the ending will keep you on the edge of your seat.  




As we have set upon our path of creating “Selma and the wisp”, one of our main goals was to deliver the players an original experience rather that generic throwback. Same goes for the soundtrack accompanying  Selma throughout her journey.

And so, we turned to our talented musician friend - Konrad Koziński, whom we have learnt to trust completely during previous collaborations.  The music perfectly captures and complements the game’s atmosphere, making the gameplay even more intense.







Named after little girl raised by a neglectful mother, abused by demented grandmother and stalked by psychotic talking wolf, this pack will grant You following tokens of our appreciation:

  • Access to the game on Steam
  • Unique wallpaper for Your desktop or mobile

PS. Remember not ever send your child alone into the woods, wearing distinctive clothes.



Named after siblings abandoned by their neglectful parents, whose idea of survival in the wilderness was wasting the only food they had and murdering mentally ill woman afterwards, this pack will grant You the following tokens of our appreciation:

  • Access to the game on Steam
  • Unique wallpaper for Your desktop or mobile
  • Soundtrack from the game

PS. If you ever find lonely woman living in gingerbread house in the forest, call the authorities



Named after teenage girl who basically becomes a slave to seven disfigured miners after failed assassination attempt organised by her stepmother, this pack will grant You the following tokens of our appreciation :

  • Access to the game on Steam
  • Unique wallpaper for Your desktop or mobile
  • Soundtrack from the game
  • Awesome t-shirt with the Wisp !
PS. Beware the snacks offered for free by a strangers. They might contain drugs.



Named after spoiled little princess, who gets herself comatose and then marries the man, who molested her while unconscious, this pack will grant You following tokens of our appreciation:

  • Access to the game on Steam
  • Unique wallpaper for Your desktop or mobile
  • Soundtrack from the game
  • Amazing 3-d printed Selma figurine for your collection  !

PS. If your loved ones are in a coma, do not leave them unguarded in the abandoned castle.



Named after teenager forced into child slavery by power hungry foster family, who finally marries a prince with either serious memory deficiency or drinking problem, as he could not remember her face after spending whole evening together, this pack will grant You following tokens of our appreciation:

  • Access to the game on Steam
  • Unique wallpaper for Your desktop or mobile
  • Soundtrack from the game
  • Awesome t-shirt with the Wisp !
  • Amazing 3-d printed Selma figurine for your collection  !
  • Your name in the game’s credits!

PS. Glass footwear can cause flat feet and serious case of sores. 



Named after homeless orphan pyromaniac, whose business strategy was to selfishly waste all her merchandise, this pack will grant You following tokens of our appreciation:

  • Access to the game on Steam
  • Unique wallpaper for Your desktop or mobile
  • Soundtrack from the game
  • Awesome t-shirt with the Wisp !
  • Amazing 3-d printed Selma figurine for your collection  !
  • Your name in the game’s credits!
  • Your own special asset placed inside the actual game! How cool is that ?

PS. If you notice delirious, barefoot child in the snowstorm, do not just ignore her because everyone else does. 



Our team consists of IT specialists, unity developers and graphic designers, led by a visionary artist and painter.  Each of us a craftsman of his field, each with a considerable experience in game development and overall enthusiasm for electronic entertainment. After meeting on the organised gaming event, we decided to produce something that the whole group could enjoy and be proud of.

It took few more weeks, before the final concept for the game has been established. Even more to settle for a name, but eventually the gears has been set in motion.

And so, "Selma and the wisp" has come to life.

story:
2/18/2014

We've decided if we can make it to $4,600 that there will be a third deck ONLY FOR PLEDGES and not offered to the public. Maybe an upgrade or two get us there. Thanks, Ed and Carmen


How to Video of using Machinas in your Post-Apocalypse miniatures games.





1/31/2014

We've crunched some number with the printer and have good news!
We don't need as much funding for a second deck so as of today we've considered Stretch Goal #1 hit!

What does that mean? It means if you have the the Brother Pilot, Oak Street Priest, or an Oppenheimer pledge you're getting the second deck.


Who Are We?

My name is Ed Teixeira and the I'm founder of Two Hour Wargames. I've designed miniatures games for over ten years and also designed the All Things Zombie board game. I'm a gamer first and aim to make entertaining games playable in two hours or less. We have ten writers, artists and sculptors collaborating to produce fun, quality games.  

One of these writers is Carmen Cerra, the co-author and driving force behind this project.

We've already successfully funded our first Indiegogo Project and it's time for another.

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/all-things-zombie-final-fade-out-minis-more/x/3045224

What We Need & What You Get

Machinas is our first card driven game that can be played by itself or added to any existing miniatures or RPG. Machinas is a stand alone game that can be used with any Post Apocalyptic rules, such as our own After the Horsemen. Here's the prototype Deck.

 

Each Deck includes the following cards:

  • 4 Cars
  • 11 Weapons 
  • 4 Defensive Modifications for your car
  • 9 Car Features to customize your car
  • 20 Driver Signatures & Tracking cards to personalize your driver
  • 18 Bonus Dice cards

This gives you a complete deck of 66 cards allowing you to customize your car and driver in a wide variety of ways. 

And since you are not using a game board you can create an unlimited number of race tracks, even race along the highways!

 

Here's an example of your "dashboard" when you play the game. All the info you need to play the game is at your finger tips. With the player game aids there's no paging through rules looking for charts.



The Impact

Machinas is a post apocalypse racing game that  features a unique set of mechanics where the players are involved at all times. Unlike other race games where players can drift far to the rear and out of the action, Machinas uses a "pack" mechanic where players are always in the action. Instead of tracking your position on the track we track your position in the "pack". Here's a picture of the "pack" in action. Notice how you can play Machinas on any flat surface.

 All you need to play Machinas comes in one deck of cards and the rules. No track is needed and all you need to know to play the game is on the cards! You will have to provide a couple of everyday six-sided dice, but that's it.

Players customize their drivers and cars then race around the track. If you want you can race along highways and roadways in your favorite post apocalyptic setting, it's up to you.

Each driver has three Attributes - Savvy, Tech, and Speed and there's a wide variety of ways to customize your car. When the race starts each player keeps his cards out of sight until needed. Once played the cards are laid out for all to see. This keeps the customization of your car a secret until it is revealed.

But customizing your car and driver is just the beginning.

During the race you have to plan your strategy and tactics. When do you sit back and when do you make your move? Do you try and shoot up your opponents or make dramatic two car passes? Machinas is much more than rolling dice and the drivers with the the right strategy and good tactics will win.

Machinas is easy to learn and play but tougher to master. No two games will ever play the same which makes it a highly enjoyable game that you can play over and over.

Machinas is a perfect one off pickup game, easy to learn and fun to play. For the serious gamers you can choose to play the Campaign Game where your cars and drivers get better as you gain experience. 

As we mentioned earlier, Machinas is perfect to use with any Post Apocalypse RPG or minis game, such as our After the Horsemen rules. Add Machinas to your games whenever you need fun and exciting car chases and simple vehicle rules.  In fact, the rules cover how to do this!

And remember, if we don't reach our goal all of the pledges are refunded.

Stretch Goals

Our primary focus is getting the card game produced. But if we raise more funds than we need for the basic game we'll open up some Stretch Goals as a way to say thanks.

Here they are:

Stretch Goal #1 - $3,500

Another new second deck of cards that adds more vehicle types as well as weapons and modifications  to increase your options and enjoyment. When added to the original deck, this will give you eight vehicles to use in your games.

Stretch Goal #2 - $5,000

A new third deck of cards. Still more vehicles, and more weapons to further increase your games and enjoyment. Add all three decks and we're talking about twelve vehicles!

Stretch Goal #3 - $10,000

The moon! We have sculptors and casters standing by to produce a set of four 1/87th scale Machinas cars if we can hit this goal. Hey, we know you don't need these to play but they will look real good.

Add On #1

Want more? Get additional decks for $15, a savings of 40% from the MSRP. Just add it to your pledge.

And here they are - Carmen's Custom Cars

Here are the custom cars only available in the OPPENHEIMER pledge (one set of 4 for each pledge)  and cannot be added to other pledges. When they're gone, they're gone. 

These are 1/64th scale die-cast cars.

 So fire up the engines and get ready for some racing!

Added three more sets of cars. Carmen says "That's all there is!"
