But if we raise more funds than we need for the basic game we'll open up some Stretch Goals as a way to say thanks.Here they are:Stretch Goal #1 - $3,500Another new second deck of cards that adds more vehicle types as well as weapons and modifications  to increase your options and enjoyment. When added to the original deck, this will give you eight vehicles to use in your games.Stretch Goal #2 - $5,000A new third deck of cards. Still more vehicles, and more weapons to further increase your games and enjoyment. Add all three decks and we're talking about twelve vehicles!Stretch Goal #3 - $10,000The moon! We have sculptors and casters standing by to produce a set of four 1/87th scale Machinas cars if we can hit this goal. Hey, we know you don't need these to play but they will look real good.Add On #1Want more? Get additional decks for $15, a savings of 40% from the MSRP. Just add it to your pledge.And here they are - Carmen's Custom Cars
Here are the custom cars only available in the OPPENHEIMER pledge (one set of 4 for each pledge)  and cannot be added to other pledges. When they're gone, they're gone. These are 1/64th scale die-cast cars. So fire up the engines and get ready for some racing!Added three more sets of cars. Carmen says "That's all there is!"

story:
Summary & Impact

The gaming industry is an ever changing market, with that a lot of companies loose a lot of funding and lay off some if not all of their staff. This is what happened to me recently, I was let go from my company along with half of the staff. The worst part is I was living paycheck to paycheck trying to raise my family. Many of you know its not easy to raise a family on a single income. And I'm not one who likes to sit around and wait for things to happen. I have applied to over 30 companies and some for multiple positions. A few years ago when I was in my last month of college and I got the chance to go to GDC 2011. I found that to be more of an impact to companies than just sending my resume off into a black hole. So since I dont have a job at the moment, I dont really have any perks to give out, just more of a big thank you! I know that doesnt really mean much to some people, but its better to say to yourself that I just helped someone get one step closer to finding a job. And thats what helps put faith back into humainty. All the funding will help pay for a plane ticket round trip, my hotel room (cheapest one I can find), meals, and my pass for GDC. If I get 100% of my funding, I will be able to get the Summits, Tutorials & Bootcamps Pass, which will also help me get into some tutorials that will help me in my future careers. If I dont get all my funding, I will only go for the Expo Pass which will let me get to the confrence room floor and talk to all the companies there.
story_txt:
Summary & Impact
The gaming industry is an ever changing market, with that a lot of companies loose a lot of funding and lay off some if not all of their staff. This is what happened to me recently, I was let go from my company along with half of the staff. The worst part is I was living paycheck to paycheck trying to raise my family. Many of you know its not easy to raise a family on a single income. And I'm not one who likes to sit around and wait for things to happen. I have applied to over 30 companies and some for multiple positions. A few years ago when I was in my last month of college and I got the chance to go to GDC 2011. I found that to be more of an impact to companies than just sending my resume off into a black hole. So since I dont have a job at the moment, I dont really have any perks to give out, just more of a big thank you! I know that doesnt really mean much to some people, but its better to say to yourself that I just helped someone get one step closer to finding a job. And thats what helps put faith back into humainty. All the funding will help pay for a plane ticket round trip, my hotel room (cheapest one I can find), meals, and my pass for GDC. If I get 100% of my funding, I will be able to get the Summits, Tutorials & Bootcamps Pass, which will also help me get into some tutorials that will help me in my future careers. If I dont get all my funding, I will only go for the Expo Pass which will let me get to the confrence room floor and talk to all the companies there.

story:
What is Hunt Down The Freeman?

Hunt Down The Freeman is an entirely original, standalone story-based FPS game that takes part in the Half Life Universe :

  • Features an entirely original story
  • New Characters
  • New Weapons
  • Amazing Voice Acting
  • More Than 30 New Levels
  • Improved Gameplay
  • 6-8 Hour Gameplay
  • 45 to 90 Minutes of Cutscenes
  • HTC VIVE SUPPORT
  • Original Soundtrack

 

 

 

 

 

F.A.Q.

Q: I’ve never played a Half-Life game before, will that affect my Hunt Down The Freeman experience in any way?

A: Not at all! In fact, the game will cover a huge part of the Half-Life universe—but from a different perspective, so both old and new fans alike can enjoy the game!

Q: How long is the game?

A: For the average player, the main campaign should take 6 to 8 hours to complete.

Q: Is the main character a “mute” like Gordon Freeman?

A: No, our protagonist speaks!

Q: How similar are the gameplay mechanics to the original Half-Life games?

A:  The core gameplay is essentially the same but we’ve made some cool changes that will present some new and refreshing mechanics and modes of play.

Q: Hunt Down The Freeman? Does that mean we play as the bad guy? Is that even grammatically correct?

A: "There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so."- William Shakespeare.

Q: As for our title, everything will be explained, How will the official release differ from what we can see in the trailer ?

A: Absolutely everything with your help! Better textures, better sounds, better weapons, better character models, better gameplay, and more!

Q: Will this game be available on Steam?

A: We are on Greenlight right now! Please vote for us if you’d like to play our game!

Q: Does Hunt Down The Freeman support VR?

  A: Yes, it currently supports the HTC Vive. Pending enough funding, we are also planning to support the Oculus Rift.

Q: What is the release date for Hunt Down The Freeman?

A: End of 2016

story:
Hi, I'm Pizza and I made this little game, called Skullz.

A lot of people liked it and it was my heart's work, so I would love to make a sequel.
In order to do that, I need to eat and sleep. That's where you come in!


Skullz is a single player adventure game, unfolding a strange story starring a cast of six characters over four chapters with about a dozen screens each. It's made in flash, playable for free, right in your browser.

Skullz 2 is gonna continue the story of the first game while providing a back story for many of the established characters. There will be a new world to discover, with all-new backgrounds, a new soundtrack, branching paths, new and old characters to meet and interact with and, of course, lots and lots of paradoxes. Basically, Skullz 2 will be like it's predecessor, except bigger, better, cooler, sweeter , doper, sicker and just all-around mind-blowing.


My name is Feliks Balzer. I'm an art student from Germany, just about to be done with college. The game Skullz was my Bachelor's Thesis, made entirely by myself on the last legs of funding I had for my studies.

Being almost done being a student, I was planning on just getting some kinda job and trying to see where to go from there, but after the game was received so well, I could see that shining star at the edge of the horizon, and I decided to try and see if I can make the dream of being a truly independent video game developer reality with this crowd funding campaign.


By the time you're reading this, I will already have started developing the game. I will post frequent updates about the development process at my development blog, and generally be very responsive via my twitter account @pizzamakesgames.
I'll keep that up until the crowd funding period is over. Then, depending on whether or not the funding goal was reached, different things will happen:

If the 500€ goal is reached,

At this point I'll have been developing the game for a month straight, all the while keeping you posted through twitter, my devblog and the odd mail so that you can be sure that I'm working hard on what you paid for. With the 500€ goal reached, I will have my rent paid for a whole month with enough money left for food. I'd take my time finishing the game up, making sure that everything's nice and smooth and release it somewhere within February, along with the soundtrack and lots of toots and whistles.

If the 500€ goal is not reached,

I'd still try my best to finish the game up, and keep developing games in general, but I probably just wouldn't be able to devote as much time to the project, as I would need to worry about making money somehow. I might have to rush the game out in early February, or put it on hold until I've found some solution for the money problem and get back to it later, possibly finishing it in early March.

If the 500€ goal is surpassed,

I'll buy lots of expensive cheese and sport a wide grin during the development process. I'll also consider extending the development period by as long as the money'll hold me over and further realize the game to the best of my abilities. Generally, I'd just be more relaxed about everything and put the game first, everything else second, now having the money to support that attitude.

Just 500€?

If I have a bed to sleep in and a can of coffee, I can develop games for a month straight without stopping. That's how the original game came to be, anyway.

Of course, that's not a permanent solution, as there's more to life than coding, but to get my foot in the door of life as an independent video game developer, I'm ready to work hard and put every cent that's coming my way into the development until I've established myself in the industry to a point where I can relax a little again.



This is the part where you're really impressed by how transparent this company is! The team is me. As with the previous game, I will do everything from the code to the art to the music myself. Generally, that's just how I work, but it also guarantees that the quality of my games won't vary. It also ensures that you'll always have an easy time reaching out to me if you've got any questions or suggestions.

That doesn't mean I wouldn't consider outsourcing or collaborations for another project though, just this one's gonna be all me.

Apart from the soothing sense of having helped some guy get one step closer to his dream and my eternal gratitude, you mean? Take a look at the perks! There's quite a lot of stuff to be grabbed!


Yes! Make some noise! If you liked the original game and want to support it, but don't have any money to give, which I can understand completely, you can still help by telling people about my little endeavor here! Give me a tweet, a share, a like. Throw the link on your Facebook wall or just tell your buddies of this weird game you found.

story:
Train and spar until you are ready!

 

Talk to us on Telegram and Discord:

Telegram: https://t.me/NineLivesArena

Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/weqNqKJ

 

Get ready for the world's most competitive fantasy PvP game.

9LivesArena is a unique online RPG that is focused on 1v1 PvP in combination with an AI companion called an Ooogy that works for the player even when they are offline.

Platform: It will be released on PC initially and then ported to Xbox and PlayStation.

                                                         Get ready for the fight of your life!

 

We are also developing a companion App for mobile that allows you to order your Ooogy around to do your grinding while you are away from the main game.

Companion App: Android and iOS

  • online/offline companion that works for you 24/7
  • permadeath + persistent progression
  • fast character development
  • no fixed classes - create your own character template
  • unlock loads of spells, abilities, bloodlines, spirit animals...
  • resource gathering and item crafting
  • blockchain based ingame items and characters

                                                        Are you excited to meet your Ooogy?

Afraid of the grind? Then 9LA has a surprise for you! It’s called an Ooogy, your AI companion that works for you. And here’s the kicker: Ooogies even continue to work while you are away from the game! Think of an Ooogy as a Tamagotchi on steroids. Think that’s great? Well, it gets better. There will even be a companion app! Whether you’re at the beach, at work, or in bed, you can order them around from your phone. You tell them to go mining, and they keep working — just as long as you leave them enough food! 

“The way of the warrior is resolute acceptance of death.” — Miyamoto Musashi

                                                Your three best heroes turn into statues.

Create a unique hero, train against other players in the training's grounds and level up your character. Only when you feel ready, enter the 9Lives Arena! How many victories can you achieve with 9Lives?

Your account has a shared and persistent bank box where all items and resources are safely stored. Your Ooogy levels up over time and thanks to his help, progression becomes faster as he helps unlock new bloodlines, new spells, new weapon arts and new spirit animals for you which are unlocked permanently for your account. 

A character that lost his last life in the 9Lives Arena will turn into an oversized statue if he is one of your three best heroes with the highest amount of personal victories ever achieved. 

Are you getting hungry to take names, and lives while you’re at it? For the truly warrior-born gamers, it will be worth the anticipation!

Unlike in traditional MMORPG's, leveling a character only takes a few hours at most. Yet, when you try new builds you might want to give it some additional practice in the trainings Arena. As your Ooogy progresses you come by great equipment much faster or have it already sitting in your bank box.

Characters have a head, chest, arms, waist and leg slot as well as one or two weapon slots. Mix armor pieces the way you like.

Every item is crafted based on blueprints. When crafted they can turn out grey, green, blue or purple. Grey items have the lowest stat budget and purple have the highest. Develop your own item strategies for your builds in combination with abilities and spells you choose. Which stats end up on your item is totally random. Craft as many as you like to get the items with the kind of stats you prefer. No pay to win here folks!

 

“Good against remotes is one thing. Good against the living, that’s something else.”- Han Solo

Our Items run on blockchain technology giving you true item ownership. 

You will be able to trade items and characters with other players. You'll be able to see how many of an item still exists in the game and how rare they are. Certain type of items will become more rare over time as they will be taken out of circulation when a character that was wearing them dies permanently in the 9Lives Arena.

Because we are utilizing blockchain technology, anyone can audit and verify the number of items and ownership of items. 

Random Ooogies

Like a classic Kinder Surprise Egg you never know what kind of Ooogy you will get. 

Random Ooogies offered during our Kickstarter campaign will be a mix of a number of common and 12 royal genes and will therefore vary in appearance. The more royal traits your Ooogy has, the rarer it will be!

There are currently more than 200 million possible genetic combinations for Ooogies. 

Statistically speaking, in a group of one million Ooogies, only 2 would end up with all twelve royal traits combined with the mix of common traits. But even then, the odds that those 2 would look the same are near impossible.

 

The Heiner Sword Blueprint

 

The Nefarious Mask Blueprint

story:
NSKN Legendary Games is proud to present Exodus: Proxima Centauri, an epic board game for 2-6 players about economy, politics, technology and conquest.

This campaign concludes 15 months of hard work, imagination, research and testing - bringing to life a dream we were chasing - a full civilization game set up in a futuristic universe. 

Your support will help us make this dream reality and in exchange you will be the first to enjoy it.

After a devastating nuclear war, six human factions are seeking shelter in the Centauri system. On the verge of extinction, the humans are saved by a superior civilization, allegedly the Centaurians, and each faction is given a fresh start on a new planet. Thus the exodus of humanity seems to have ended on the planets orbiting the star called Proxima Centauri. When the Centaurians announce their departure, the struggle for power commences once again.  

 

Our goal is to raise $7500. We will use the money to finalize the production and deliver the game boxes to you in the shortest amount of time possible.

Once we reach the main goal, several exclusive promos and expansions can be unlocked and we'll make sure they're in every game box. 

 

On the modular map, every player has a Home Planet from which he start his expansion. Using space ships, players will fight the other player and deploy population on new planets and asteroids to increase their influence and income. At the same time, they will develop technologies, build new ships and customize them for maximum efficiency.

 
Every turn, players go through five stages.
 
In the Upkeep Stage the players repair their ships, receive their resources and pay tax
 
During the Political Stage the player reunited in the High Council decide on the turn's political decision, followed by bidding for the new turn order and the Bonus Action decision.
 
 
The Action Stage is the highlight of each turn, when the players develop their rising empire. Every player has two Actions which they play simultaneously and two optional Reactions.
The possible Actions are:
  • Research allows learning and using one of the 28 technologies on the player board, military, transport or civilian

  • Trade helps players exchange resources with the bank
  • Banking provides a little bit of extra income
  • Mining provides extra resources on the depleted planets 
  • Buy Upgrades - the players can purchase ship upgrades or Weapons of Mass Destruction that they have previously researched and customize their ship blueprints

  • Build Ships - new space ships can be constructed on the players' home planets

During the following stage, all players may fire their Weapons of Mass Destruction targeting resources, population or the planets themselves.
 
The two Conquest Stages allow the players to expand their empires. Each player moves his ships, fights opposing space ships and may colonize new planets and asteroids. 
 
 
  • 48 palstic space ships
  • 30 dice
  • 150 wooden populatin cubes
  • 185 wooden resource cylinders
  • 24 ship blue prints
  • 6 player boards (A4)
  • 43 hex tiles that make up the modular map
  • 42 action cards - 6 foar each player and 6 bonus actions
  • 6 info cards and 6 turn order cards
  • 33 Centaurian Resistance cards
  • 30 political cards
  • 18 resistance ships tokens
  • 200+ ship and planetary upgrades tokens

Exodus: Proxima Centauri uses several board game mechanics which contribute to the games strategical aspect and replay value.
 
  • Resource management - the resources players collect are constantly depleting and thus require further mining for new discoveries. Also, players pay tax for their income
  • Bidding - every turn a political decision is reached through voting, followed by a bid for the turn order
  • Simultaneous action selection 
  • Simultaneous movement - players make decisions regarding the movement of their space ships simultaneously using Movement Tokens, giving the game a realistic feeling
 
 
 
The English version of the rules of Exodus: Proxima Centauri can be downloaded from the link below (PDF format).
http://www.nskn.net/down/Exodus_Proxima_Centaur...
 

 

 

  • Official webiste of Exodus: Proxima Centauri
  • Exodus: Proxima Centauri on BoardGameGeek
  • The NSKN blog, with many stories, including the making of the game

 

Delivery

We are hoping to deliver the first few game boxes at our booth in Spiel 2012 Essen, however that depends on external factors such as shipping company, weather, pirates etc. The rest of the games will be shipped in late November and should arrive no later than 10th of December. As soon as we'll have a definitive date, we'll post an update.

Payments

Payments are processed through Paypal which ensures the security of your transaction. You do not need to have a Paypal account or to create one, you can use any Credit Card.

Contact

For any questions, issues or just to get to know us better, please visit our webiste at www.nskn.net or write to us at office@nskn.net.

200+ ship and planetary upgrades tokens






Exodus: Proxima Centauri uses several board game mechanics which contribute to the games strategical aspect and replay value.
 


Resource management - the resources players collect are constantly depleting and thus require further mining for new discoveries. Also, players pay tax for their income




Bidding - every turn a political decision is reached through voting, followed by a bid for the turn order




Simultaneous action selection 




Simultaneous movement - players make decisions regarding the movement of their space ships simultaneously using Movement Tokens, giving the game a realistic feeling



 
 

 

The English version of the rules of Exodus: Proxima Centauri can be downloaded from the link below (PDF format).
http://www.nskn.net/down/Exodus_Proxima_Centaur...
 
 
 



Official webiste of Exodus: Proxima Centauri
Exodus: Proxima Centauri on BoardGameGeek


The NSKN blog, with many stories, including the making of the game

 

Delivery
We are hoping to deliver the first few game boxes at our booth in Spiel 2012 Essen, however that depends on external factors such as shipping company, weather, pirates etc. The rest of the games will be shipped in late November and should arrive no later than 10th of December. As soon as we'll have a definitive date, we'll post an update.
Payments
Payments are processed through Paypal which ensures the security of your transaction. You do not need to have a Paypal account or to create one, you can use any Credit Card.
Contact
For any questions, issues or just to get to know us better, please visit our webiste at www.nskn.net or write to us at office@nskn.net.

story:
Great quality material, accurately scaled and well researched models, realistic looking fortifications at the very best!

At BAUEDA we pride ourselves on our attention to historical accuracy and this range is here to do justice to the more modern battlefields, starting with WWII.

All scenic bases are especially designed to be compatible with Flames of War™ rules. All our models are made with very high quality POLYURETHANE resin that will last you a lifetime!

To help you helping us, we have extended this offer to all models available in the range, not only the new desert series, so you can choose any pack from this range as your reward!

If for any reason you still don't want or can't contribute to the campaign, but you would like to see these products added to our catalog anyway, so that they will soon be available also from your local retailer then please help to get the word out, let your friends know, share this on facebook and make some noise about this campaign in your local gaming community! You'll have our everlasting gratitude and will help us bringing to life yet more new fantastic models!

Thank you and have fun!

WHAT'S THIS ABOUT?

Hi guys, this is Claudio from Baueda Wargames ltd. We are already producing a large range of high quality resin cast wargame terrain, designed specifically for 15mm WWII miniatures and fully compatible with Flames of War™ rules. Currently this range already include over 30 different packs of scenic bases, objectives, bunkers, fortifications and entrenchments, covering rural and urban theatres and including also a couple specifically designed with a desert theme. You can find plenty more pictures and full details of the full range at http://www.baueda.com/cama.html

We now want to add a number of new codes to complete the desert series, including a sandbag bunker!

While the range is designed specifically with a deser feel most of these models can be used for many more armies and settings than the North African campaign, all sandbag emplacement for instance would be perfect also for the Vietnam war!

WHY INDIEGOGO?

The actual models sculpting is completed and we now need your help funding the actual production, including making multiple production molds for all the models.

Funds raised will be used for production molds, casting the goods and shipping them off to you.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

We need your hard earned cash to finance the costs of putting more awesome new models in production. Normally we pay out of our pockets in advance to add new items to our ever-growing catalog, but then we have to wait until we have recovered this initial investment before we can afford to release more. In this way we can recover part of the investment faster and bring yet more goodies to you faster! You get the option to acquire very high quality products with a substantial discount and you can get them even before they are added to our catalog and begin to ship to retailers worldwide!

Please be warned that ALL our products are not toys and are not intended for children!

Actual product details for the 15mm WWII Desert Fortifications series

Total number of newproducts: 6

15A22CB – 3 different medium + 1 small ‘dug-in’ markers (desert)

Medium markers are 80mm wide by 30mm deep (31/8"x 13/16"). The space inside is large enough to accommodate a Large Base (face on) or a Medium Base (wide).
Small markers are 58mm wide by 25mm deep (25/16"x1"). The space inside is large enough to fit a Small Base or a Medium one (deep).

15A23CB – Fire control position + command base (Objective marker)

One 50mm wide by 65mm deep (2"x 21/2") model + one 32mm wide by 25mm deep (11/4"x 1") scenic base.

Perfect as a game objective marker this model is the same size of a large FoW base and it can hold a medium size base inside. Comes complete with a small scenic base suitable for snipers, observers, etc. Contains 1 x sandbag bunker body, 1 x sandbag bunker roof, 1 x small scenic base.

15A25CB – Medium battery emplacement (desert) – This selection counts as two packs!

These very detailed and accurate 15mm scale reproductions are perfect for most anti-tank, mortar and anti-aircraft artillery platoons and are specifically designed so that the space inside each emplacement is large enough to accommodate one Flames of War medium base, either front on or sideways. This is a large pack that include everything you need to fortify a full battery: three medium sandbag emplacements for the gun bases, a medium scenic base for the staff, one small scenic base for command or spotters and one medium dug-in marker.

Designed for a North African setting these models are also perfect for the Pacific theatre and for Vietnam, just add plenty of jungle foliage and flocks!

15A26CB – Large battery emplacement (desert) – This selection counts as two packs!


These larger emplacement are perfect for heavy artillery and are specifically designed so that the space inside is large enough to accommodate one Flames of War large base. This is a large pack that include everything you need to fortify an

artillery section: two large sandbag emplacements for the gun bases, a medium scenic base for the staff, one small scenic base for command or spotters and one medium dug-in marker.

Designed for a North African setting these models are also perfect for the Pacific theatre and for Vietnam, just add plenty of jungle foliage and flocks!

15A28CB – 4 different 4 holes Infantry scenic bases (desert)

A set of four bases beautifully sculpted with a distinct desert theme and designed to accommodate four 15mm figures. These bases are exactly the same size as a FoW medium size base. While the plastic bases are almost flat these are approximately 2mm thick and on top of that there is textured terrain and details added. Because of this you can easily pick these bases up from the edges, meaning that you’ll never have to touch the figures themselves!

15A29CB – 6 different 2 holes small scenic bases (desert)

A set of six bases beautifully sculpted with a distinct desert theme and designed to accommodate two 15mm figures; a third figure can easily be added on in most cases. These bases are exactly the same size as a FoW small size base. Each pack contains a random selection of six different styles out of eight different designs, in all cases the models include all sorts of improvised repairs that troops will naturally look for and use for cover and of course plenty of deep carved details to help you in painting them!

Finish: all items are supplied as unpainted plain castings.

Please remember that as with all resin models these have to be washed thoroughly with hot water and a strong detergent before painting, to clean off all traces of mold release agent. If you don't follow this simple precaution the paint may flake off!

REWARDS

If you choose one of our perks, you will get, as reward, your choice of as many packs of 15mm scenery as detailed in each perk.

To help you helping us, we have extended this offer to all models available in the range, not only the new desert series.

In addition, if we reach our goals, you will have free extra bits added and the possibility to choose to add yet more!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If for any reason you don't want or can't contribute, but you would still like to see this product added to our catalog so that it will soon be available also from your local retailer then please help to get the word out, let your friends know, share this on facebook and make some noise about this campaign in your local gaming community! You'll have our everlasting gratitude and will help us bringing to life yet more new fantastic models! Thank you!

WHEN?

We will begin production as soon as the campaign is funded. Your rewards should begun shipping as soon as the campaign ends following the same order in which your contribution have been received. If you really need your reward earlier for some reason just let me know and I'll see if it's possible to put you on some special fast track!

PERKS

Every perk has a detailed description of what will you receive as a reward for choosing it and what contribution is required for it. In all cases you will have to choose among different packs. At the end of the INDIEAGOGO campaign we will send you a e-mail asking you what packs will you like to choose for your Perks and any eventual option.

PERK #1 Halfaya Pass

6 packs of your choice, selected as you like from all those available.

Full retail price will be 45.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 39.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #2 Bir el Gobi

12 packs of your choice, selected as you like from all those available.

Full retail price will be 90.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 79.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #3 Sidi Barrani

18 packs of your choice, selected as you like from all those available.

Full retail price will be 135.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 115.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #4 - Kasserine

24 packs of your choice, selected as you like from all those available.

Full retail price will be 180.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 144.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #5 Tobruk

30 packs of your choice, selected as you like from all those available.

Full retail price will be 225.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 169.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #6 El Alamein

36 packs of your choice, selected as you like from all those available.

Full retail price will be 270.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 189.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #7 Operation Compass

For retailers that want to start stocking our line, clubs or players with many friends!

2 packs each of all 36 product codes  (72 packs in all)

Full retail price will be 540.00 EUR

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 350.00 EUR + 12.50 flat shipping anywhere

PERK #8 Operation Torch

For retailers that want to start stocking our line, clubs or players with many friends!

100 packs of you own choice out of all available product codes (please note some selection counts as two packs)

Full retail price will be 750.00 EUR

Exclusive INDIEAGOGO price 375.00 EUR + actual shipping

RETAILERS

If you are a trader interested in stocking more of our products please drop me an e-mail at the address you'll find in our retailers contact page at http://www.baueda.com/retailers.html


FULL LIST OF PACKS YOU CAN CHOOSE FROM:

You can find more details and pictures of all the products shown here (except for the new packs obviously!) on our online shop at http://www.baueda.com/cama.html

15A01CB 15mm Dragon teeth Anti-tank obstacle

15A02CB 15mm Objective Command post + small base

15A03CB 15mm Objective Ammo Depot + small base

15A05CB 4 different Medium/Light Artillery scenic bases (rural)

15A06CB 4 different HMG/mortar scenic bases (rural)

15A07CB 4 different vehicle scenic bases

15A08CB 4 different 4 holes Infantry scenic bases (rural)

15A09CB 6 different small scenic bases (rural)

15A12CB 15mm Objective Food stash + small base

15A13CB 2 different Heavy Artillery scenic bases (rural)

15A14CB 15mm Objective Fuel dump + small base

15A17CB 2 different large heavy mortar scenic bases

15A18CB 15mm Objective Bombed Mercedes 170V + small base

15A19CB 15mm M2 modular Pontoon bridge (US) – This selection counts as two packs!

15A20CB Single M2 modular Pontoon (bridge extension)

15A21CB 15mm battlefield accessories (stacked supplies)

15A22CB 3 different medium + 1 small ‘dug-in’ markers (desert)

15A23CB 15mm Objective observation post + small base

15A24CB 2 different Heavy Artillery scenic bases (desert)

15A25CB Medium battery emplacement (desert)

15A26CB Large battery emplacement (desert)

15A27CB 2 different large tank scenic bases (desert)

15A28CB 4 different 4 holes Infantry scenic bases (desert)

15A29CB 6 different small scenic bases (desert)

15A30CB 15mm Objective downed BF109-e + small base

15A31CB 3 different medium + 1 small ‘dug-in’ markers (urban)

15A32CB 2 different large + 1 small ‘dug-in’ markers (urban)

15A34CB 2 different Heavy Artillery scenic bases (urban)

15A35CB 4 different Medium/Light Artillery scenic bases (urban)

15A36CB 4 different HMG/mortar scenic bases (urban)

15A37CB 4 different 4 holes infantry scenic bases (urban)

15A38CB 4 different 5 holes infantry scenic bases (urban)

15A39CB 6 different 2 holes small scenic bases (urban)

15A40CB 2 different large tank scenic bases (urban)

15A41CB L410 open bunker for 20/37mm flak – This selection counts counts as 1.5 packs!

15A42CB VF6a Spotter bunker

You can find the full details and see more pictures of all the other products on offer here on our website: http://www.baueda.com

Also please come visit us on Facebook, follow our Blog or join the Baueda yahoo group to stay in touch with the latest news and share the fun with more friends!

UPGRADE YOUR PERK:

To change your perk to a superior one or add something else you only have to make an extra contribution adding the difference between the two perks. Click on “contribute now” and add the amount without choosing any perk. We will sent out a survey as soon as the campaign ends so that you will then be able to let us know exactly what you want to have added!

ADD-ONS

You can add to your Perk any item you like, choosing from all those available in our online shop at http://www.baueda.com just look out the price there and add the correct amount to your Perk. Once the campaign is concluded (assuming we do reach our goal of course!) we will send you an e-mail asking you what options will you like to choose for your Perks and at that time you will only need to tell us what items you want added to your shipment.

Please note that this offer is subject to availability, so if you order an item that happens not to be in stock for whatsoever reason at the time your Perk is due to ship, we may have to delay shipping for a few days until your order is complete.

If you order from our website please remember that the online shop use a flat shipping and handling fee on ANY order of EURO€ 12.50 regardless the size of the order itself. This means that the minimum AND the maximum shipping you'll be charged on ANY order is EURO€ 12.50 regardless the size of the order itself, so it pays to join forces with some friends and make a single larger order!


STRETCH GOALS

If we hit these goals we can offer you some more great new models which you can choose as a reward for any perk!

Goal: Euro 800.00 (Locked)

15A43CB Sandbag bunker

Goal: Euro 1000.00 (Locked)

15A44CB Barge Pontoon bridge (suitable also for ACW/NAP) + 15A45CB Barge pontoon module

Goal: Euro 1200.00 (Locked)

15A46CB “Tobruk” MG bunkers x 3 (VF58c/d)

Goal: Euro 1500.00 (Locked)

15A47CB Large Bunker for pak 40/75mm (R669)

Goal: Euro 2000.00 (Locked)

15A48CB Small MG Bunker (VF4a)

Goal: Euro 2500.00 (Locked)

15A49CB Large Bunker for pak 40/75mm (R677)

Goal: Euro 3000.00 (Locked)

15A50CB Medium Bunker for pak 43/88mm (R667)

Goal: Euro 3500.00 (Locked)

15A51CB “Tobruk” Mortar Bunker (VF69)

We will add more stretch goals (Pacific and Forest themes and more bunkers) if these begin to get unlocked!


SHIPPING

All the perks except for PERK #7 - “Operation Torch” are subject to a flat shipping and handling fee of EURO€ 12.50 regardless the size of the order itself. This means that the minimum AND the maximum shipping you'll be charged for ANY order is EURO€ 12.50 regardless the size of the order itself, so it pays to join forces with some friends and upgrade to a single larger perk!

If you want to know just how much you would be saving, these are the ACTUAL POSTAGE COSTS: WHAT YOU WILL NOT HAVE TO PAY:

(Thanks Italian Posts for these rates)

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I have been making and selling wargame models for more than ten years now, first as a part time job and then, over the last seven years as a full time job. With the help of other professional artists we have created hundreds of successful wargame products which we currently manufacture and sell, both directly and through a worldwide network of distributors and retailers. Baueda Wargames has already become a brand recognized for the quality of its products and service and we intend to continue this way!

The main risk involved in this project is that it becomes such a runaway success that will stretch our production capacity so far that there will be a few days delay in shipping your order. Please do your best to make this happen and I'll personally guarantee we will add some free extras to make up for any eventual delay in this case! :)

WHO ARE WE?

BAUEDA WARGAMES LTD. is a small British Company registered in England in 2005 with Reg. No. 5511646 It specializes in developing high quality tabletop wargame accessories and miniatures. Most of our products have been designed and sculpted by myself, my name is Claudio Berni and I've been working as a professional freelance artist most of my life; I've been working in the game industry since 1994 doing illustrations, 3D models, concept art and game design. Recently I have made the graphics for all the diagrams in the “Field of Glory” series of rulebooks published by Osprey. You can see some samples of my previous work including paintings, illustrations and concept art here: http://www.dreamsstudio.com/

Also
please come visit us on Facebook, follow our Blog or
join the Baueda yahoo group to stay in touch with the latest news and
share the fun with more friends! 

UPGRADE YOUR PERK:
To
change your perk to a superior one or add something else you only
have to make an extra contribution adding the difference between the
two perks. Click on “contribute now” and add the amount without
choosing any perk. We will sent out a survey as soon as the campaign
ends so that you will then be able to let us know exactly what you
want to have added!
ADD-ONS
You
can add to your Perk any item you like, choosing from all those
available in our online shop at http://www.baueda.com
just look out the price there and add the correct amount to your
Perk. Once the campaign is concluded (assuming we do reach our goal
of course!) we
will send you an e-mail asking you what options will you like to
choose for your Perks and at that time you will only need to tell us
what items you want added to your shipment.
Please
note that this offer is subject to availability, so if you order an
item that happens not to be in stock for whatsoever reason at the
time your Perk is due to ship, we may have to delay shipping for a
few days until your order is complete.
If
you order from our website please remember that the online shop use a
flat shipping and handling fee on ANY order of EURO€ 12.50
regardless the size of
the order itself. This means that the minimum AND the maximum
shipping you'll be charged on ANY order is EURO€ 12.50 regardless
the size of the order itself, so it pays to join forces with some
friends and make a single larger order!
STRETCH GOALS
If
we hit these goals we can offer you some more great new models which
you can choose as a reward for any perk!

We
will add more stretch goals (Pacific and Forest themes and more
bunkers) if these begin to get unlocked!

SHIPPING

All the perks except for PERK #7 -
“Operation Torch” are subject to a
flat shipping and handling fee of EURO€ 12.50 regardless the size
of the order itself. This means that the minimum AND the maximum
shipping you'll be charged for ANY order is EURO€ 12.50 regardless
the size of the order itself, so it pays to join forces with some
friends and upgrade to a
single larger perk!

you want to know just how much you would be saving, these are the
ACTUAL POSTAGE COSTS: WHAT
YOU WILL NOT HAVE TO PAY:

pack weights on average 75 grms including packaging.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES
I
have been making and selling wargame models for more than ten years
now, first as a part time job and then, over the last seven years as
a full time job. With the help of other professional artists we have
created hundreds of successful wargame products which we currently
manufacture and sell, both directly and through a worldwide network
of distributors and retailers. Baueda Wargames has already become a
brand recognized for the quality of its products and service and we
intend to continue this way!
The
main risk involved in this project is that it becomes such a runaway
success that will stretch our production capacity so far that there
will be a few days delay in shipping your order. Please do your best
to make this happen and I'll personally guarantee we will add some
free extras to make up for any eventual delay in this case! :)

WHO ARE WE?
BAUEDA
WARGAMES LTD. is a small British Company registered in England in
2005 with Reg. No. 5511646 It specializes in developing high quality
tabletop wargame accessories and miniatures. Most of our products
have been designed and sculpted by myself, my name is Claudio Berni
and I've been working as a professional freelance artist most of my
life; I've been working in the game industry since 1994 doing
illustrations, 3D models, concept art and game design. Recently I
have made the graphics for all the diagrams in the “Field of Glory”
series of rulebooks published by Osprey. You can see some samples of
my previous work including paintings, illustrations and concept art
here: http://www.dreamsstudio.com/

story:
Hello World!

Hello! We are an international team comprised of 12 people from Poland, United States and Germany. In last 2 months we've made a very successful campaign on Kickstarter portal, which you can find here:

www.kickstarter.com/projects/1447560584/more-oldschool-turn-based-4x-space-strategy-game

This very successful campaign is the best advertisement of our project.

Right now we have support of 3270 people for $90.925 !!!



Now, we are on indiegogo for those who want to support us throught PayPal, wants to raise their pledges, or which knew about our collection a little too late to support us during our Kickstarter.

If you are here from KickStarter and want to purchase addon or you want to increase your KS reward tier please select: “No Perk, just a contribution!" and add specified amount of money.

Right now we are currently working on our game, so we will leave this campaign as it is with starting data. We are sorry for not giving you here any new updates, but we had to focus now on creating our game. We will of course answer any questions you may have.

M.O.R.E. - Military. Organization. Research. Economy.

We are dozen of close-knit friends - IT specialists, graphics, musicians.


We are going to create 4x turn-based space strategy - valuable successor to the Master of Orion2. The main properties of this game are:

  • turn based game
  • 3D galaxy map, which won't have starlines
  • 3D turn-based combat
  • 20 alien races
  • one main technology tree with 20 dedicated tech branch ( one for every race)
  • ability to put ships together from spaceship blocks - almost infinite number of ship designs
  • over 10 hours of epic music
  • interface skin for every alien race

and many other great features!

This extensive— yet easy to use —game will be written for PC-Windows, Pc-Linux & Mac computers, and will have impressive, polished graphics which require a minimum screen resolution of 1280x720.


The game will enable multiplayer capability with simultaneous gaming on HotSeat, PBEM, LAN, and on the Internet. It will also have a single player mode. Now we are trying to collect additional money, to take us closer to the Single player campaign.

In M.O.R.E. galactic maps can be generated based on different settings resulting in 189 types of galaxies. Galactic maps will include:

  • many types of stars (ranging from white dwarfs to red giants)
  • different sizes of stars
  • multiple star systems
  • different types of nebulas
  • black holes
  • wormholes
  • a galactic black hole

 "M.O.R.E." will also pay special attention to such gaming aspects as mineral extraction, food transportation, raw materials, and people management. It will contain leaders of the colonies, ship captains, spy masters, and complex technology trees  with a separate department of science, designed for the particular civilization.


The game will be done in this languages:

  • English
  • German
  • Polish
  • Spanish
  • French
  • Turkish
  • Russian
  • Italian

Additional info about our game can be found on our webpage : www.morethegame.com or on our Kickstarter project page: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1447560584/more-oldschool-turn-based-4x-space-strategy-game

Main goal

We don't have a main goal here. We've just wanted to add PayPal users option to support us, and for people who want to raise their pledge made throught Kickstarter, and for those who were late for a little bit there to support us.



We are offering the same rewards and addons as on Kickstarter portal!
It's the last chance to get them!

Our main goal here is to raise additional money to polish our game. But if we will be able to reach $5.000 we will be adding advanced space battles to M.O.R.E.! And if we will be able to reach $10.000 here, we will be adding single player campaign to M.O.R.E. !!! Any additional money will go to further polishing of our game.


Money will be spent on additional peoples who will be working with us on M.O.R.E. project.

Rewards and Add-ons

It's not possible to put all our rewards here on indiegogo. For full list of rewards please check: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1447560584/more-oldschool-turn-based-4x-space-strategy-game

Digital add-ons:
+$5, Digital Strategy Guide "How to stay not eaten in space by Hvalurs"
(included in tiers $50 and above)

+$10, 50% discount on all future M.O.R.E. DLC's
(100% discount is already included in $50 and above reward tiers)

+$10, Digital copy of the game soundtrack
(included in tiers $30 and above)

+$10, PDF version of MORE game book (filled with 100+ color pages with artworks, graphics, developer bios, history of all races, technology tree schemes, weapons charts, short M.O.R.E. novel written by one of our team members)
(included in tiers $40 and above)

+$30, PDF version of the 2014 M.O.R.E. large calendar
(included in digital tier $100, physical tier $150 and above)

Physical add-ons:
+$3, three random M.O.R.E. stickers

+$10, set of M.O.R.E. stickers
(included in tiers $200 and above)

+$15, M.O.R.E. mouse pad
(included in tiers $300 and above)

+$30, Big additional cardboard version of gamebox + little surprise
(included in tiers $500 and above)

 +$30, additional M.O.R.E. tshirt with M.O.R.E. logo done in a reflective ink.

+$100, M.O.R.E. hoodie with M.O.R.E. logo done in a reflective ink.
(included in tiers $500 and above)

+$100, 16GB M.O.R.E. version of flash drive USB 3.0
(included in version 2 tier $200 and above)

+$100, upgrade from 16GB to 64GB M.O.R.E. version of flash drive USB 3.0
(included in tiers $500 and above)

We also announce our shipment costs for M.O.R.E. packages ($100 and over rewards) :
USA, Poland - free.
Europe, Canada - please add $15.
Other countries - please add $25.

M.O.R.E. will probably be released in the Winter 2013. Do you want an excellent, modern space 4x turn-based strategy game? Do You Want M.O.R.E.? Together We Can Make It Happen!

story:
Welcome to the Greebo Nippo Goblin funding campaign!

 Greebo's miniatures is a well known manufacturer of miniatures, born for fantasy football and recently started  creating and producing  board games and different type of fantasy sports game.

 We're trying to continue the production of what we used to do, and so to reach a complete variety of teams for fantasy football, supported by great designers and remarkable sculptors. In particular there is a project that goes on very slowly for years, due to lack of funds entirely self-financed.

 The project involves the Nippo Goblin, Nipponese greenskins with a series of themed  secret weapons and traditional oriental demonic trolls who have been loudly requested for years from the audience.

Nowadays only two miniatures were produced, and now we would like to have your help for letting the remaining nine goblins, the troll and the coach to be created, produced and available!

 If we will reach the required amount  for the sculpture and the creation of the molds, we will create a team of 12 different high quality pieces ready to be painted and played, and if we will go over the reach we will sculpt extra Geisha Goblin as  cheerleader!

 

Rewards

We would like to offer rewards them in four "bands" which are based on the cost of production and future MSRP (Manufacturer's suggested retail price)

 

UPDATE 

What you will get for different perks and when (all step are combined). Shipping are all included:

 

$5 : Ninja Blade/Ironfang/NippoRat

You can choose 1 from Ninja Blade guy (humanoid), Ironfang (little robot), Nippo Rat from Thrower, Linerat or Blitzer.

 $7: Normal Nippo Goblin

You can choose 2 normal Nippo Goblin + 1 exclusive Dragon mar + 1 normal Dragon Mark.

 $10 : Bonzo Goblin

1 Exclusive Bonzo goblin

 $13 : Special nippo wepaons

You can choose 1 special weapon + 1 normal Nippo Goblin + 1 exclusive Dragon mark + 1 normal Dragon mark.

  • If we meet 4400$ you will get +1 Geisha
  • If we meet 4700$ you will get +1 Geisha

 

 

$20 : Nippo Turtles, FOUR turtles 4 Ninja Turtles.

  • If we meet 4000$ you will get Rat Master for free.
  • If we meet 5200$ you will get + Breinlord
  • If we meet 5500$ you will get + Randy Jo (refer)
  • If we meet 8000$ you will get +  Steampunk Turtle
  • If we meet 9000$ you will get +  Miss May

$22 : Ninja or Dragon?

You can choose 1 from Dragon Coach or Ninja + 1 normal Nippo Goblin + 2 exclusive Dragon mark + 2 normal Dragon mark.

  • If we meet 4400$ you will get +1 Geisha
  • If we meet 4700$ you will get +1 extra Ninja Goblin
  • If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)

$25 : Nippo Turtles' Villans

Ironfang, Rynock, Razorbaog, and Nippo Ninja Blade.

 

  • If we hit the goal of $4,500 you will get Bladers, the Ninja Blade Master for free.
  • If we meet 5200$ you will get + Breinlord
  • If we meet 5500$ you will get + Randy Jo (refer)
  • If we meet 8000$ you will get +  Steampunk Turtle
  • If we meet 9000$ you will get +  Miss May

 

$30 : The might of Demon Troll

You can chose 1  troll + 1 normal Nippo goblin + 2 exclusive Dragon mark + 2 normal Dragon mark + Bonzo goblin.

  • If we meet 4400$ you will get +1 Geisha
  • If we meet 4700$ you will get +1 extra Ninja Goblin
  •  If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)
  • If we meet 5700$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the sixth different goblin)

$135 : Epic Win chose

8 normal Nippo goblin (4 + 4) + 4 special weapon  + 1 ninja + 1 dragon coach + 2 Demon Troll + Bonzo goblin + 2 exclusive Dragon mark + 2 normal Dragon mark.

  • If we meet 4400$ you will get + 2 Geishas.
  • If we meet 4700$ you will get also +1 extra Ninja goblin.
  • If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)
  • If we meet 5700$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the sixth different goblin)
  • If we meet 8000 $ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the seventh different goblin)

$200 : Coupon for 210 EUR + Bonzo

  • If we meet 4400$ you will get + 2 Geishas.
  • If we meet 4700$ you will get also +1 extra Ninja goblin.
  • If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)
  • If we meet 5700$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the sixth different goblin)

 

If you claim more than 1 perk the reward goal are not cumulable with other perk. This rules is also applyed on address and families

 

*24-08-2012

We want make more! Nippo team can't be very Nippo without rat and turtles! And we want to add them to the perks! In future we will do also more rats for the Nippo Underworld team.

Here the concepts for the Nippo Turtle.
They will come with separated head and arms, with suitable set of arms with special weapon and ball, so you can custom your turtle as you like. On bottom you can see one example of custom head.

 *  27-08-2012

We are sculpting the Turtles, but where are the Villains? ALWAYS HERE!

Here the concepts for the Nippo Mutated Clan.
They will come with separated head and arms, with suitable set of arms with special weapon and ball, so you can custom your turtle as you like.

Here the Final concepts.
As you can see you will receive model unassembled with lots of head to create your custom werebeast team.

The Heroe, Bladers, have also 3 custom head.

For the Ironfang robot you have to chose if you want with open or closed mouth.

The steam flash golem with mindfliear's head, Brainlord have no separated parts.


Star Player for
•Ironfang= Boomer Dribblesnot
•Rynock = Ripper (bigger size)
•Razorbaog = Morg N Thorg (bigger size)
•Nippo Ninja Blade
•Bladers, the Ninja Blade Master

In future we will do also:  
• Breinlord
• Randy Jo = Referee
•Miss May = Commentator

(We can do them soon if we meet 4800$ goal will be done with Nippo Goblin Team)

Here you can see the perks prices and future probably MSRP

We have also add the Villains perk:

 Razorboag, Rynock, Ironfang,and Nippo Ninja Blade. If we hit the goal of $4,500 you will get Bladers, the ninja blade master for free. If not you can buy at 18$.

Here you can find some sample sketch, but they can be modified in future if we will have better . You can also send us your sketch or idea, so if is castable we will produce that!

 *31-08-2012

Seems that you really like Turtle Nippo team! And as we saw, we want add more positional Rat for the Nippo Underworld team!
So here:

0-2 Lineman $5 each ($8 MSRP)
0-2 Thrower $5 each ($8 MSRP)
0-2 Blitzers $5 each ($8 MSRP)

 

                                      

 

The concept for the extra Geisha (4400 goal). 


The concept for the extra Ninja Gobbo (4700$ goal) and the exlusive minia for contributor, Bonzo Goblin.

 

Exlusive Bonzo Model

 

Ninja Ready!

 

First Nippo Goblin with Dragon Fireworks Bomb ready! Thanks for you Help!

DemonHead Stone Ball ready!

 

 

 We will ship all rewards when team will be ready, so around November/December or first if we reach the goal in lesser time.

 

Group #1: Normal Nippo Goblin - $7 each

You can chose one normal nippo goblin and will have one normal Nippo Goblin extra and 1 exclusive and 1 normal Japan Dragon Statue Mark. (soon the Picture)

 

   Group #2: Special Nippo Weapon -  $13 each

You can chose one special weapon goblin and you will have one normal Nippo Goblin extra and 1 exclusive and 1 normal Japan Dragon Statue Mark. (soon the Picture)

 

Group #3: Ninja and Coach - $22 each

You can have the Coach or the ninja Goblin and 1 normal goblin we will add one normal Nippo Goblin extra and 2 exclusive and 2 normal Japan Dragon Statue Mark

 

Group #4: Nippo Demon Troll - $35 each

You can chose one troll + one normal nippo goblin and we will add one Exlusive Nippo Goblin (soon the concept) and 2 exclusive and 2 normal Dragon Statue Mark

 

 

 

 These costs include the weight of the metal and the number of pieces the miniature is made of.

 

All miniatures are cast in lead-free pewter (white metal) and are unpainted. MSRP of the complete set is expected to be around $110 without shipping.

Shipping: 

All non Epic Win perks will be ship  with Untracked mail. Greebo is not responsible for lost or stolen items in transit. If you want a different kind of shipping, contact us.

 

If we don't met the goal, don't worry, your money don't be lost or waste: we will make this team anyway, but with more time. We guarantee anyway the production of this team.

 

We need your help to see these awesome goblins born and flip up... like a ninja!

All the staff at Greebo give you a very big Thank you for your help!

 If we will reach the required amount  for the sculpture and the creation of the molds, we will create a team of 12 different high quality pieces ready to be painted and played, and if we will go over the reach we will sculpt extra Geisha Goblin as  cheerleader!
 
Rewards
We would like to offer rewards them in four "bands" which are based on the cost of production and future MSRP (Manufacturer's suggested retail price)
 
UPDATE 
What you will get for different perks and when (all step are combined). Shipping are all included:
 
$5 : Ninja Blade/Ironfang/NippoRat
You can choose 1 from Ninja Blade guy (humanoid), Ironfang (little robot), Nippo Rat from Thrower, Linerat or Blitzer.

 $7: Normal Nippo Goblin

You can choose 2 normal Nippo Goblin + 1 exclusive Dragon mar + 1 normal Dragon Mark.

 $10 : Bonzo Goblin

1 Exclusive Bonzo goblin
 $13 : Special nippo wepaons
You can choose 1 special weapon + 1 normal Nippo Goblin + 1 exclusive Dragon mark + 1 normal Dragon mark.

If we meet 4400$ you will get +1 Geisha
If we meet 4700$ you will get +1 Geisha
 
 
$20 : Nippo Turtles, FOUR turtles 4 Ninja Turtles.

If we meet 4000$ you will get Rat Master for free.
If we meet 5200$ you will get + Breinlord
If we meet 5500$ you will get + Randy Jo (refer)
If we meet 8000$ you will get +  Steampunk Turtle 
If we meet 9000$ you will get +  Miss May
$22 : Ninja or Dragon?
You can choose 1 from Dragon Coach or Ninja + 1 normal Nippo Goblin + 2 exclusive Dragon mark + 2 normal Dragon mark.

If we meet 4400$ you will get +1 Geisha
If we meet 4700$ you will get +1 extra Ninja Goblin
If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)
$25 : Nippo Turtles' Villans
Ironfang, Rynock, Razorbaog, and Nippo Ninja Blade. 
 

If we hit the goal of $4,500 you will get Bladers, the Ninja Blade Master for free.
If we meet 5200$ you will get + Breinlord
If we meet 5500$ you will get + Randy Jo (refer)
If we meet 8000$ you will get +  Steampunk Turtle 
If we meet 9000$ you will get +  Miss May
 
$30 : The might of Demon Troll
You can chose 1  troll + 1 normal Nippo goblin + 2 exclusive Dragon mark + 2 normal Dragon mark + Bonzo goblin. 

If we meet 4400$ you will get +1 Geisha
If we meet 4700$ you will get +1 extra Ninja Goblin
 If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)
If we meet 5700$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the sixth different goblin)
$135 : Epic Win chose
8 normal Nippo goblin (4 + 4) + 4 special weapon  + 1 ninja + 1 dragon coach + 2 Demon Troll + Bonzo goblin + 2 exclusive Dragon mark + 2 normal Dragon mark.

If we meet 4400$ you will get + 2 Geishas.
If we meet 4700$ you will get also +1 extra Ninja goblin.
If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)
If we meet 5700$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the sixth different goblin)

If we meet 8000 $ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the seventh different goblin)

$200 : Coupon for 210 EUR + Bonzo

If we meet 4400$ you will get + 2 Geishas.
If we meet 4700$ you will get also +1 extra Ninja goblin.
If we meet 5000$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the fith different goblin)

If we meet 5700$ you will get +1 Extra Nippo Goblin ( the sixth different goblin)

 
If you claim more than 1 perk the reward goal are not cumulable with other perk. This rules is also applyed on address and families 
 
*24-08-2012
We want make more! Nippo team can't be very Nippo without rat and turtles! And we want to add them to the perks! In future we will do also more rats for the Nippo Underworld team.
Here the concepts for the Nippo Turtle. They will come with separated head and arms, with suitable set of arms with special weapon and ball, so you can custom your turtle as you like. On bottom you can see one example of custom head.

 *  27-08-2012
We are sculpting the Turtles, but where are the Villains? ALWAYS HERE!
Here the concepts for the Nippo Mutated Clan. They will come with separated head and arms, with suitable set of arms with special weapon and ball, so you can custom your turtle as you like.
Here the Final concepts.As you can see you will receive model unassembled with lots of head to create your custom werebeast team.The Heroe, Bladers, have also 3 custom head.For the Ironfang robot you have to chose if you want with open or closed mouth.The steam flash golem with mindfliear's head, Brainlord have no separated parts.

Star Player for •Ironfang= Boomer Dribblesnot•Rynock = Ripper (bigger size)•Razorbaog = Morg N Thorg (bigger size)•Nippo Ninja Blade•Bladers, the Ninja Blade MasterIn future we will do also:  • Breinlord• Randy Jo = Referee•Miss May = Commentator(We can do them soon if we meet 4800$ goal will be done with Nippo Goblin Team)Here you can see the perks prices and future probably MSRPWe have also add the Villains perk: Razorboag, Rynock, Ironfang,and Nippo Ninja Blade. If we hit the goal of $4,500 you will get Bladers, the ninja blade master for free. If not you can buy at 18$.Here you can find some sample sketch, but they can be modified in future if we will have better . You can also send us your sketch or idea, so if is castable we will produce that!
 *31-08-2012

Seems that you really like Turtle Nippo team! And as we saw, we want add more positional Rat for the Nippo Underworld team! So here:
0-2 Lineman $5 each ($8 MSRP) 0-2 Thrower $5 each ($8 MSRP) 0-2 Blitzers $5 each ($8 MSRP)
 
                                       
 

The concept for the extra Geisha (4400 goal).  
The concept for the extra Ninja Gobbo (4700$ goal) and the exlusive minia for contributor, Bonzo Goblin.

 
Exlusive Bonzo Model
 

Ninja Ready!

 

First Nippo Goblin with Dragon Fireworks Bomb ready! Thanks for you Help!


DemonHead Stone Ball ready!

 
 
 We will ship all rewards when team will be ready, so around November/December or first if we reach the goal in lesser time.
 
Group #1: Normal Nippo Goblin - $7 each
You can chose one normal nippo goblin and will have one normal Nippo Goblin extra and 1 exclusive and 1 normal Japan Dragon Statue Mark. (soon the Picture)
 
   Group #2: Special Nippo Weapon -  $13 each
You can chose one special weapon goblin and you will have one normal Nippo Goblin extra and 1 exclusive and 1 normal Japan Dragon Statue Mark. (soon the Picture)
 
Group #3: Ninja and Coach - $22 each
You can have the Coach or the ninja Goblin and 1 normal goblin we will add one normal Nippo Goblin extra and 2 exclusive and 2 normal Japan Dragon Statue Mark
  
Group #4: Nippo Demon Troll - $35 each
You can chose one troll + one normal nippo goblin and we will add one Exlusive Nippo Goblin (soon the concept) and 2 exclusive and 2 normal Dragon Statue Mark
 
 
 
 These costs include the weight of the metal and the number of pieces the miniature is made of.
 
All miniatures are cast in lead-free pewter (white metal) and are unpainted. MSRP of the complete set is expected to be around $110 without shipping.
Shipping:  
All non Epic Win perks will be ship  with Untracked mail. Greebo is not responsible for lost or stolen items in transit. If you want a different kind of shipping, contact us.
 
If we don't met the goal, don't worry, your money don't be lost or waste: we will make this team anyway, but with more time. We guarantee anyway the production of this team. 
 
We need your help to see these awesome goblins born and flip up... like a ninja!
All the staff at Greebo give you a very big Thank you for your help!

story:
Short Game Summary

You start your journey with a small number of settlers. They are lost somewhere with nothing but some tools, the clothes on their backs and some food in their backpacks. Your task is to guide them and keep them alive in a world that changes with the seasons and the weather. You can:

  • Gather edible plants; fish in rivers and lakes; plant crops and hunt for game
  • Cut down trees and break rocks to get building materials
  • Build simple shelters or more permanent structures such as cabins and barns
  • Explore the world to find new resources or suitable places to settle
  • Set policies that affect the behavior and interaction of your settlers
  • Setup the production of tools, clothing, fuel and other materials

Your settlers are individuals. They have personal preferences for work and leisure. They have different sensitivities for hot and cold weather, different stamina levels and different calorie needs.

The world of Homestead features:

  • A large open world that contains different types of physical geography
  • A day/night cycle that affects the settlers, in terms of darkness and sleep cycle
  • Weather that changes with the time of the day and the seasons
  • A dynamic ecosystem in which plants and animals affect each other
  • AI:s that you can trade and interact with

 

    The Team

    Homestead is developed by a two man team with a passion for city-building and strategy games. We wanted a settler simulation game with a small number of detailed individuals in a large open world that has a simulated ecosystem. We felt that such a game was missing and decided to create it. Homestead is the result.

    Development Status

    We have completed most of the core functionality of the game, but need your help to finish it. Developing a game of this complexity is time consuming. All donations would go into development of the game. If fully funded, we expect to deliver an Early Access Alpha version of the game for Windows and Mac during the first quarter 2017. The full game depends on the success of this Early Access version.

     

    Game Features

    The World

    The game takes place in a large open world that contains different types of physical geography. The main types of regions are:

    • Coastal regions, that features good fishing opportunities, mild winters, but lots of rain and snow
    • Mountain regions, with harsh winters and short summers, limited farming, but plenty of mineral resources
    • Forest regions, that offers natural protection from harsh weather, plenty of wood and hunting opportunities
    • Plains, that offers excellent agriculture, but limited wood and mineral resources, and mild winters

     

    Where you decide to start your settlement matters, in terms of climate, available resources and logistics. Each region has its own local flora and fauna. Some examples of common resources are:

    • Edible plants (e.g berries, fruits, roots, etc)
    • Rocks and minerals (stone for construction and tools, iron ore, gold, silver, etc)
    • Wood (various types of trees, used in construction, tool making, fuel and more)
    • Herbs (used in cooking and medicine)
    • Fibers (used as insulation and to make rope, etc)
    • Seeds and seedlings from various plants that can be planted and grown

     

    Settlers

    Each member of your group is an individual, with different needs, attitudes and abilities. They all share the basic need for food, rest, shelter and companionship. But differ in the choice of activities, the amount of food required and so on. They will do the work you assign them to do as long as their basic needs are met.

    Each settlers well-being is determined by many factors, and it is up to you to provide the means for them to live long and happy lives. For example, you could provide work and leisure activities they enjoy or invest time and resources in building proper houses and giving them warmer clothing. They will tell you what ails them and what you could do to remedy it.

    Settlers fall in two broad categories when it comes to work. Laborers are general workers that, for example, deliver materials to where it is needed, prepares firewood, makes roads and so on. Other settlers have assigned professions and work in dedicated areas.

     

    Your settlers are your main resource, so taking care of their needs will be your top priority.

    Ecosystem

    The game features a simulated ecosystem. That is, an environment where settlers, plants and animals interact and affect each other. Plants grow dynamically with the seasons. This means that you need to plan and be careful in order to get maximum yield and not deplete the resources you depend on. For example:

    • Deer populations require food and forests to hide in, thus you can force a deer population to relocate due to heavy deforestation or harvesting the plants they eat.
    • Berries, for example, starts to grow during the early summer and will be ripe in the fall. Each year they will provide more, unless disturbed.
    • Extensive and careless overfishing of a lake may completely wipe out the fish population in that lake.

     

    The Homestead

    A homestead is a collection of buildings, structures, fields, roads and more, together with the surrounding area. The homestead is where your settlers live, and where wildlife is somewhat held back.

    The homestead follows the homesteading principle by which one can claim ownership of unknown land by performing work on it. Thus, your homestead cannot be used by AI:s, and vice versa. However, structures and (owned) land can be lost if they remain unused over long periods of time, after which they can be claimed by someone else.

     

    You can build many different kinds of buildings or structures, e.g. houses, production buildings, storages, social buildings, camps, and utilities. All structures deteriorate over time, thus maintenance is needed. Also, storms may come and destroy already built structures so you may have to rebuild.

    Production

    Production is performed in production buildings. One such example is the woodcutter, where settlers can chop logs into firewood. Another is the blacksmith building, which utilizes various materials to construct tools such as axes, scythes and hammers. The flow of materials required to produce one axe is shown schematically below, where raw materials (e.g trees, iron rich ore) are harvested and refined (e.g firewood from logs, charcoal from slowly burning wood) before being used by the blacksmith.

     

    Wild Animals

    There are many animals that roam in the wild. For example:

    • Deer
    • Elk
    • Bear
    • Rabbits

    Animals are individuals belonging to populations spread out in the wilderness. The size of these populations, the existence of food, natural enemies, human settlements, etc, determine the growth and decline of these populations.

    Your settlers can interact with the animals, both on purpose and involuntarily, i.e. they can be hunted or they can attack the settlers in some circumstances. You can create teams of settlers to find and hunt the animals, yielding meat and possibly other materials such as leather.

    Agriculture

    When a homestead matures, the possibilities of agriculture increase. By constructing fields and orchards your settlers can grow various crops. Examples of crops are:

    • Wheat
    • Barley
    • Corn
    • Garlic
    • Potatoes
    • Carrots

     

    The sowing and reaping of crops is done by the farmer, a specific settler profession. The farmer will tend to the crops, and do other things when he or she has to wait for them to grow.

    The settlers can also make use of domesticated animals that can provide food, material and fertilizer to improve the production of crops. Animal husbandry is done by the herder, another agriculture profession, which takes care of the animals in pastures.

    Trade

    Trading is done via bargaining, that is, you trade one item for another directly. For example, you can trade an axe for some chickens or some iron ore for cabbage seeds. In order to trade, you have to visit another homestead or have a merchant visit you. Another possibility is via annual markets where representatives from homesteads across the land can meet each other to trade goods.  

    Trading is limited to what your settlers can carry. Since there are very few roads in the world of Homestead, and lots of wilderness, trading can be quite challenging, depending on where you choose to settle.

    Game modes

    Customization of the game is possible in various ways, for example by playing as a group or as a solo adventurer. The game can be played in sandbox mode where you decide the objectives, but also in different scenarios where the game is challenging you in various ways. A scenario editor, where you can create your own scenarios, will also be available.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Whether you decide to support the campaign or not, you can still help us out by sharing this with friends and family. You can also help by voting for us on Steam Greenlight! 

    You can also find us on twitter, facebook, and youtube.

    Contact

    You can check our homepage for more material, or contact us at support@homesteadgame.com.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Carter. I am a 13 year old boy that loves to play video games. I also love sports and school And of course my family. All my family has is one computer that is usually taken by some none else such as my mom or dad or brothers.

My campaign is based on getting a computer for myself. I am sure that many of you guys/ ladies have wanted a computer to your self when you were young just like me. I think that you can relate to the situation that I'm in. I really love computers.  I am thinking of getting into programming but I don't have the time to on my family computer because always someone needs to get on...

I don't know if you understand what you will help me with. YOU could be the reason of landing me a great job or YOU could help me live my dream. YOU would be helping someone greatly.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Right now there is a campaign going on with Inovision Gaming to end overpriced gaming computers. The top of the line computer costs only 1000 dollars and it is the best currently.

$1

I will personally write you an email expressing my love.

$3

I will email you a simple program.

$5

I will email you an awesome program (well for me at least) that generates multiple times tables.

$10

I will email you a program that calculates tax.

$30

I will send you a simple game when I make it.

$50

I will send you a cool game when I make it.

$100

Just if you want to.

$110

I will send you an awesome strategy game when I make it.

$500

I will write a long loving email that will take very long to write and send it to you.

$1000

I know none of you will donate this amount so it's just for show.

$2000

FOR THE CRAZY PEOPLE!!

If I don't reach my goal I will save the money I earn and try again.

The Impact

 

If I reach my goal, this will be huge for me both now and in the future.

I know your probably reading this thinking that you wont donate. Just please donate a dollar every dollar counts to the goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help, please share this to friends, neighbors, family, it will help in a different way.

story:
Our Story

Recently, my mp3 storage device died, taking with it all my writing for the last year or more. I know, I know: I should have backed up more. I was between computers, I got complacent. It is certainly all my fault. But you can benefit as well as me if the data can be saved. Among what was lost were two RPGs close to completion. I want them back so I can give them to the world.

The Impact

If the funding goal is reached, I can pay a company to restore the data. If I get the files I'm after, I can finish at least two RPGs in the next month or so, not to mention a massive fan supplement for Warhammer on Estalia! Also my life will be a bit less grim.

What We Need & What You Get

The cheapest quote I can get to repair the device is $250. If I raise that, they'll restore what they can. However, this thing won't let me ask for less than $500. Extra funds will go towards paying for Steve's mental health and other nice things.

If you contribute and the data is saved, you'll get:
A copy of my Famous Five RPG the moment it's finished
A free copy of my adorable "Rime Dragons" RPG the moment it's finished (this game will then be on sale for others, but you get it free)
Credits in both works
Anything else I can find
My undying gratitude
