We also produced a prototype which top contributors will be able to view and discuss with us, including the full list of features that aren't disclosed here in the interests of IP protection. We are now inviting you to help this app reach its full potential during the development phase.
Our founder is currently completing his PhD and has always loved puzzles and quizzes of all kinds. However, when looking at all the quiz apps currently available on the market, we were disappointed to see that all the apps were lacking in various areas:
The problems we found with currently available quiz apps: 

They use outdated and obscure questions.
They do not have a realistic competitive feel.
They don't offer any reason to complete the quiz i.e. no sense of achievement, competition, leveling etc.
They are all single format questions e.g. the typical multiple choice trivia question with four options.
The questions are not interactive i.e. just press the answer and lock it in.
The apps that do have leaderboards require you to complete hundreds of quizzes to reach the top and require the download of third party software.

Seeing all of these shortcomings, we saw the opportunity to develop an ultimate quiz experience for casual gamers and hardcore quiz fans alike.
In particular, we are producing an entirely new up-to-date question database for the game, rather than simply purchasing an outdated database and this will include interactive questions of a variety of different formats. Follow our Facebook and Twitter pages to keep up to date and answer daily questions until the game is released!

Development Costs

During the scoping and prototyping phase, an estimate of $40,000AUD was reached for an iOS (iPhone) build of this app. This is what has been estimated in order to achieve a world-class level app, including all of the core features. After all, nobody wants an app that is barely functional. This campaign has been listed at $45,000AUD to allow for any unforseen development costs that may arise and to build a website for the app.
If the campaign reaches ~$90,000 then an android build (estimated at $50,000) will begin development as well, as we would really love to see this game made available across as many current mobile devices as possible.
Any money raised above this will be used to build some of the extra features into the app that were put on hold to reach the more realistic cost of $40,000.
If the goal of $45,000 is not reached, then we will work with the development team to scale back the build to fit within the budget, however this may severely impair the core concept so please show your support for this exciting app and help it to reach its full potential :-)






Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone is able to contribute financially. If 
you love our concept and would still like to be
 part of the QuizComp story, we would be very grateful if you could "like", share and answer our daily quizzes on our facebook page at www.facebook.com/QuizComp or tweet us at www.twitter.com/QuizCompGame (you will receive in-game credits when the game is released to thank you for your support)We would love for you to help us build our new question database, simply submit any questions you would like to see in the game to quizcompgame@gmail.com (preferably in a spreadsheet or word document if you have multiple questions) and we will be sure to include them in the release. We would also love to hear from you with any ideas, 
questions or any other features that you would like to see implemented to make this the ultimate quiz app.Please email any questions, ideas etc to quizcompgame@gmail.com or contact us here or on facebook or twitter.We have just created Facebook and twitter pages so jump onto www.facebook.com/QuizComp or www.twitter.com/QuizCompGame and be the first to tweet, like and share us. Everyone who Tweets, Likes, Shares and answers our daily quizzes on our pages will receive some in-game credits when the game is released! :-)Happy quizzing,Andrew at QC

story:
UPDATE 6/23/14: When you are done donating, BE SURE TO FILL OUT THIS SURVEY. Otherwise you WILL NOT get your rewards! For those of you having decks shipped to you, Ruby will handle gathering your addresses LATER, after she has the decks in hand. See Updates for further details on timing.

UPDATE, 6/20/14: If you are not going to a convention, never fear! Someone has opted to arrange for shipping decks to folks. Please read the Important Note down there, below, for more information. All the way down. Kay thanks!

UPDATE, 6/11/14: Welcome folks from Equestria Daily! Heads up! The official 1.0 version of the PDF will not be released until Sunday June 15th so don't go printing v0.10.0 early! I'd hate for you all to waste ink like that, haha. Either way, hello! Hi! Welcome! 

If you don't have any local friends to play with, never fear! We have a Vassal module that lets you play online with your friends! 

-- End Update --

Greetings, fellow horrible people! We are Horrible People Studios, and we want to bring our horrible games to BronyCon! One of the things that has floored us and made us feel Oh So Special is the huge positive response our flagship game, Twilight Sparkle's Secret Shipfic Folder, has received at previous cons, and we want to bring more joy to the East Coasters this year.

However, seeing as we're based in Seattle, a trip to Baltimore can get very expensive, along with all the other fees and costs that go along with it. You can see our cost breakdown in the infographic below. Long story short, we're looking to raise $2200 to get to BronyCon this year, and we need your help.

For those who may not be familiar with TSSSF, here's the elevator pitch: Twilight Sparkle is Equestria's most prolific (and horrific) fan fiction author. She ships herself, her friends, her family, and her enemies in a labyrinthine mess of OTPs with complete disregard for familial relation, sexual orientation, and harmonious mane/coat color combination. You play as part of her twisted psyche, building up a "shipping grid" of pairings using the cards from your hand, attempting to achieve goal points so you can prove yourself the Queen of the Ships.

It features 162 full-color cards, all uniquely illustrated by Pixel Prism!

Rated PG.

TSSSF has been a labor of love for the three of us since we conceived of it back in Season 2. Since the beginning, we've provided access to the cards completely free of charge via our website. Recently, we've started a Patreon, giving extra goodies and early access to all our patrons. They've been a wonderful help recouping expenses and giving us incentive to put more content out faster. 

Despite putting the cards out for free, the cons we went to in 2013 proved to us that people don't want to just print out their own decks, but rather would prefer to grab-and-go with an official deck. If we make it to BronyCon, we can provide decks of our 1.0 version of the game to an unprecedented audience.

But of course we're not expecting pure altruism, and want to be able to make it worth your while for helping us. We have a number of lovely incentives to give to anyone willing to help us out.

All tiers now get the wallpaper pack and a very short story!

Note: Decks will be selling for $30 at conventions!

Stretch Goals


This indiegogo, at its heart, is ONLY to help us get to BronyCon in August. That said, although we're covering the cost of card printing out-of-pocket, it's exceptionally steep! If we make above our main goal, we'll be able to reimburse ourselves for that and other important con-related costs!

Stretch Goal: Cover the Cost of Printing 100 Decks - $3500
If we reach $3500, we will have covered the cost of printing 100 decks. We'll also spring for some basic reverse-top boxes and some sticker logos so it's not just a deck wrapped in cellophane!

Stretch Goal: Cover the Cost of Food - $3800
If we reach $3800, that will cover the cost of feeding us for four days, plus any additional costs the extra money will incur in fees and taxes. All tiers will get a whole pack of TSSSF wallpapers (probably 5-8 or so?). 

Stretch Goal: Cover the Cost of Printing 150 Decks - $4400
If we reach $4400, the cost of printing 150 decks will be covered! All tiers get drabbles -- basically short fanfic snippets Twilight will write just for you!

Stretch Goal: Cover the Cost of Printing 300 Decks - $6100
If we reach $6100, we'll cover the cost of printing 300 decks! We will also spring for real, actual, designed and printed tuckboxes for each deck!

Stretch Goal: Cover All Con Costs (and taxes and fees) - $8000
Since we covered the tuckboxes out of our own wallet and there are other things like new display materials etc, there's a final for-reals ultimate stretch goal. And that is to cover all our con costs this year! Which would be frankly amazing!! That would cover table costs for Everfree, BronyCon, AND BronyCAN; it would cover food and hotel costs for BronyCAN too. It would cover all the display equipment (wireframe cubes, vinyl sign, fancy shmancy tablecloth, etc) that we've already picked up. It would cover the new button punch, the business cards, as well as the cost of printing out all our prints and buttons, as well as the button supplies.
Also, since pretty much every penny of this campaign has largely gone to printing costs etc, we'll still have to pay a hefty chunk of taxes on it later. We're not terribly worried, but it would be nice to not have to think about it too much! Also this will probably pay for an accountant because good gosh.

Anything above this will go back into our coffers to start a con fund!

Important Notes About Decks

If you purchase an incentive that includes a deck, we will set a deck aside just for you to pick up at BronyCon, BronyCAN, or possibly EverfreeNW*. 

Someone has offered to gather up and ship decks to folks who can't make conventions. You are welcome to take this option! If so, 1) Please note that you will ALSO have to pay shipping costs. 2) Donate here as per usual, then drop a comment here to let us know you need your deck shipped to you. 3) Then email Ruby at rubyblossom(a)outlook.com. 4) Ruby will not be working on coordinating all of this until the decks are in hand after Everfree, so just sit tight after that! They will be sending out a Google Form survey to get all your details at the appropriate time.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Please check the USPS.com Shipping Calculator for your region, for a package weighing 2lbs. You will be shouldering that cost! So please decide if that's worth the cost before you donate. Ruby's happy to accommodate you!

IMPORTANT NOTE II: SON OF IMPORTANT NOTE: When you've donated, please answer our very short survey so we know where our decks are going!

FAQ

Q: Are the custom cards standard in everyone's decks or are they just mine?
A: They're just yours! Custom cards for everyone would need to observe very strict rules and a lot of guidance from us. If you want to make your card available separately, however, you are more than welcome to!

Q: When will I get my custom cards? Should I be sending you information now?
A: Hold on tight! We're going to get your deck to you first. Then, once con season is over and we've had a moment to breathe, we'll send out surveys asking you for information on your cards. Once we've made them, we'll send you the PNG over email, and then once they've been printed we'll get your shipping information and send it to you in the mail. This should be, at the latest, April of next year but we'll keep you apprised!

Q: Can I buy the con-exclusive cards separately (at cons)?
A: You absolutely can! We'll be selling them for $5 or free with purchase of a deck. If you pick up your Indiegogo deck there, you'll get the con exclusive for free AS WELL AS the Indiegogo exclusive. Lucky you!

Q: You said only people who pick their decks up at cons get the con-exclusive cards. Do people who donated $40 or higher and are getting their decks shipped still get the Maud Pie card?
A: Absolutely!! The Maud Pie card is Indiegogo-exclusive, not con-exclusive. Everyone who donated for that card will get it, whether you pick it up or have it shipped.

Q: If someone else is picking up my deck for me at the con, do I still get the con exclusive card?
A: Most definitely! And I'm sure Ruby appreciates not having to ship your deck!

Q: Wait, you can get a deck shipped to you if you're not going to a con?
A: Indeedy! Donate as normal, drop a comment letting us know you need it shipped, and contact Ruby at rubyblossom@outlook.com!

Q: When will we get our decks shipped?
A: Sometime after BronyCAN (which is at the end of August). We're going to be spending most of our time juggling the decks back and forth between cons and we have no idea how well or poorly they'll sell. (Well, we have an idea, but we don't want to pin our hopes too high.) After the con craziness is done, we'll order any extra decks we need to fulfill the orders and send them on their merry way!

Q: Can I increase my pledge for a higher tier?
A: You can, although it's not as easy on Indiegogo as it is on Kickstarter. Simply pledge at the $1 tier and increase your pledge to the difference, and make sure to answer our survey with your correct tier. (For more information, see this page.)

Q: Can I get my friends to buy the con exclusive cards for me? 
A: Yes, of course! Though please note that all customers are limited to 2 exclusives and 2 decks per con. (Purchasing exclusives for someone else counts against your limit; so does buying a deck for someone who hasn't yet gotten one. However, picking up a deck for someone who's already donated DOES NOT count against your limit.)

Q: Can I pay you ahead of time for the exclusive cards my friends will be picking up?
A: Alas, no! That would mean more book-keeping on our part and it increases the likelihood we won't be able to keep track of additional purchases and lose your purchase and basically things just get a little crazy. Just give the money to your friends and have them buy 'em up. That would be the best way. Sorry for the inconvenience!


Referral Contest

In addition to the incentives listed above, we have more benefits for those who help get the word out about our campaign! When you share a link to our campaign using the Indiegogo Media Share Tools, Indiegogo tracks any pledges they make. If you refer enough people, and they make enough pledges, you'll get a FREE reward from the list below.

Reminder: You MUST use the Indiegogo Media Share tools, or you will not get referral credit!!

TSSSF Around the Internet


The article on Best Crowdfunding does a pretty fantastic job explaining TSSSF to a non-brony audience, including defining terms like "ship" and reaching out to the beleaguered parents in the fandom. It's really pretty fantastic! Read it here!


Equestria Gaming's article definitely does a great job of explaining TSSSF's appeal! It's written by a fan of the game, too! Read it here!


And of course, let's not forget Equestria Daily! They did a quick little writeup of our humble game, linking to the cards doc and everything! Read it here!

Important Legal Mumbo-Jumbo

We are not Hasbro, nor do we have anything to do with Hasbro. This is an entirely fan-created game, made for fans by fans as a loving parody of the show and its fandom.

story:
Our Story

Project Roxivia follows the development of an 3D Platformer RPG being created by PBat, AlgolGaming and his Wife, Nick Pittsinger and the rest of their team.

The game is currently in early development stages, but due to some life issues, a few team members had to drop, which forces us to hire new members in their place. This of course costs money, and money is something we are slightly short on. This is where you come in.

If you could spare even the smallest amount of cash to us, it would greatly help us in developing the game, and putting us that little bit closer to making our vision a reality. You can stay up to date on the development of the game by liking the Project Roxivia Facebook page linked below. There, you will find updates on the game, small art samples, small music samples, and you can even give your feedback and help with the development of the game. We want to make sure YOU are as much of a part of the creation of Project Roxivia as we are.

http://www.facebook.com/ProjectRoxivia?ref=tn_tnmn

The Impact

Right now, we believe the industry is filled with old people in suits figuring out which Game Remake will make them the most money. This game is a game made by gamers, for gamers. We have been playing games all our life, and we know what differentiates a good game from a bad game. We are also very vocal with the community, taking your advice into extreme consideration. We plan to make a game that people will remember for the rest of their lives.


What We Need & What You Get

As previously mentioned, we will need money to hire new team members to bring our vision to life, but trust me, your generous donations will not go unnoticed. We have set up various rewards for you depending on how much you donate! From having your name implanted in the actual game, to having some of our team fly to your location to pay for a few days of hanging out with you.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate money, we completely understand, but there is still way you can help. Word of mouth is a very powerful tool. So you can spread the word about our campaign. Tell your friends, tweet at some of your favorite internet personalities! The more people see our campaign, the better chance we have to make this work out exactly as we want it to work!

story:
THANK YOU !!! 
MERCI !!!
CHOKRAN !!!

We havent reached our goal but the incredible buzz made around DefenDoor was incredible.

We are happy to tell you that Today : 12/12/12 @12:12pm, DefenDoor went online : https://www.facebook.com/playdefendoor/

You can join the community from now and jump in the arena to fight and win a lot of gifts.

 

See you there !

story:
Short Summary

Dawn of the Evil is an action-rpg game with the elements of mystics and hardcore-fight targeted for adults (17+) and players who love ancient history. We would like to bring something really new into the world of RPG as we are a G2G  (Gamers2Gamers) company called Eastglade Entertainment.


Dawn of the evil is rpg game with the elements of action, mystics, and hardcore-fight as we mentioned before. We started this process because we are players, or more exactly gamers, and we really know what the real gamers need. Sometimes gamers need not only some action but the kknowledgethat’s why we take so much attention to history and metaphysics in our game. Our slogan is ‘A Human, not a Hero’ and we try to proof this statement at each and every step of our working process. Thus, hero doesn't have special super-natural abilities as 90% of the characters and what is more important he will have to struggle with everything around - people, own superstitions, monsters, authorities… overall he will have to become strong first (train his spirit), and only then powerful.

Overall,  because our slogan is ‘A Human, not a Hero’ it means our protagonist will not be unique with superhuman abilities- he'll have to live as ''surfer of fate lines', i.e. not struggling with life and people, but following the ways of life remembering about butterfly effect - this will make the player and his character as one. Our player will live and grow with the protagonist.


As we go we’re making the process of the game creation and each stage completion as transparent as only we can. However we do not reveal the complete scenario of our game for the known reason. We start sharing the facts about our game on our Social pages as we went.


In the meantime you can see most of the fact about our game on our Social pages and on our site. We either shared these facts or answered in form of F.A.Q.

*The actions of the first chapter will take place in 540 BC.

*The genre of our game is Action-Rpg and there will be with the elements of hardcore-fight, role-play, adventure and action games.

*We mixed up the apocalyptic legends, ancient Greek and Bible legends. And not only them actually. One of the co-founders wrote a manuscript called “Metaphysics” where he tried to combine Assyrian, Greek, ancient Hebrew and all Near-East legends to find a parallel between them.  We want our players dive into the true ancient worlds and live with the beliefs and superstitions of those epochs.

*Our hero is not a super-man – and this is another secret we can tell. Also some of the non-playable characters can just refuse to do some actions so our hero will have to face really hard time to achieve his goals and complete his mission. In other words, some missions may be very tricky and bring you more adventures than you have expected. Also our sociability is mirrored in our game as the hero will need to try to earn the trustworthy among npc-characters.

*Each npc will live his or her own lives. The open world, nonlinear story and all the costumes + weapons are close to the ones people used to wear and use during those days. We keep working over the historical exactness to be very realistic.

If we reach our goal we’ll be able to complete the process of location creation that will be shown in our next trailer. The location will be settled by the humans. The process of main characters creation will be finally completed. Also the first 3d models of the monsters will be completed too. And  if we achieve our goals the funded money may also help us to complete the prototype of the behavioral system as well. In the best case if the necessary money are crowdfunded all the mentioned processes will take us 3-4 month of hard working to complete.


The main motivation for this campaign is to introduce the new ancient style action-rpg with the realistic feeling of the past times and reveal many secrets of “how it works” process via social media.


The goals we pursuit


The first goal of our campaign is to gather money for 3d shooting and filming process that means we’ll need the new office with the professional equipment for the mentioned purposes. We would like to bring the brand new faces and appearances, rich mimics and emotions which is almost impossible without the special tools. Also we are supposed to be a social project and we would like to help young talents in Riga to start their careers with us. First of all, we need actors who will lend us their voices and emotions. Of course, many developers may want to see the faces of celebrities such as Shakira or young Brad Pitt and use them as prototypes in their games –  but joking aside we’re inventing the new game and we need to bring the game to the people next to us. Thus, filming sort of work won’t be possible without markers, cameras and other 3D equipment plus renting a place to shoot for the two year period.  


Now we created locations you see in the trailer, but they are nothing without settlers and characters, who are, in their turn, impossible to be 3d without the proper equipment. The scenario and concept-art are ready too. You can see some of this stuff here within the text, most of concept-art and location renders are available on our Social Network Sites.

The second goal is to start  with the 3D equipping. If you google for 3d scanners anywhere in specialized ecommerce stores (such as amazon) you will see how much the professional means really cost. We need about 20 cameras and 3d scanner not only for a face scanning process but also for capturing the necessary emotions and face mimics so that any character looks as natural as possible. The more professionally made the game, the more professional 3d equipment is. Needless to say the high-quality 3d equipment costs money. And also we’re always welcome the thirsty for learning IT individuals who would like to improve their experience with our game.

The third goal is to broadcast out our working process. Seriously. Many people do not believe in many game developers because they just do not know what they are really doing. On our social network pages we tried to make this process as transparent and clear as we could. The same thing is done for our site. However for this purpose we do not ask for money - we’ve done it at our own expenses… along with working out the locations, purchasing equipment for 3d-art. In comparison with the 3d equipment  for shooting process it costs nothing :).

And the goal number zero is to complete the four-month stage of developing process – when the basic level is reached, the system of health-n-sleep will be developed, the basic placements without sophisticated cities will be built, first monsters and main character become live and the faces you now see in concepts become lively with rich mimics!



What We Need & What You Get

What We Need

We’re not asking you for money to make the game. We are realistic about this process and we know that we need a good start first. So we divided the process of game development into proper stages. Thus, we are crowdfunding money for the start process – we need to create 3d  models, buy scanners and cameras and shoot a new trailer-video with characters to show what the final version of the game will look like. The equipment will help our team to complete the models of first monsters, characters, npcs, settle the locations you see in demo-video etc. And here are the figures we’ll try to achieve with IndieGogo:


45000 €  will help us to obtain the 3d scanner likeArctic Eva plus buy 20 cameras, a virtual camera, markers and 3 costumes for animation.  This equipment lets designers and 3d modelers to catch not only the appearance of the human-model but also to scan and remember the emotions and mimics of each face that will make any character look realistic. Thus the mentioned equipment will help to complete the creation of the main characters.

The sum of 10000€  will be needed to create 3d models of 3d non-human objects. Yes, we need to use 3d models of objects (not characters) like spiders, fish, wings… i.e. all non-human objects including the mystic objects that do not exist in our world.

We needed the sum of  15000€ to rent a new office with the special room for 3D shooting and scanning.




Next, and this is where you come in, any of our donator will have a special account on our forum and join as contributor to our community. However right now you can communicate with us via FB, Twitter and Google+ pages as our point is to be clear and transparent and we get in touch with all our followers using social network pages.

If we reach our 70000€ stretch goal, we'll be able to afford a new equipped official office, to widen our experienced 3d team (many people who know lots about the game understand most of work is based on 3d team) and the more staff you have the quicker process goes, monster-n-heroes  trailer video will be released, the new sets of 3d objects will be completed before we get to alpha stage and also we will finish 4 month process with the settlements of the first locations.


Right now we are the team of non-funded enthusiasts from Eastern Europe with the concept-art, scenario of the game and the readymade set of sample locations and landscapes. And, yes, of course the prototypes of our hero are also ready and you can see the sketches of the heroes on Twitter, Facebook, G+ and on our IndieGogo page.

How your money is used


So we need to be clear about how money will be used. If we make exactly 70000€ or more it will help us to rent a new office, to set maximum equipment for 3d photo shooting, to complete first 4-month-stage process (pre-alpha) and to release the first official video trailer with the monsters and 3d faces of our characters. If this sum will be insignificantly more than planned the money will be spent on widening sets of supporting npc-characters.

If the sum of money raised will be significantly more than the necessary sum (150% and more) then money will be spent on widening of our developers  team to accelerate the process of final release of alpha, thus, alpha is released before September 2015.

To be more clear about our plans we need to say the quality of 3d scanner depends on the price. For instance, if we reach our minimum or less we will have nothing but to buy DAVID Structured Light 3D Scanner worth 3000+ euros with postage. It has minimal requirements for us to please our players with good graphics. However if we reach more than twice of the required sum  then we will be able to afford the Artec Eva 3D Scanner that costs 19000 euros with postage. The last scanner is good for the high-quality objects capture thus the detailed graphics of any object will be of premium quality. Also we will need a  set of 20 cameras, a virtual camera, a costume and hat for the further animation process. And this equipment is the minimum  requirements we needed to start 3d shooting for the game.


We will keep updating infographics about the budget reach to reflect the current status of the campaign so that all our donators could know what we’ve gathered and what goals of the list have been achieved.


What You Get


So what do our donators get out of it?  The concept of the company is not bad but  the big projects really need a big start whereas the donators need some kind of evidences of project existence and serious goals of the team. First of all, we will share the posters with any donator and that is not the question as we’ve already shared our pieces of art with the contest participants we organized on our Social pages. However more stuff as special club-cart or early alpha access will be available later on (estimated date of  alpha release - September 2015) .

If we get funds enough for renting the new office with 3d photoshoot equipment any donator will get the posters, art-books, manual books, T-shirts and bestiary stylized as our special game trend. This stuff will be the first to deliver as printable information based on the concept-art and as long as the concept-art is ready that won’t make you wait long (T-shirts and hi-res posters will be sent immediately once the money is crowdfunded)


The VIP donators will be granted the special premium and platinum accounts that means some special missions will be made only for them and some tricks will be revealed during these missions. However we are realistic and we understand that the first steps are all about renting a good office here in Riga equipped with 3d shooting means  and completion process of 3d model creation.

If you've paid for something physical (such as T-shirt, coins, pendants, printed posters etc), and you don't want to pick it up from the place we live, you will probably have to pay for the postage charges as well.

Europe: 10€/ Globally: 10€

But all the digital copies are free of charges and will be posted as we release each. The quickest delivery comes for the posters and calendars, definitely access to alpha is the longest stuff to wait. 

Also the high-level donators will not have to pay extra postal charges as it will be at expense of our team.


The Impact

A different type of Action-RPG

We are a different type of action-rpg genre. However we’re positioning ourselves as rpg with the elements of action and mix of other genres. When it comes to the top action-rpg games  hero can do unusual stuff and replace the whole armies using his extra abilities  but our hero will be a simple mortal thus he will have to sweat on the abilities and solve different tricky problems (as we previously mentioned he will have to come across unexpected deeds, actions and refusals by his partners). We would really love to let players feel how hard those times were and feel exactly like our hero does.


The story, as mentioned, is based on the ancient legends and some true historical events. You will be also able to see the true historical and legendary individuals throughout the game. There will be different female characters but the main female character will surprise you, we swear! You already see her unique appearance here in concept-art illustrations. We skipped the classy red hairs and green eyes you often see in many top games. We brought the new concepts of faces - we promised that. However now we need real people and equipment to make these characters real and lively, full of mimics and emotions.

A good introductory of the game is always a must and we are working on this process.  We will do our best to introduce the catchiest stuff! Also you will need to have some special  mystical abilities – yes, we still cannot do without them and archangels in the game will help you with that!


As long as we are in need of the pledges, the main character will be developed in real time. You will follow the process up in all our social networks & on our site. Currently we’ve composed the costumes for the characters after spending time working with the true historical  fashion details. We are fans of history and legends so sometimes we know  the topic, sometimes we need to consult with the professionals. For instance, we needed to describe the steel-casting process in the game (scenario stage) and we found the professional who taught us master-class.

Both the beginners and masters of rpg, action and other genres will be interested in our game because the characters will be catchy, unique… sometimes too unique even Assyrian Gods will be there! And yes, there will be some unpredictable stuff as some solutions of the protagonist will not be liked by his partners (both of npc and the real players) – but he won’t be able to do otherwise – that is the point! Previously we mentioned that the hero will sometimes be refused to do something by his partners. And that means unpredictable stuff of the game will make you step over the usual steps you take while playing and try to find another solution.


Currently we are working on the digital manual however the readymade book will be available as the game is completed. But the access to the early Alpha is meant to have some prompts and guidances on how to complete this or that mission. Also we put the estimated delivery date as the datewhen Alpha is completed that is September 2015 (digital art will be delivered fater).


Our team is also working on the tricky algorithms that will really make your missions even more complicated. Thus, the protagonist will have to sweat on fight with monsters - he will need to find out the monster’s weak points.

Definitely there will be a social club for the players in a long run but now it’s not our highest priority. We’re frequently asked about social club and similar matters. Going to indiegogo is a best chance to answer FAQ about our game. You can use our site, Social pages, Youtube and other channels to ask questions.

Each step is tested by ourselves, our close friends and family members who are players themselves. And thus we base each step (starting with the grass on our landscapes and finishing up with the comfort of the hero’s costume) on the opinions from both inside and outside. Yes, the vip donators will be able to join this team and will be the first to test alpha with us! We are enjoying this process and we hope you will enjoy it too.

Risks & Challenges

No crowdfunding campaign comes without risks, but we will try to minimize them.

The worst case scenario is if we cannot reach 70000 € our team won’t be completed and we won’t be able to rent an office with the special studio for 3d scanning process. But we will still have possibility to find sponsors here on our soils, however in that case it will take our players and fans waiting longer in comparison with the best case scenario.

But let's make sure it doesn't come to that and instead we are donated and we finally started the first 4-month process that will keep being broadcasted on our Social media Channels and the site!


Other Ways You Can Help

We don't just need your money! But yes, of course we actually do need it but for us it is more important to be with our community, your support and being transparent so that you know the process you are donating for and thus we think over other ways to get in touch with the interested players. We mean our site - you can visit the donation page on our site by clicking the banner below.

Tell everybody about Dawn of the Evil! You can also spread a word about us and get the tiers that are free of charges. If you ask your friends to like or follow us on social pages you will be granted accesses to the early versions of our game too. Feel free to send your contacts via DM or use the contact form in our site. Let us know your name and the name of people you bring with to Facebook or Twitter if you contribute via social pages


Feel free to use IndieGoGo's sharing tools, or just post the link to your pages – it will be helpful in any way!



Join the team! We still need some professionals here in Baltic soils or in tele-way!


Contact us with feedback about the campaign, and new ideas to help us grow better for our fans sake!

Get really excited about the results of our first crowdfunding campaign. :)

Thanks!


P.s. A special thanks to the Pandaphonic Studio that composed a great soundtrack to present our locations!

We would like to bring something really new into the world of RPG as we are a G2G  (Gamers2Gamers) company called Eastglade Entertainment.

Going to indiegogo is a best chance to answer FAQ about our game. You can use our site, Social pages, Youtube and other channels to ask questions.
Each step is tested by ourselves, our close friends and family members who are players themselves. And thus we base each step (starting with the grass on our landscapes and finishing up with the comfort of the hero’s costume) on the opinions from both inside and outside. Yes, the vip donators will be able to join this team and will be the first to test alpha with us! We are enjoying this process and we hope you will enjoy it too.
  Risks & Challenges  
No crowdfunding campaign comes without risks, but we will try to minimize them.
The worst case scenario is if we cannot reach 70000 € our team won’t be completed and we won’t be able to rent an office with the special studio for 3d scanning process. But we will still have possibility to find sponsors here on our soils, however in that case it will take our players and fans waiting longer in comparison with the best case scenario.
But let's make sure it doesn't come to that and instead we are donated and we finally started the first 4-month process that will keep being broadcasted on our Social media Channels and the site!

  Other Ways You Can Help 
We don't just need your money! But yes, of course we actually do need it but for us it is more important to be with our community, your support and being transparent so that you know the process you are donating for and thus we think over other ways to get in touch with the interested players. We mean our site - you can visit the donation page on our site by clicking the banner below.Tell everybody about Dawn of the Evil! You can also spread a word about us and get the tiers that are free of charges. If you ask your friends to like or follow us on social pages you will be granted accesses to the early versions of our game too. Feel free to send your contacts via DM or use the contact form in our site. Let us know your name and the name of people you bring with to Facebook or Twitter if you contribute via social pagesFeel free to use IndieGoGo's sharing tools, or just post the link to your pages – it will be helpful in any way! Join the team! We still need some professionals here in Baltic soils or in tele-way!Contact us with feedback about the campaign, and new ideas to help us grow better for our fans sake!Get really excited about the results of our first crowdfunding campaign. :)Thanks!P.s. A special thanks to the Pandaphonic Studio that composed a great soundtrack to present our locations!

story:
Some people had a bit of a dilemma during ESL: '' Should I go out, or stay home and watch Dota?''. Help us make this happen and in a year or two you won't be having that dilemma. You will be doing both ;)

Hello there guys before you read this, one thing you should know. I would really like to do this with my own money, investing with other people's money gives u restraint and higher sense of responsibility. The thing is I have no money to invest in this, but really think that it could get big, any kind of donation would be great, thanks to anyone in advance, even if u just read this or take a look or whatever, cool to know i got someones attention. Enjoy!

MY TEAM

My team consists of 5 people. My brother who is senior year of architecture, he will be handling all of the designs, both interior and exterior. The other one is my friend Stefan Stancic who is styding economics also senior year. He will have no part in the business deals, making of contracts or anything like that. His purpose will be to be the economic manager once the cafe is open. I have Pavle Petrovic, stated him as a marketing manager he is an enthusiast, who will be spamming social networks, and anything he can get his hands on. And I have an IT manager who is also my friend. Wont mention his name since he didnt acceot the role in the team on Indiegogo. He is a junior software developer at Microsoft, and he will be handling the internet page, and everything technology related when the cafe is open. I will be handling the business stuff. I've been taught about these things by my father, who back in the days used to run a pretty sucesfull trading company. Business is not something you learn in schools and I can't guarante I will be good at this, but got noone better than myself, and atleast my team trust in me.

WHY DID WE START THIS?!

The first and main reason for opening a Dota cafe and making it worldwide would be promotion of Dota 2 as a game:

- Encourage more people to try it, which will result in more people playing it since it's a great game

- Make people see that Dota isn't a waste of time, it has a lot of money involved in it, that will just keep on growing

- One day maybe parents will encourage their kids to play Dota (We don't want kids to skip school or anything, just equivalent with some other afterschool activities)

- Increase the number of professional Dota players, professional tournaments, amateur tournaments (to give chance to new players), etc.

- Increase the number of Dota streamers, and promote less known players!

 In the end guys, all sports, games, activities started small and not that significant, the only difference here is that with today's technology and internet things can be promoted a lot faster, so instead of 20-30 years that it took for some games/sports to become world known, we could do the same thing to Dota in maybe 1-2 years. This cafe is one of the ways to do so, so guys if u really like this game support my campaign. 

THE BIG IDEA!

So in the perfect scenario where we raise all the money we need maybe even more then our goal, this is what we hope to create:

- Open it abroad, that would include finding a business partner in the US preferably, since it's the place I think Dota is more popular than any other country. If you have enough money to invest you can get anyone's attention!

- Buy/rent a large premises with a huge garden. So we would have a place where we can realize all of our ideas. We hope to have tables with Dota maps painted or in any way presented on them. A hall of fame, where we would put pictures of world renown dota players, most succesfull ones, so that people who dont play Dota can remember their faces, hear what tournaments they won, etc. Create a noob's corner (not to offend someone, just to put people who dont know about dota and are willing to learn, meaning they didnt come just for a drink, in the same place and hold like a 5-10 minute speech about the basics of the game, so they can be encouraged to try it out). My brother allready started making clay dota artifacts which we will start posting on the campaign soon. The first thing he will try to make is a Pudge's hook. It will hang on the wall with artifacts somewhere in the cafe, where people can look at it, maybe in some cases even be allowed to carry some of them. Have cosplay costumes for our employees, they probably wont be wearing them every day, maybe for some major events or something similar, but we will think more about that. Have more than one bar where people can order drinks (call one secret shop, one base, one side shop, or have 2 of each like in the game, depends of the size of the cafe). Buy a few really good computers/laptops so we can stream with cameras online what is happening in the cafe, when we make an event. Also buy a few really modern TV's we will discuss which TV's would be the best for this, which would give us the best possible picture. We would stream Dota every day, whole day. Buy tickets for all Dota events and stream them in the cafe non stop. Also we will have days when we will stream some funny dota videos, or something like that, we still havent decided on what kind of events exactly we will be hosting. We know that we will try to encourage nearby internet cafes to be hosts of some amateur dota tournaments, that we will sponsor, etc.

- The ultimate goal is this: My team manages a few dota cafes maybe 1 in Serbia, 2-3 in US/Britain, and then as we start getting big, we start selling the name to interested people. We offer them the name, our ideas for 25% of their profit and they take the name and open something similar that we would rate if it's good enough to be a Dota cafe. Something like Hard rock cafe (same concept). Sign contracts make deals, etc.

- Ofcourse buying sofas, chairs, bars, getting liquor licenses, employing an english speaking staff and everything else that goes with the opening of any cafe is mandatory.

BUSINESS PLAN


- 30000$ This amount of money is not sufficient to pay for or buy a premises that my team and I talked about (300 square meters atleast with a pretty big garden). With this kind of money we have 2 options. To open a cafe that would bring some income, set up some online commercials and it will be like a working funding campaign. The second option is to set up a site about our cafe, use the money for promotion and rerun the campaign in an attempt to raise a lot more money than the first time.

- 50000$ Can probably be used to open a descent cafe in Belgrade, Serbia. And still use some money for online commercialism

- 100000$ Would be a sufficient amount of money to open a fully set up Dota cafe in Belgrade, Serbia. Create a site and continue the promotion online.

- 200000$ (Goal) We chose this amount to be the goal. With this money I can contact people abroad (English speaking countries first) for some negotiations about opening it in Britain, America. The point is no serious businessman will even talk to you if u haven't got atleast 150000$

- Everything above this is a dream in which we can probably acomplish all of the ideas that were mentioned, and even more. 

- If we raise less than 30000$ we will use the option 2 of the 30000$ plan just with a lot less budget to work with, it will be hard but we will try to manage, if we are unable to do anything we will just sponsor a few tournaments and give it up!

- Every amount of money thats like higher than these 4 goals will be the same concept, just with a little more budget thus helping us to pull it off easier. We will not waste any money, nor use for ourselves, all of the funding we receive is going towards promoting Dota as a game.

FOR PEOPLE WHO DON'T PLAY DOTA!!!

Dota (Defense of the ancients) is computer game. It's played 5 against 5 people who compete to destroy the enemy's main structure (the ancient). The game starts with both teams picking their heroes, out of a 100+ heroes pool. Every man should try to make their hero stronger, thus helping their teammates achieve the ultimate goal and win the game (destroy the enemy team's ancient). You improve your hero by buying items and gaining levels. It is a team game the point is to be a team player, help others and not just try to win it by yourself (impossible in 99% of cases). This game requires a lot of skill, but the most important thing is tactics and teamwork. In the begining it's hard to understand the game it's very complex and hard, but allways fun to play even if you have no idea what you are doing. That's it for the intro, download Steam and then download Dota, try it!!!

Dota is also the leading game in the world when it comes to tournament prizes. This year's prize pool on the world championship (The international) was over 10 million dollars. It's a game that's getting more and more support every day. Help me promote it even more, even if u just start playing and dont support me I'll be happy i brought more people to play this amazing game.

WE DON'T HAVE MUCH TO OFFER YOU!

Both my team and myself are very sad that at the moment, we can't offer you guys anything in return for your good will of funding our project. We haven't even taken any serious steps since the idea hasn't begun to spread as much as we would like it to. We hope that you can understand our plan and what we are trying to accomplish. If you have any suggestions, ideas any kind of help would be appreciated. We hope that one day if we are fully operational in more than 1 country, and have allready spread through the entire world we can in some way make it up to the people that believed in this, and by funding us helped us accomplish it, by then all we can say is: Thank you!

story:
What is Dawn 2055?

Dawn 2055 is a post-apocalyptic mmo browser game, it takes place in harsh nuclear aftermath. Choose one of the several roles that suits you best - an explorer trying to find expensive items in highly radioactive zones, a contract and mission runner mercenary, a trader looking for profitable trade or even a bandit killing and robbing other survivors.

Key features:

  • A rich fully explorable wasteland based on actual map of Nevada and California.
  • Find loot, craft items, fight NPCs and other players, cooperate for the greater good or only work for yourself..
  • Meet other survivors, start a gang and build your own settlement from the ground up.
  • Fight for control of properties like oil derricks to set your claim on the oil industry, and to be able to drive vehicles.
  • Do variety of tasks and missions.
  • Complete freedom to do whatever you want! No forced tasks or limited rules.
  • Trade items and materials in completely player driven in game economy.

Continued maintenance and development

Dawn 2055 is no longer viable to be developed by the company it's owned, but it's still being actively played by its no so large community. This fundraising is started to gather remaining funds for complete Dawn 2055 buyout from its current owners back to its original creator and open doors to continued Dawn 2055 maintenance and development.


Planned features and improvements

In additional to Dawn 2055 maintenance and bug fixes, it's also planned to implement several features: 

  • Adjustment of balance of items and materials in the game!
  • Additional advantages for player run gangs who own permanent in-game settlements!
  • Adjustments to vehicles aimed to make them more popular!
  • Improved mechanics of in game item shops!
  • Ammo reloading for guns!
  • Dust and fallout storms!
  • Adjustments and balancing to existing game mechanics such as mercenaries and npc towns.

Other Ways You Can Help

If for some reason you cannot afford to contribute funds, there's always other ways you can help:

  • Spread the world about how awesome Dawn 2055 is.
  • Inform your friends who have played the Dawn 2055 in past, but have left it due to lacking maintenance and development.


Notes on contributor perks


Survival kit (starting from 5 eur)
Survival kit is an in-game item that can be redeemed for paid premium features: stat reset, account upgrade, character name change, reputation reset, specialty change (requires multiple kits), custom specialty  (requires multiple kits).

Unique achievement  (starting from 10 Eur)
Get an unique achievement stating you have contributed to further development of Dawn 2055 !

Contributor item (starting from 15 Eur)

* +15 points for all non combat skills  
* Uses equipment slot.  
* As all the other crafting or salvage equipment it can be equipped only by a player! 

  • Upon successful campaign all contributors will be contacted via email for perk allocation!

Dawn 2055 Buyout discussion on its official forums: 
http://www.dawn2055.com/forum.php?f=Offtopic&id=3533

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Spartaco Albertarelli, I'm a professional game designer, with 30 years of experience and more than 100 games published so far (some of my games on Pinterest).
  • After a life spent designing games for game publishers, I decided to open my own company: KaleidosGames. In ancient Greek, Kaleidos means "beautiful images" and I believe that in games art is as important as the rules.
  • KaleidosGames is a very small company, but we know how to design and manufacture good quality games, thanks to my long experience.
  • The idea behind this project is a little bit "crazy": revamping one of the most ancient and sophisticated Italian card game (Scopone), adding a twist and a stunning deck of illustrated cards.
  • The original game is usually played with the typical Italian cards and it's almost unknown outside my country. It's a pity, because it a very clever game.
  • What we did can be summarized by a simple image: from this 

    to this

  • Primiera will let you play either the classic game and my personal evolution, using a deck of modern design cards, with stunning art and all the values clearly printed. 
  • The 40 cards are tarot size, and they are all fully illustrated.
  • You can read and download the rules (in English, French, German, Spanish and Italian) on my Issuu page.
  • You can have a look at the entire deck on our facebook page.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The entire project is already finished. All the artworks are ready, and we'll print the game in any case, also if goal is not reached. This is the reason why we set our goal to just $ 2.000.
  • KaleidosGames is not yet distributed in many countries outside Italy and we are not ready to start a professional online selling, so this can be a good chance to put your hand on a game that could be difficult to find in your usual game store. 
  • If you made an offer to receive a copy of the game and you like to have the game signed by the author you must simply ask, but you will receive the box unwrapped. 

Risks & Challenges

  • This is a flexible campaign. It means that you will get your stuff also if the goal is not reached. 
  • When the crowd-funding campaign is over, we'll be ready to send you  what you payed for almost immediately.
  • Deliveries are estimated by the end of November. If you like to make an original Christmas gift, that's a perfect timing!
  • Delivery cost must be payed separately and depends on the country where you live. We are hard working on finding the best prices and we'll do our best to satisfy any special request you can have, managing every single delivery.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you don't want to contribute, you should talk about this project to your friends. There are so many card game fans in the world...
  • Don't forget the Indiegogo share tools! Your support to every single campaign can improve the chance to have new ideas available for the entire community.
  • Because this is our very first crowdfunding campaign we don't have great experience about international deliveries of this kind. Any suggestion about a way to lower the delivery prices from Italy is very welcome.

Reviews


The game is really nice: it has all the deepness of standard Scopone with some nice twist. 

A real nice opportunity to gamers to learn one of the best traditional Italian card games.

Read more on the well known blog The Opinioneted Gamers.

  Other Ways You Can Help 
If you don't want to contribute, you should talk about this project to your friends. There are so many card game fans in the world... Don't forget the Indiegogo share tools! Your support to every single campaign can improve the chance to have new ideas available for the entire community.
Because this is our very first crowdfunding campaign we don't have great experience about international deliveries of this kind. Any suggestion about a way to lower the delivery prices from Italy is very welcome.


Reviews





The game is really nice: it has all the deepness of standard Scopone with some nice twist. 
A real nice opportunity to gamers to learn one of the best traditional Italian card games.
Read more on the well known blog The Opinioneted Gamers.

story:
Stretch Goal: $14,000

Additional funds over our original $9k goal will go to the following causes in this order:

$1,500 for Scott "Bsupreme" Tokarczyk's family: Scott was a regular at the Nebulous series and a positive influence on the community. He passed away in early July and we'd like to support his family and friends with the funeral and memorial costs. 

****Update: we've reached our first goal to donate money to Scott's family faster than we could have ever imagined. If you want to keep donating to this cause,please do so here: http://gofund.me/zrkzns. Meanwhile, you can choose the Scott perk and donate however much you like and it will go directly to the family.

$1,500 for additional tournament improvements: Extra equipment for Nebulous including additional recording setups, higher stream quality, fans, deodorizers, and other  assorted awesome stuff.

$2,000 for the "Bsupreme Good Player Fund": Named after Scott T., this fund helps promote and support out of region players to attend. 


July 12th Update: Big thanks to everyone who has contributed! We're now including a stretch goal due in order to further promote NYC Smash. 

History of NYC Smash and Nebulous

For years, New York City’s Smash community was in disarray. Smashers were scattered all over the five boroughs and Long Island without a reliable, central location to host their events. Together they had the potential for a lively competitive scene, but none could represent the true size or diversity of the community on their own. Attempts at unification were thwarted by out-of-the-way locations, insufficient space, or inconvenient timing. Finally, a fire began to burn in the hearts of a few community organizers who said “enough is enough”, and set out to find a proper home for Smash here in NYC, once and for all.

The Growth of Nebulous Smash

With the help of Smashers such as HectoHertz, $led, and Jofrey, a new venue was found: Nebulous. The series exploded in popularity, offering many newcomers their first foray into competitive Smash and allowed them to mingle with veterans that gathered to hone their craft. Tournament size began to push the venue to maximum capacity and beyond. To the delight of everyone, Nebulous Gaming moved to an even larger venue with multiple floors, allowing the NYC community to accommodate its rapid growth, and the potential to support it even further. The new location, Neo-Nebulous, was bigger, better, and gave Melee, Smash 4, and Project M players alike the space it deserved, and weeklies with participation in excess of 100 players were becoming routine.


The larger Super Nebulous series grew to over 200 players, featuring notable competitors from other regions like S2J, Lucky and Wizzrobe, and even international talent such as Jeapie, Ice and Professor Pro making appearances. The most populous city in the US and formerly one of the strongest Smash regions finally had a thriving scene once again, on par with SoCal, MD/VA and the Boston metro area. Thing were looking up, but unfortunately, this would be the peak of Neo-Nebulous. Unforeseen circumstances caused Nebulous Gaming to be displaced from its prime location in Manhattan, leaving the NYC community without a roof over its head once again.

Super Nebulous 3


The Current Predicament

Today, 3 months later, a lifeline for Nebulous has been discovered. A new venue in the heart of Manhattan and suitable for Nebulous’ size with 3,000 sq ft has been found (with a secure lease!), which could allow the store to reopen and resume hosting tournaments again by the end of the summer. This is where you come in. The Nebulous team is $8,000 short of the initial deposit. The purpose of this fundraiser is to help raise the remaining funds for Nebulous to reopen and cover the expenses for doing so. It’s important to note that even if this fundraiser doesn’t meet its goal, Nebulous will still reopen. However, it would delay the opening by 6 months or more.

The Impact of Nebulous

We are all eager for Nebulous to rise again, but not merely for round-robin pools or something to do on the weekend. For us, Nebulous has become more than just a tournament series. Beyond a simple competition for prize money and bragging rights, it is also a social club, a training facility for those who aspire to be the best, a hangout spot for casual players, a place for old friends to gather and for new friendships to be made. On behalf of the Nebulous team and the NYC community, we thank you for taking the time to hear our story, and ask that you please consider donating and supporting our cause, so we can get back to that which we love the most: Smashing.

story:
iGaming – The Digital Series of Gaming Books!

  

Intro

So what it is iGaming? iGaming is the brainchild of a small group of people who have been heavily involved in gaming for many years. We plan for iGaming to produce a free digitally published series of books on gaming! What do we define as gaming? Well, we’ve grouped gaming into three categories…

 

Tabletop gaming (Gamesworkshop, Privateer Press, Flames of War etc.)

TCG gaming (MTG, Pokemon, Yugioh etc.)

Digital gaming (Pokemon DS series, COD, WOW etc.)

 

But iGaming is more than just writing a series of books on gaming, it is designed to be a community hub, while the guides will be written primarily by myself and my team (well, me and 3 others…) we want the community to get involved, to offer up bits and pieces to include and to offer us support…

 

Support!

We have already received a pledge of support and collaboration from the following sites/communities!

 

http://warpstoneflux.blogspot.co.uk/

http://the-deathwing.blogspot.co.uk/

 

So what about these books?!

These will all be absolutely FREE (with the exception of the printed books, these you’ll have to pay for postage, but that’s it!) – I’d like to make it clear here that we are a non-profit group; we are not doing this to raise any sort of money for ourselves, just to give something back to the community!

 

Ah, back to the reason we’re here, the books! We want to create a series of books on gaming which will be published digitally, on the iPad (iBooks) on Android (ePUB) as PDFs and as printed copies.

 

As far as the books go, we want to produce one for each element of each system of each type of gaming… For example we want to produce a tactics book for each army of each Tabletop Gaming system, we want to produce a walkthrough for digital games and we want to produce guides for TCGs (little bit harder to break down how we’ll divide the books due to the different nature of each game system).

 

Each book will be…

  • Greater than 100 pages in length
  • Full of interactive features (videos, pictures, interactive HTML widgets so much we want to pack in!)
  • Be useful and tested! We will have a ‘beta group’ who will test and review our books first, so when we do publish them, they will be of a high quality!
  • Regulated by you! Yes, you read that right, as these books are being sold for free and for the sole purpose of giving something back to the community we want you to shape the way they are made, you want more of one type of book being produced, then fine, that’s what we’ll do!

 

There must be a catch; you can’t be giving away all these books for FREE?!

Nope, no catch, everything we produce will be free (minus any shipping costs if you order a physical product) but we do need some help getting started…

 

Help us get this project started!

Like is said, we need some help getting started, while we have most of the things we need to do this project, we are lacking a few things

 

  •  An iMac (without this we can’t create any iBooks, or add art to any books of any format)
  • An artist (you do want high quality pictures and illustrations in your books don’t you?!)
  •  A programmer (while we all have computer knowledge, this is mainly in the book creation department rather than in the programing side; we need someone to write us a few HTML widgets)

 

Cost wise this equates to £2000 ($3000) ideally we want to raise more, as this would let us give out more printed copies of books, buy higher quality equipment etc. Basically the more money we can raise, the faster we can produce higher quality books!

 

So why should I donate?

In conclusion, if you donate you will be helping us kick-start a massive project, one which will provide resources for, and benefit you and the entire gaming community! We’re not asking much, any small donation will go a long way to helping us achieve our goal!

 

If you can’t give then we ask that you help us out by sharing this page; help us get our idea to as many people as we can!

 

Thanks for reading!
